targetString: د هنري او فرهنګي سکټورونو اداراتو کوښښ وکړ خپل مأموریتونه بشپړ کړي تر څو فرهنګي میراثونو ته د خلکو په لاسرسي کې مرسته وکړي، خپل کارکوونکي او عام خلک مصؤن وساتي، او که چېرې شونې وي نو له هنرمندانو څخه حمایت وکړي.
en-mt: The agencies of the arts and culture sectors have tried to complete their missions to help people access cultural heritage, keep their employees and the general public safe, and if possible, support artists.

sourceString: By March 2020, across the world and to varying degrees, museums, libraries, performance venues, and other cultural institutions had been indefinitely closed with their exhibitions, events and performances cancelled or postponed.
targetString: د 2020 کال په مارچ کې، په ټوله نړۍ کې میوزیمونه، کتابخونې، د هنري کړنو مرکزونه، او ګڼ فرهنګي انسټيټیوټونه په بېسارې ډول وتړل شول او نندارې، فعالیتونه او کړنې یې یا لغو شوې او یا هم وځنډېدې.
en-mt: In March 2020, museums, libraries, performing arts centers, and many cultural institutes around the world were forced to close and exhibitions, activities, and performances were either canceled or postponed.

sourceString: In response there were intensive efforts to provide alternative services through digital platforms.Another recent and rapidly accelerating fallout of the disease is the cancellation of religious services, major events in sports, and other social events, such as music festivals and concerts, technology conferences, and fashion shows.
targetString: په مقابل کې یې، د بدیل خدمتونو د وړاندې کولو لپاره د ډیجیټلي کړنو له لارې هڅې ترسره شوې. د دې ناروغۍ یوه بله نوې رامنځته شوې پدیده چې په ګړندیتوب سره پر مخ روانه ده، هغه د مذهبي خدمتونو، مهمو ورزشي پېښو، او نورو ټولنیزو پېښو لغو کېدل دي لکه: د موسیقۍ مراسم او کنسترونه، د تکنالوژۍ کنفرانسونه او د فېشن نندارتونونه.
en-mt: In contrast, efforts have been made through digital practices to provide alternative services. Another newly created phenomenon of this disease which is progressing rapidly is the cancellation of religious services, important sports events, and other social events such as: music ceremonies and concerts, technology conferences and fashion shows.

sourceString: The film industry has also experienced disruption.The Vatican announced that Holy Week observances in Rome, which occur during the last week of the Christian penitential season of Lent, have been cancelled.
targetString: د فلم جوړونې په کارونو کې هم خنډونه رامنځ ته شوي. واټيکان په روم کې د مقدسې اونۍ د لمناځلو د بندولو اعلان وکړ، دا مراسم د عیسویانو د جزا د عید د فصل په آخره اونۍ کې ترسره کېږي.
en-mt: There have also been setbacks in film production. The Vatican has announced the closure of the Holy Week celebration in Rome, which takes place during the last week of the Christian Lenten season.

sourceString: Many dioceses have recommended older Christians to stay at home rather than attending Mass on Sundays; some churches have made church services available via radio, online live streaming or television while others are offering drive-in worship.
targetString: د کلیساګانو اکثرو اسقفانو له بوډا عیسویانو وغوښتل چې د یکشنبه په غونډو کې د ګډون پر ځای په خپلو کورونو کې کېني، ځينو کلیساګانو خپلې مذهبي کړنې د راډیو، تلویزیون او یا هم په آنلانین ډول خلکو ته ورسولې، او ځينو د موټر چلونې په وخت کې خپل عبادتونه تر سره کړل.
en-mt: Most of the bishops of the churches asked the elderly Christians to stay in their homes instead of attending the Sunday services. He performed his worship.

sourceString: With the Roman Catholic Diocese of Rome closing its churches and chapels and St. Peter's Square emptied of Christian pilgrims, other religious bodies also cancelled services and limited public gatherings in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples and gurdwaras.
targetString: کله چې د روم کاتولیک اسقف خپلې کلیساګانې او عبادتخونې وتړلې او د سېنټ پیټرز څلور لارې د عیسویانو د عبادت کوونکو څخه خالي  شوه، نورو مذهبي مرکزونو هم خپل خدمات محدود کړل او د خلکو راغونډېل یې په کلیساګانو، جوماتونو، عبادتخونو، معبدونو او درمسالونو کې کم کړل.
en-mt: As the Roman Catholic Diocese closed its churches and synagogues and St. Peter's Square became empty of Christian worshipers, other religious centers also limited their services and gathered people in churches, mosques, synagogues, temples, and dormitories. reduced

sourceString: Iran's Health Ministry announced the cancellation of Friday prayers in areas affected by the outbreak and shrines were later closed, while Saudi Arabia banned the entry of foreign pilgrims as well as its residents to holy sites in Mecca and Medina.
targetString: د ایران د روغتیا وزارت په هغو ځایونو کې  د جمعې د لمونځ بندېدل اعلان کړل چې د مرض د شیوع تر اغېز لاندې وو، او وروسته له هغې زیارتونه هم وتړل شول، همدارنګه سعودي  عربستان هم د خارجي حاجیانو راتګ بند کړ او د خپلو خلکو تګ راتګ یې د مکې  او مدینې په مقدسو سیمو کې بند کړ.
en-mt: Iran's Ministry of Health announced the suspension of Friday prayers in places that were affected by the outbreak of the disease, and after that the shrines were also closed, and Saudi Arabia also stopped the arrival of foreign pilgrims and the movement of its own people. His arrival was blocked in the sacred areas of Makkah and Madinah.

sourceString: The pandemic has caused the most significant disruption to the worldwide sporting calendar since the Second World War.
targetString: دا وبا وروسته له دویم نړيوال جنګ څخه، د دې لامل شوه چې د لوبو په نړۍ کې تر ټولو ډېر ځنډ رامنځ ته کړي.
en-mt: This pandemic caused the longest delay in the gaming world since World War II.

sourceString: Most major sporting events have been either cancelled or postponed, including the 2019–20 UEFA Champions League, 2019–20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019–20 NBA season, and 2019–20 NHL season.
targetString: ډېری مهمې ورزشي پېښې لغو او وځنډول شوې لکه: 20-2019 UEFA چمپینز لیګ، 20-2019 پریمیر لیګ، UEFA یورو 2020، 20-2019 NBA فصل، او 20-2019 NHL فصل.
en-mt: Many major sporting events have been canceled and postponed such as: 2019-20 UEFA Champions League, 2019-20 Premier League, UEFA Euro 2020, 2019-20 NBA season, and 2019-20 NHL season.

sourceString: The outbreak disrupted plans for the 2020 Summer Olympics, which were originally scheduled to start at the end of July; the International Olympic Committee announced on 24 March that the event will be "rescheduled to a date beyond 2020 but not later than summer 2021".Casinos and other gaming venues worldwide have closed and live poker tournaments have been either postponed or cancelled.
targetString: د مرض شیوع د 2020 کال د اوړي اولمپیک سیالیو په پلان کې چې باید د جولای په پای کې ترسره شوې وی، خنډ رامنځ ته کړ؛ د المپیک بین المللي کمېټې اعلان وکړ چې یادې سیالۍ به وروسته له مشخصې شوې نېټې ترسره شي خو  د 2021 کال د اوړي څخه به ونه ځنډېږي.په ټوله نړۍ کې قمارخونې او د لوبو نور ځایونه تړل شوي دي او ژوندي پوکر ټورنمنټونه یا ځنډول شوي او یا هم لغو شوي دي.
en-mt: The outbreak of the disease caused a disruption in the planning of the 2020 Summer Olympics, which should have been held at the end of July; The International Olympic Committee has announced that the games will be held after the specified date, but will not be postponed from the summer of 2021. All over the world, casinos and other gaming venues have been closed, and live poker tournaments have been postponed. or have been cancelled.

sourceString: This has led many gamblers to move online, with many online gambling sites reporting significant increases in their rates of new sign-ups.The entertainment industry has also been affected, with various music groups suspending or cancelling concert tours.
targetString: دا دې لامل شوی چې ډېری قمار بازان په آنلاین قول قمار ووهي، د قمار ګڼو آنلاین سایټونو خپلو سایټونو ته د  نویو خلکو د ننوتلو په کچه کې ډېروالی اعلان کړ. د لوبو او ساتېرۍ چارې هم اغېزمې شوې ډي او د موسیقۍ ګڼو ګروپونو خپل کنسرتونه ځنډولي او یا لغو کړي دي.
en-mt: This has led to more gamblers turning to online gambling, with many online gambling sites reporting an increase in the number of new people entering their sites. Sports and entertainment activities have also been affected and many music groups have postponed or canceled their concerts.

sourceString: Many large theatres such as those on Broadway also suspended all performances.
targetString: ډېری لویو تئاټرونو لکه هغه چې په براډوې کې دي، خپلې نندارې او کړنې ځنډولې دي.
en-mt: Many major theaters, such as those on Broadway, have suspended their shows and performances.

sourceString: Some artists have explored ways to continue to produce and share work over the internet as an alternative to traditional live performance, such as live streaming concerts or creating web-based "festivals" for artists to perform, distribute, and publicize their work.
targetString: ځينو هنرمندانو داسې بدیلې لارې موندلې چې د سنتي ژوندۍ اجرا پر ځای، خپلې کړنې او کارونه د انټرنېټ له لارې له خلکو سره شریکې کړي لکه: په ژوندۍ بڼه انټرنټي کنسرتونه او د سایټونو له لارې د مراسمو جوړول تر څو هنرمندان وکولای شي خپلې نندارې او کارونه احرا کړي او خلکو ته یې ورسوي.
en-mt: Some artists have found alternative ways to share their performances and works with the public through the Internet instead of traditional live performances, such as: live online concerts and creating events through sites so that artists can share their performances and Take the work and deliver it to the people.

sourceString: Online, numerous coronavirus-themed Internet memes have spread as many turn to humour and distraction amid uncertainty.
targetString: آنلاین، د کرونا وئروس مضمون په اړه ګڼ شمېر انټرنېټي نوټونه د طنز او ساتېرۍ په بڼه کې د عدم اطمینان په خاطر د خلکو په منځ کې نشر شوي دي.
en-mt: Online, many internet notes on the subject of the Corona virus have been circulated among people in the form of humor and entertainment due to dissatisfaction.

sourceString: Since the outbreak of COVID-19, heightened prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noted toward people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and against people from hotspots in Europe, the United States and other countries.
targetString: د COVID-19 د راڅرګندېدو راهيسې د چين او ختيځې اسيا د نسل خلکو او په اروپا ، متحده ايالاتو او نورو هيوادونو د توکم ځایونو خلکو په وړاندې ژور تعصب ، ژنفوفيا او نژاد پالنې ته پام شوی دی.
en-mt: Since the emergence of COVID-19, deep prejudice, xenophobia, and racism have been noticed against people of Chinese and East Asian descent, and people of ethnic origin in Europe, the United States, and other countries.

sourceString: Incidents of fear, suspicion, and hostility have been observed in many countries, particularly in Europe, East Asia, North America, and the Asia-Pacific region.
targetString: په ډېری هېوادونو کې په خاص ډول په اروپا، شرقي آسیا، شمالي امریکا او د آسیا د آرام سمندر په سیمو کې د ډار، بدګمانۍ او دښمنۍ پېښې لیدل شوې دي.
en-mt: In many countries, especially in Europe, East Asia, North America and the Asia Pacific region, cases of fear, mistrust and hostility have been observed.

sourceString: Reports from February (when the majority of the cases had still been confined to China) have documented racist sentiments expressed in various groups worldwide of Chinese people deserving the virus or receiving what has been claimed as justified retribution.
targetString: د فبروري (کله چې د وئروس ډېری پېښې په چین کې ثبت وې) راپورونو ښودلې چې په نړۍ کې ګڼ خلک د شدیدې توکمي کینې احساس لري او د چین خلک د دې وئرس جوګه بولي او کوم شیان چې دوی ته پېښېږي، دا د دوی د کړنو سره سمه سزا بولي.
en-mt: Reports from February (when most cases of the virus were recorded in China) showed that many people in the world have a strong sense of ethnic hatred, and that the Chinese people call the virus the source of the virus and that what happens to them is their fault. Actions are called the right punishment.

sourceString: Some countries in Africa have also seen a rise in anti-Chinese sentiment.
targetString: په ځینې افریقايي هېوادونو کې هم د چین پر ضد احساسات لیدل شوي.
en-mt: Anti-China sentiments have also been seen in some African countries.

sourceString: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei have reported discrimination based on their regional origin.
targetString: د ووهان او هوبي ډیری اوسیدونکو د خپل سیمه ایز اصل پراساس د تبعیض راپور ورکړی.
en-mt: Many residents of Wuhan and Hubei reported discrimination based on their regional origin.

sourceString: There has been support for the Chinese, both on and offline, and towards those in virus-stricken areas.
targetString: د چینایانو او د هغو سیمو لپاره چې وئروس شتون لري، هم په آنلاین او هم په آفلاین ډول حمایت شون لري.
en-mt: Both online and offline support is available for Chinese and virus-affected regions.

sourceString: Following the progression of the outbreak to new hotspot countries, people from Italy, the first country in Europe to experience a serious outbreak of COVID-19, could also be subjected to suspicion and xenophobia.Citizens in countries including Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea initially signed petitions lobbying to ban Chinese people from entering their countries in an effort to stop the disease.
targetString: په ځینو نویو هېوادونو کې د شیوع پرمختګ ته په کتنې سره، د ایټالیا خلک هم کېدای شي چې د وېرې او بد ګمانۍ سره مخ شي، یاد هېواد لومړنی اروپایي هېواد دی چې د 19-COVID له جدي شیوع سره مخ دی. د مالیزیا، نیو زیلند، سینګاپور، او جنوبي کوریا هېوادونو خلکو د مرض د محارولو لپاره هڅې وکړې او د دې لپاره چې هېوادونو ته یې د چینایانو په ورود بندیز ولګول شي، عریضې وکړې.
en-mt: Looking at the progress of the outbreak in some new countries, the people of Italy may also face fear and suspicion, this country is the first European country that is facing a serious outbreak of 19-Covid. The people of Malaysia, New Zealand, Singapore, and South Korea made efforts to control the disease and petitioned to ban the entry of Chinese into their countries.

sourceString: In Japan, the hashtag #ChineseDontComeToJapan trended on Twitter.
targetString: په جاپان کې، په ټویټر کې د #چینایان-دې-جاپان-ته-نه-راځي تر نوم لاندې یو هشټګ جوړ شو.
en-mt: In Japan, a hashtag was created on Twitter under the name #Chinese-do-not-come-to-Japan.

sourceString: Chinese people as well as other Asians in the United Kingdom and the United States have reported increasing levels of racist abuse, as well as assaults.
targetString: په بریتانیا او متحده ایالاتو کې چینایانو او د نورو آسیایي هېوادونو خلکو د دوی سره د توکمیز تبعیض او ځورېدنې د کچې د لوړوالي راپورونه ورکړل.
en-mt: In Britain and the United States, Chinese and people from other Asian countries have reported increased levels of racial discrimination and harassment.

sourceString: U.S. president Donald Trump has faced criticism for referring to the coronavirus as the "Chinese Virus", a term considered by critics to be racist and anti-Chinese.
targetString: د متحده ایالاتو ولسمشر ډونلډ ټرمپ د خپلې هغې خبرې له کبله له غبرګونونو سره مخ شو چې کرونا وئروس یې د چینايي وئروس په نوم یاد کړ، چې دا خبر یې د منتقدینو لخوا تبعیض او د چین ضد وبلل شوه.
en-mt: The President of the United States, Donald Trump, faced reactions due to his words that he called the Corona virus as the Chinese virus, which critics called discrimination and anti-China.

sourceString: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainian and foreign evacuees from Wuhan to Novi Sanzhary.
targetString: په اوکراین کې معترضینو په هغو بسونو باندې حمله وکړه چې اوکراینیان او بهرني فراریان یې له ووهان څخه نووي سانژاري ته لېږدول.
en-mt: Protesters in Ukraine attacked buses carrying Ukrainians and foreign refugees from Wuhan to Novy Sanzhari.

sourceString: Students who come from Northeast India, which shares a border with China, and study in major Indian cities have reportedly experienced harassment related to the coronavirus outbreak.
targetString: هغه هندي زده کوونکو د کرونا وئروس د شیوع په خاطر د دوی د ځورېدنې راپورونه ورکړل چې د هند د شمال شرقي سیمو څخه چې له چين سره سرحد لري، لویو ښارونو ته د درس په خاطر راغلي وو.
en-mt: Those Indian students who had come from the north-eastern regions of India bordering China to study in big cities gave reports of their suffering due to the spread of the Corona virus.

sourceString: The Bharatiya Janata Party's State unit president in West Bengal Dilip Ghosh stated that the Chinese had destroyed nature and "that's why the God took revenge against them."
targetString: د بهارتیا جانتا پارټي ایالت لومړي وزیر په غربي بنګال ډیليپ کې وویل چې چینایانو طبیعت وران کړ نو ځکه خدای له دوی څخه غچ واخیست.
en-mt: Bharatiya Janta Party State Chief Minister in West Bengal Dilip said that the Chinese destroyed the nature and therefore God took revenge on them.

sourceString: The remarks were later condemned by the Chinese consulate in Kolkata, calling it "erroneous".In China, xenophobia and racism agains non-Chinese residents has been inflamed by the pandemic, with foreigners described as "foreign garbage" and targeted for "disposal".
targetString: یاده وینا بیا وروسته په کلکټه کې د چین د کونسل له خوا وغندل شوه او یاده وینا یې اشتباه وبلله.په چین کې، د وبا له امله له غیر چینایي وګړو بد چلند او تبعیض شدت موندلی او د چین خلک بهرنیان د خارجي اشغالو په نامه یادوي او غواړي چې له چین څخه ووځي.
en-mt: This speech was later condemned by the Chinese Council in Calcutta and called this speech a mistake. In China, due to the epidemic, ill treatment and discrimination against non-Chinese people has intensified and Chinese people call foreigners foreigners as foreign invaders. Remembers and wants to leave China.

sourceString: Many newspapers with paywalls have removed them for some or all of their coronavirus coverage.
targetString: ګڼو ورځپاڼو دوی د خپلو ځینو او یا ټولو پوښښونو څخه ایستلي دي.
en-mt: Many newspapers have dropped them from some or all of their coverage.

sourceString: Many scientific publishers made scientific papers related to the outbreak available with open access.
targetString: ګڼو علمي خپرندوینو د شیوع په اړه علمي پاڼې چاپ کړې هر څوک کولای شي ورته لاسرسی ولري.
en-mt: Many scientific publications have published scientific papers on the outbreak that anyone can access.

sourceString: Some scientists chose to share their results quickly on preprint servers such as bioRxiv.
targetString: ځینو پوهانو و غوښتل چې خپلې پایلې د د هغو سرورونو له طریق شریکې کړي چې له مخکې فعالیت کوي لکه bioRxiv.
en-mt: Some scientists wanted to share their results through already functioning servers such as bioRxiv.

sourceString: Emerging infectious disease – Infectious disease of emerging pathogen, often novel in its outbreak range or transmission mode
targetString: نوې ساري ناروغي-د نوي موجود ساري ناروغي، اکثرا د شیوع په کړۍ کې او یا هم د انتقال په بڼه کې وي.
en-mt: New Infectious Disease - A newly emerging infectious disease, often in the form of an outbreak or transmission.

sourceString: Globalization and disease – Overview of globalization and disease transmission
targetString: نړيوالي او ناروغۍ - د نړيوالۍ او ناروغۍ د انتقال بياکتنه
en-mt: Globalization and Disease - A Review of Globalization and Disease Transmission

sourceString: List of epidemics and pandemics – A list of death tolls due to infectious disease
targetString: د واګیرې ناروغۍ او وبا لست - د ساري ناروغۍ له کبه د مړیو لست
en-mt: List of infectious diseases and epidemics - list of deaths from infectious diseases

sourceString: Wildlife smuggling and zoonoses – Health risks associated with the trade in exotic wildlife
targetString: د ژوو قاچاق او حیواني ناروغۍ - د وحشي ژوو د بهرني تجارت سره تړلي صحي خطرونه.
en-mt: Wildlife Trafficking and Animal Diseases - Health Risks Associated with Foreign Wildlife Trade.

sourceString: Laboratory testing for the respiratory coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) and the associated SARS-CoV-2 virus includes methods that detect the presence of virus and those that detect antibodies produced in response to infection.
targetString: د 2019 کورونا ويروس د تنفسي ناروغۍ 19-COVID او د 2-SARS-CoV موجود وئرس لپاره په آزمایښتي لابراتوارونو کې داسې مېتودونه شتون لري چې د هغې له لارې د وئروس شتون تشخیصېږي او د وجود د انټي باډي تولید د ويروس په مقابل کې څرګندوي.
en-mt: For the 2019 coronavirus respiratory disease 19-COVID and 2-SARS-CoV, there are methods in testing laboratories that detect the presence of the virus and show the existence of antibody production against the virus. .

sourceString: The presence of viruses in samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the coronavirus'  RNA.
targetString: په نمونو کې د د ويروس شتون د RT-PCR له لارې تایید کېږي چې د کورونا ويروس RNA تشخیصوي.
en-mt: The presence of the virus in the samples is confirmed by RT-PCR, which detects the RNA of the coronavirus.

sourceString: This test is specific and is designed to only detect the RNA of the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: په مارچ 2020 کې، د SARS-CoV-2 ویروس اصلي پروټیز د انتان څخه وروسته درملو لپاره د هدف په توګه وپیژندل شو.
en-mt: In March 2020, the core protease of the SARS-CoV-2 virus was identified as a target for post-infection drugs.

sourceString: It is used to confirm very recent or active infections.
targetString: دا د دې لپاره استفاده کېږي چې تر ټولو نوي او فعال ملوثین تشخیص کړي.
en-mt: It is used to detect the newest and most active infections.

sourceString: Detection of antibodies (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and population surveillance.
targetString: د انټي باډي (سیرولوژي) کشف کېدای شي چې هم د تشخیص او هم د خلکو د مراقبت لپاره وکارول شي.
en-mt: Antibody detection (serology) can be used both for diagnosis and for monitoring people.

sourceString: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, including those whose symptoms were too minor to report or who were asymptomatic.
targetString: د انټي باډي ټېسټونه ښیي چې څومره خلکو دا ناروغي  لرله، هم هغه  کسان چې  د ناروغۍ علایم یې ډېر کم وو او هم هغه کسان چې علایم یې څرګند وو.
en-mt: Antibody tests show how many people have had the disease, both those with mild symptoms and those with severe symptoms.

sourceString: An accurate mortality rate of the disease and the level of herd immunity in the population can be determined from the results of this test.
targetString: د نارغوۍ له کبله د مړينې کره کچه او د عامه مصؤنیت کچه د دې تېسټ د پایلو له طریقه معلومېدی شي.
en-mt: The exact rate of death due to illness and the level of public safety can be determined from the results of this test.

sourceString: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020 no countries had reliable data on the prevalence of the virus in their population.
targetString: د محدودو ټېسټونو له امله، د 2020 کال تر مارچ پورې هېڅ هېواد په خپلو خلکو کې د وئروس د نشرېدو په اړه کره ارقام نه لرل.
en-mt: Due to limited testing, as of March 2020, no country had accurate data on the spread of the virus in its population.

sourceString: By 23 March, no country had tested more than 3% of their population, and there are massive variations in how much testing has been done across countries.
targetString: د مارچ تر 23 پورې يو هېواد هم د خپلې آبادي  3% حصه نه وه ازمېښت کړې، دې کې زيادتره هيوادونو پاليسۍ وه چې دا کم تره نښو نښانو واله لبارتري ازمېښت به نه کوو، لکه اتالي، نیدرلینڈ، سپين او سویټزرلینډ
en-mt: As of March 23, not a single country had tested 3% of its population, most of which had a policy of not testing those with fewer symptoms, such as Italy, the Netherlands, Spain and Switzerland.

sourceString: This variability is also likely to be significantly affecting reported case fatality rates, which are likely to be significantly over-estimated in some countries.
targetString: دا تنوع د راپور شویو پېښو د مړینې کچه هم په لوړه پېمانه اغېزمنوي چې ښایي په ځينو هېوادونو کې په لوړه اندازه تخمین شوي وي.
en-mt: This diversity also affects reported case fatality rates, which may be overestimated in some countries.

sourceString: Using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) the test can be done on respiratory samples obtained by various methods, including nasopharyngeal swab or sputum sample.
targetString: ازموینه د ریښتیني وخت ریورس لیږد پولیمریزې زنځیر غبرګون (rRT-PCR) کاروي.
en-mt: The test uses real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR).

sourceString: Results are generally available within a few hours to 2 days.
targetString: پایلې عموما د څو ساعتونو څخه تر ورځو پورې شتون لري.
en-mt: Results are usually available within a few hours to days.

sourceString: The RT-PCR test performed with throat swabs is only reliable in the first week of the disease.
targetString: د ستوني پر نمونو باندې د RT-PCR اجرا شوی ټېسټ یوازې د ناروغۍ په لومړۍ اونۍ کې معتبر دی.
en-mt: The RT-PCR test performed on throat samples is only valid during the first week of illness.

sourceString: Later on the virus can disappear in the throat while it continues to multiply in the lungs.
targetString: وروسته بیا وئروس کولای شي چې له ستوني څخه ورک شي او ششونو ته ننوځي.
en-mt: Later, the virus can escape from the throat and enter the lungs.

sourceString: For infected people tested in the second week, alternatively sample material can then be taken from the deep airways by suction catheter or coughing up material (sputum) can be used.
targetString: د هغو ملوثو کسانو لپاره چې په دوهمه اونۍ کې ټېسټ کېږي، د کش کوونکې لولې او یا هم د ټوخي کوونکو موادو (سپټم) څخه په استفادې سره د هغوی د ژورې تنفسي لارې څخه بدیلې نمونېې  اخیستل کېږي.
en-mt: For infected individuals who are tested in the second week, alternate samples are taken from their deep airways using a suction tube or a septum.

sourceString: One of the early PCR tests was developed at Charité in Berlin in January 2020 using real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR), and formed the basis of 250,000 kits for distribution by the World Health Organization (WHO).
targetString: د PCR یو له لومړنیو ټېسټونو څخه د 2020 په جنوري کې د برلین په چاریټي کې ترسره شو چې په هغه کې د حقیقي مودې د توضیحاتو د معکوسو پولیمیري تعاملاتو لړۍ  (rRT-PCR) وکارول شوه او  روغتیا نړیوال سازمان ته یې د 250,000 حرارتي ترمامترونو د توزیع زمینه برابره کړه.
en-mt: One of the first PCR tests was conducted in January 2020 at a charity in Berlin that used real-time reverse transcription-polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) and provided the World Health Organization with 250,000 thermometers. Provide distribution.

sourceString: The United Kingdom had also developed a test by 23 January 2020.The South Korean company Kogenebiotech developed a clinical grade, PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit (PowerChek Coronavirus) on 28 January 2020.
targetString: بریتانیا هم د 2020 کال د جنوري په 23مه یو ټېسټ تر سره کړ.د 2020 کال د جنوري په 28مه په جنوبي کوریا کې د کوګینیبیوچ په نامه یوې کمپنۍ د PCR او SARS-CoV-2 پر اساس د حرارت د معلومولو لپاره په کلنیکي مقیاس آله جوړه کړه.
en-mt: Britain also conducted a test on January 23, 2020. On January 28, 2020, a company in South Korea called Kogenbiuch launched a PCR and SARS-CoV-2-based temperature test on a clinical scale. Build a device.

sourceString: It looks for the "E" gene shared by all beta coronaviruses, and the RdRp gene specific to SARS-CoV-2.In China, BGI Group was one of the first companies to receive emergency use approval from China's National Medical Products Administration for a PCR-based SARS-CoV-2 detection kit.In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing its 2019-Novel Coronavirus (2019-nCoV) Real-Time RT-PCR Diagnostic Panel to public health labs through the International Reagent Resource.
targetString: دا د بېټا کرونا وئروس لخوا په خپاره شویو E جنونه او مشخص SARS-CoV-2 لټوي.BGI گروپ په چین کې یو له لومړنیو شرکتونو څخه و چې د چين د ملي روغتیایي محصولاتو له ادارې څخه یې د PCR پر بنسټ د SARS-CoV-2 د حرارت د تشخیص د آلي د استعمالولو جواز تر لاسه کړ. په متحده ایالاتو کې، د ناروغۍ د کنټرول او مخنیوي مراکز (CDC) خپلو عامه صحي لابراتوارونو ته د بین المللی معرفو منابعو له لارې د 2019 ناول کرونا وئروس (2019-nCoV) د دقیق وخت درلودونکې تشخیصي آلې (RT-PCR) توزیع کوي.
en-mt: It detects E genes and specific SARS-CoV-2 released by beta-coronaviruses. BGI Group was one of the first companies in China to obtain PCR-based SARS-CoV from the National Health Products Administration of China. -2 Received a license to use a temperature diagnosis device. In the United States, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) is distributing 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV) real-time diagnostic kits (RT-PCR) to its public health laboratories through international knowledge sources. .

sourceString: One of three genetic tests in older versions of the test kits caused inconclusive results due to faulty reagents, and a bottleneck of testing at the CDC in Atlanta; this resulted in an average of fewer than 100 samples a day being successfully processed throughout the whole of February 2020.
targetString: د زړو ټېسټ کېټونو یو له دریو جنیټیک ازموینو څخه د ناقصو کړنو له امله نامناسبې پایلې او د اټلانټا په CDC کې یې د آزموینې خنډ رامنځته کړ؛ دا د دې لامل شو چې د 2020 په ټوله فبروري میاشت کې د ورځې یوازې 100 نمونې په بریالیتوب سره پروسېس شي.
en-mt: One out of three genetic tests with older test kits gave inaccurate results due to poor performance and caused a trial shutdown at the CDC in Atlanta; This resulted in only 100 samples per day being successfully processed throughout the month of February 2020.

sourceString: Tests using two components were not determined to be reliable until 28 February 2020, and it was not until then that state and local laboratories were permitted to begin testing.
targetString: د 2020 کال د فبروري تر 28مې پورې، په دوو آلو ترسره شوي ټېسټونه د اطمینان وړ نه بلل کېدل، او دا ټېسټونه نه منل کېل ترڅو دولتي او محلي لابراتوارونو د ټېسټونو اجازه ورکړه.
en-mt: As of February 28, 2020, tests performed on two potatoes were considered unsatisfactory, and those tests were not accepted until state and local laboratories authorized the tests.

sourceString: The test was approved by the Food and Drug Administration under an Emergency Use Authorization.US commercial labs began testing in early March 2020.
targetString: دا ټېسټونه د خوړو او درملو د ادارې لخوا د یوې اضطراري استفادې د اجازې له طریقه تایید شول. د متحده ایالاتو سوداګریز لابراتوارونو خپل ټېسټونه د 2020 کال د مارچ په لومړیو کې پیل کړل.
en-mt: These tests have been approved by the Food and Drug Administration through an Emergency Use Authorization method. US commercial laboratories began their tests in early March 2020.

sourceString: As of 5 March 2020 LabCorp announced nationwide availability of COVID-19 testing based on RT-PCR.
targetString: د 2020 کال د مارچ په 5مه LabCorp اعلان وکړ چې د COVID-19 ټېسټونه په ټول هېواد کې د RT-PCR څخه په ګټڼې د لاسرسي وړ دي.
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, LabCorp announced that COVID-19 tests are now available nationwide using RT-PCR.

sourceString: Quest Diagnostics similarly made nationwide COVID-19 testing available as of 9 March 2020.
targetString: Quest Diagnostic هم د 2020 کال د مارچ په 9مه په ټول هېواد کې یې د COVID-19 ټېسټونو ته د لاسرسي زمینه برابره کړه.
en-mt: Quest Diagnostic also provided access to COVID-19 tests nationwide on March 9, 2020.

sourceString: No quantity limitations were announced; specimen collection and processing must be performed according to CDC requirements.
targetString: هېڅ کوم مقداري محدودیتونه اعلان نه شول، د نمونو راټولول او پروسېس باید د CDC د غوښتنو مطابق تر سره شي.
en-mt: No quantitative limits have been announced, and sample collection and processing must be performed in accordance with CDC requirements.

sourceString: In Russia, the COVID-19 test was developed and produced by the State Research Center of Virology and Biotechnology VECTOR.
targetString: په روسیه کې د COVID-19 ټېسټونه د ویرس پېژندنې او ویکټور بیوټیکنالوژۍ د دولتي څېړنو د مرکز له خوا چمتو او په لاره واچول شول.
en-mt: In Russia, the COVID-19 tests were prepared and launched by the State Research Center for Virus Identification and Vector Biotechnology.

sourceString: On 11 February 2020 the test was registered by the Federal Service for Surveillance in Healthcare.On 12 March 2020, Mayo Clinic was reported to have developed a test to detect COVID-19 infection.On 13 March 2020, Roche Diagnostics received FDA approval for a test which could be performed within 3.5 hours in high volume, thus allowing one machine to do approximately 4,128 tests in a 24-hour period.
targetString: ټېسټ د 2020 کال د فبروری په 11مه د صحت لپاره د مراقبت د فدرالي خدمتونو له خوا راجستر شو. د 2020 کال د مارچ په 12مه مایو کلینیک د COVID-19 د تشخیص د تېسټ اعلان وکړ. د 2020 کال د مارچ په 13مه روچ تشخیصي شرکت د FDA له خوا د داسې ټېسټ جواز ترلاسه کړ چې په دری نیم ساعتونو کې به په لوړه پیمانه اجرا کېږي، نو د یو ماشین له طریقه به په 24 ساعتونو کې کابو 4,128 ټېسټونه ترسره کېږي.
en-mt: The test was registered on February 11, 2020 by the Federal Health Care Service. On March 12, 2020, the Mayo Clinic announced a diagnostic test for COVID-19. On March 13, 2020, Roche Diagnostics received a license from the FDA for a test that will be performed at a high scale in three and a half hours, so about 4,128 tests will be performed in 24 hours using one machine.

sourceString: On 19 March 2020, the FDA issued emergency use authorization (EUA) to Abbott Laboratories for a test on Abbott's m2000 system; the FDA had previously issued similar authorization to Hologic, LabCorp, and Thermo Fisher Scientific.
targetString: د 2020 د مارچ په 19مه FDA  د اباټ لابراتوارونو ته د Abbott m2000 د ټېسټ د اضطراري استفادې اجازه ورکړه؛ ورته جوازونه له دې مخې هم د FDA له خوا ځینو لابراتوارونو ته ورکړي وو لکه: هالوجیک، لب کورپ او تیرمو فیشر ساینتیفیک.
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the FDA granted Abbott Laboratories emergency use authorization for the Abbott m2000 test; The same licenses were given by the FDA to some laboratories such as: Halogic, Lab Corp and Thermo Fisher Scientific.

sourceString: On 21 March 2020, Cepheid similarly received EUA from the FDA for a test that takes about 45 minutes.
targetString: د 2020 د مارچ په 21مه، سیفیډ هم د FDA له خوا د یو 45 دقیقه یی ټېسټ د بېړنۍ استفادې جواز تر لاسه کړی و.
en-mt: On March 21, 2020, Cepheid also received emergency use authorization from the FDA for a 45-minute test.

sourceString: The FDA has approved a test that uses isothermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.
targetString: FDA هغه ټېسټونه مني چې په هغې کې د PCR پر ځای د حرارتي نوکلئیک اسیډونو د قوي کولو د ټکنالوژۍ څخه کار اخیستل شوی وي.
en-mt: The FDA accepts tests that use thermal nucleic acid amplification technology instead of PCR.

sourceString: Since this does not require a series of alternating temperature cycles this method can deliver positive results in as little as five minutes and negative results in 13 minutes.
targetString: دا میتود کولای شي چې په لږ تر لږه 5 دقیقو کې مثبتې پایلې او په 13 دقیقو کې منفي پایلې تشخیص کړي ځکه په دې میتود کې د متناوب حرارت د دوران لړۍ ته اړتیا نشته.
en-mt: This method can diagnose positive results in as little as 5 minutes and negative results in 13 minutes because this method does not require an alternating temperature cycle.

sourceString: There are currently about 18,000 of these machines in the U.S. and Abbott expects to ramp up manufacturing to deliver 50,000 tests per day.A test which uses a monoclonal antibody which specifically binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the novel coronavirus is being developed in Taiwan, with the hope that it can provide results in 15 to 20 minutes just like a rapid influenza test.
targetString: د دې ماشینونو څخه کابو 18,000 دانې اوس په متحده ایالاتو کې موجود دي او ابوټ غواړي چې د دې ماشینونو تولید ګړندی کړي تر څو 50,000 ټېسټونه په ورځ کې ترسره کړي. په تایوان کې د ټېسټ کولو د داسې یو میتود کشفول روان دي  چې په هغې کې یو فردي انټي باډي کارول کېږي چې د کرونا وئرس د نوکلیوسکپېډ پروټين (N پروټين) سره یوځای کېږي، داسې هیلې شته چې د دې میتود له لارې ټېسټ به لکه د انفلونزا د ګړندي ټېسټ په څېر له 15 تر 20 دقیقو پورې وخت ونیسي.
en-mt: About 18,000 of these machines are now available in the United States, and Abbott wants to ramp up production of the machines to perform 50,000 tests a day. A testing method is being developed in Taiwan that uses a personalized antibody that binds to the nucleocapsid protein (N protein) of the coronavirus. It takes about 15 to 20 minutes like a rapid flu test.

sourceString: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs are of little diagnostic value in early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptom onset."
targetString: د مارچ 2020 ادبیاتو بیاکتنه دې پایلې ته ورسیده چې "د سینې رادیوګراف په لومړیو مرحلو کې لږ تشخیصي ارزښت لري ، پداسې حال کې چې د CT [حساب شوي توموگرافي] موندنې ممکن حتی د نښې نښانې دمخه شتون ولري."
en-mt: A March 2020 literature review concluded that "chest radiographs have little diagnostic value in the early stages, whereas CT [computed tomography] findings may be present even before symptoms appear."

sourceString: Typical features on CT include bilateral multilobar ground-glass opacificities with a peripheral, asymmetric and posterior distribution.
targetString: دو اړخیزه شیشه‌یي تیارې له چاپېریالیز، متضاد او وروستي وېش په ژر رامنځته کېدونکو ناروغیو کې عامه وي.
en-mt: Bilateral vitreous opacities are common in early-onset diseases of peripheral, contralateral, and posterior distribution.

sourceString: Subpleural dominance, crazy paving and consolidation develop as the disease evolves.
targetString: سب پلورال تسلط او کریزی پېوینګ (د سږي الویولار یا سوري په متغییر ډول ډکېدو سره د لوبلار پردې ډبلېدل)، او یوځای کېدنه ښایي د ناروغۍ په پرمختګ سره راښکاره شي.
en-mt: Subpleural effusion and crazy-paving (folding of the lobular membranes with variable filling of the alveolar or sinus cavities), and consolidation may appear as the disease progresses.

sourceString: A study comparing PCR to CT in Wuhan at the point of origin of the current pandemic has suggested that CT is significantly more sensitive than PCR, though less specific, with many of its imaging features overlapping with other pneumonias and disease processes.
targetString: په وهان کې د PCR سره د PCR پرتله کولو یوې مطالعې وړاندیز وکړ چې CT د PCR په پرتله خورا حساس دی ، که څه هم لږ مشخص دی ، د دې ډیری عکس العملونه د نورو نمونیا او ناروغۍ پروسو سره پوښل شوي.
en-mt: A study comparing PCR with PCR in Wuhan suggested that CT is more sensitive than PCR, although less specific, as many of its reactions are overlapped with other pneumonias and disease processes.

sourceString: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used to screen for or as a first-line test to diagnose COVID-19".As of March 2020, the CDC recommends PCR for initial screening.
targetString: د 2020 مارچ پورې ، د راډیولوژي امریکایی کالج وړاندیز کوي چې "CT باید د COVID-19 تشخیص کولو لپاره د لومړۍ کرښې ازموینې لپاره یا د سکرین کولو لپاره ونه کارول شي"د 2020 کال تر مارچ پورې، WHO د قضیو لاندې تعریفونه وړاندیز کړل:
en-mt: As of March 2020, the American College of Radiology recommends that "CT should not be used as a first-line test to diagnose or screen for COVID-19" As of March 2020, the WHO has proposed the following case definitions :

sourceString: Part of the immune response to infection is the production of antibodies including IgM and IgG.
targetString: د مکروب په وړاندې د معافیت د غبرګون یوه برخه د IgM او IgG په شمول د انټي باډي تولید دی.
en-mt: Part of the immune response to microbes is the production of antibodies, including IgM and IgG.

sourceString: These can be used to detect infection in individuals starting 7 days or so after the onset of symptoms, to determine immunity, and in population surveillance.Assays can be performed in central laboratories (CLT) or by point-of-care testing (PoCT).
targetString: دا موارد د دې لپاره استفاده کېږي تر څو د خلکو مراقبت وشي، د معافیت سیستم معلوم شي، او د هغو کسانو د ناروغۍ تشخیص وشي چې په لومړنیو 7 ورځو کې او یا تر هغه ورسته نښې نښانې پکې لیدل شوې وې. ټېسټونه په مرکزي لابراتوارونو (CLT) کې یا د پاملرنې ټیسټ (PoCT) له لارې ترسره کیدی شي.
en-mt: These tests are used to monitor people, check their immune systems, and diagnose people with symptoms in the first 7 days or so. Tests can be done at central laboratories (CLT) or through point-of-care testing (PoCT).

sourceString: The high-throughput automated systems in many clinical laboratories will be able to perform these assays but their availability will depend on the rate of production for each system.
targetString: په ډیری کلینیکي لابراتوارونو کې د لوړې کچې اتومات شوي سیسټمونه به دا وړتیاوې ترسره کړي چې ټېسټونه تر سره کړي مګر د دوی موجودیت به د هر سیسټم لپاره د تولید په نرخ پورې اړه ولري.
en-mt: In most clinical laboratories, highly automated systems will be capable of performing these tests, but their availability will depend on the cost of production for each system.

sourceString: For CLT a single specimen of peripheral blood is commonly used, although serial specimens can be used to follow the immune response.
targetString: د CLT لپاره د پردې د وینې یوه نمونه په عام ډول کارول کېږي ، که څه هم مسلسلې نمونې د معافیت سیستم د عکس العمل لپاره کارول کېږي.
en-mt: A single peripheral blood sample is commonly used for CLT, although serial samples are used for imaging of the immune system.

sourceString: For PoCT a single specimen of blood is usually obtained by skin puncture.
targetString: د PoCT لپاره، د وینې یوه نمونه په عموم ډول د پوست د سوري کولو له لارې اخیستل کېږي.
en-mt: For PoCT, a blood sample is usually taken through a skin prick.

sourceString: Unlike PCR methods an extraction step is not needed before assay.On March 26, 2020, the FDA named 29 entities that provided notification to the agency as required and are now therefore able to distribute their antibody tests.
targetString: د PCR میتود پر خلاف، مخکې له ټېسټ څخه د تخریج مرحله نه ده اړینه. د 2020 د مارچ  په 26، FDA نه ویشت شرکتونه ونومول چې د اړتیا سره سم یې ادارې ته خبرتیا چمتو کړې او اوس د دې وړتیا لري چې د دوی انټي باډي ازموینې توزیع کړي.
en-mt: Unlike the PCR method, no pre-test isolation step is required. On March 26, 2020, the FDA designated twenty-nine companies that have provided the agency with notice of the requirement and are now able to distribute their antibody tests.

sourceString: As of April 7, 2020, only a single test has been approved by the FDA under an emergency use authorization.In late March 2020, Euroimmun Medical Laboratory Diagnostics and Epitope Diagnostics received European approvals for their test kits, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.
targetString: د 2020 د اپریل تر 7مې پورې، د FDA له خوا د بېړنۍ استفادې د جواز له لارې یوازې یو ټېسټ تایید شوی و. د 2020 د مارچ په وروستیو کې ، د یورویمون طبي تشخصي لابراتوار او د ایپیټوپ تشخیصي لابراتوارونو د دوی د ټیسټ د آلو لپاره اروپایي تصویب ترلاسه کړ ، کوم چې کولی شي د وینې په نمونو کې د ویروس پروړاندې IgG او IgA انټي باډی تشخیص کړي.
en-mt: As of April 7, 2020, only one test has been approved by the FDA through emergency use authorization. In late March 2020, Euroimmune Medical Diagnostic Laboratories and Epitope Diagnostic Laboratories received European approval for their test kit, which can detect IgG and IgA antibodies against the virus in blood samples.

sourceString: The testing capacity is several hundred samples within hours and therefore much faster than the conventional PCR assay of viral RNA.
targetString: د ازموینې ظرفیت په ساعتونو کې څو سوه نمونې دي او له همدې امله د ویروسي RNA د PCR ټېسټ پرځای ډېر ګړندی دی.
en-mt: The test capacity is several hundred samples per hour and is therefore much faster than the PCR test for viral RNA.

sourceString: The antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the infection.In early April, the UK found none of the antibody test kits it purchased were sufficiently good to use.
targetString: په عموم ډول انټي باډي د مرض د ښکاره کېدو څخه 14 وروسته د تشخیص وړ وي. د اپریل په لومړیو کې، بریتانیا ومونده چې د دوی هېڅ یوه پېرل شوې تشخیصي آله مفیده نده.
en-mt: Antibodies are usually detectable 14 days after the onset of the disease. In early April, Britain found that none of the diagnostic equipment it had bought was useful.

sourceString: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay home, "emergency department will give a specimen tube to the patient", they spit into it, send it back and get a test result a while after.The British NHS has announced that it is piloting a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of a patient infecting others if they come to a hospital or having to disinfect an ambulance if one is used.In drive-through testing for COVID-19 for suspected cases, a healthcare professional takes sample using appropriate precautions.
targetString: هانګ کانګ یوه طرحه جوړه کړې چیرې چې شکمن ناروغان په کور کې پاتې کیدی شي ، "اضطراري څانګه به ناروغ ته د نمونې ټیوب ورکوي" ، دوی ورته توهين کوي ، بیرته یې لیږي او یو څه وروسته به د ازموینې پایله ترلاسه کړي. د بریتانیا NHS اعلان کړی چې دا په کور کې د شکمنو قضیو آزموینې لپاره یوه طرحه پرمخ وړي ، کوم چې د ناروغ خطر خطر لرې کوي که چیرې روغتون ته راځي یا د امبولانس بې کاره کول اړین وي. د مشکوکو قضیو لپاره د COVID-19 لپاره د ډرایو له لارې ازموینې ، د روغتیا پاملرنې متخصص د مناسب احتیاط څخه کار اخلي نمونه اخلي.
en-mt: Hong Kong has set up a scheme where suspected patients can stay at home, "the emergency department will give the patient a sample tube", they insult it, send it back and after a while they will get the test result. Britain's NHS has announced that it is running a scheme to test suspected cases at home, which removes the risk of the patient coming to hospital or needing to use an ambulance. For suspected cases of drive-through testing for COVID-19, a health care professional takes the sample using appropriate precautions.

sourceString: Drive-through centers have helped South Korea do some of the fastest, most-extensive testing of any country.In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on 2 March, that it had a capacity for about 12,000 tests per day in the ambulatory setting and 10.700 had been tested in the prior week.
targetString: د موټر د ننه تشخیصي مراکزو د جنوبي کوریا سره مرسته کړې ترڅو ټېسټونه یې د نورو هېوادونو په پرتله لا ګړندي او پراخه وي. په جرمني کې ، د قانوني روغتیا بیمې د فزیکپوهانو ملي اتحادیه د مارچ په 2 نیټه وویل چې دا د سیار تشخیص له لارې د شاوخوا 12،000 ټیسټونو ظرفیت لري او په تیره اونۍ کې 10.700 ټېسټونه اخیستل شوي وو.
en-mt: New car diagnostic centers have helped South Korea to conduct tests faster and more widely than other countries. In Germany, the National Association of Statutory Health Insurance Physicians said on March 2 that it has a capacity of about 12,000 tests through Planetary Diagnostics and that 10,700 tests were taken last week.

sourceString: Costs are borne by the health insurance when the test is ordered by a physician.
targetString: کله چې د ډېسټ غوښتنه د ډاکټر لخوا وشي نو لګښتونه د روغتیا بیمې لخوا ترسره کیږي.
en-mt: When the diet is requested by a doctor, the costs are covered by the health insurance.

sourceString: According to the president of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has an overall capacity for 160,000 tests per week.
targetString: د رابرټ کوچ انسټیټیوټ د مشر پر وینا، جرمني په یوه اونۍ کې د 160,000 ټېسټونو ظرفیت لري.
en-mt: According to the head of the Robert Koch Institute, Germany has a capacity of 160,000 tests per week.

sourceString: As of 19 March drive in tests were offered in several large cities.
targetString: د مارچ تر 19 پورې، په ګڼو لویو ښارونو کې د ټېسټ تر سره کول وړاندیز شول.
en-mt: By March 19, testing was proposed in several major cities.

sourceString: As of 26 March 2020 the total number of tests performed in Germany was unknown, because only positive results are reported.
targetString: د 2020 د مارچ تر 26 پورې د ترسره شویو ټېسټونو ټول تعداد نه و معلوم ځکه یواې د مثبتو پېښتو ارقام خپرېدل.
en-mt: As of March 26, 2020, the total number of tests conducted was not known because the number of positive cases was being released.

sourceString: A first lab survey revealed that as of calendar week 12/2020 a total of at least 483,295 samples were tested up to and including week 12/2020 and 33,491 samples (6.9%) tested positive for SARS-CoV-2.In Israel, researchers at Technion and Rambam Hospital developed and tested a method for testing samples from 64 patients simultaneously, by pooling the samples and only testing further if the combined sample is found to be positive.In Wuhan a makeshift 2000-sq-meter emergency detection laboratory named "Huo-Yan" (Chinese: 火眼, or "Fire Eye" in English) was opened on 5 February 2020 by BGI, which can process over 10,000 samples a day.
targetString: د لابراتوارونو لومړنۍ سروې وښودله چې د 2020/12 اونۍ پورې، ټول ټال لږ تر لږه 483,295 ټېسټونه تر سره شوي شوو او د همدې اونۍ په ګډون د 33,491 نمونو پېښې (6.9%) د SARS-CoV-2 وئروس لپاره مثبت وې.په اسرایل کې ، د ټکنین او رامبام روغتون څیړونکو په یوه وخت کې د 64 ناروغانو څخه د نمونو اد ټېسټ لپاره یو میتود رامنځ ته کړی او آزمویلی، چې د ګڼو نمونو د یوځایولو له لارې تر سره کېږي، او په یوځای شویو نمونو کې د مثبتې پېښې د شتون په صورت کې لا نور ټېسټونه هم ترسره کوي.  د 2020 د فبروري په 5مه، په ووهان کې د BGI له خوا د 2000 متر مربع په مساحت د بېړني تشخیص په موخه د هویان (په چینایي کې: 火眼 یا په انګلیسي کې د اور سترګه ) په نوم یو لابراتوار تاسیس شو  چې په ورځ کې به له 10,000 څخه ډېرې نمونې پروسېس کوي.
en-mt: A preliminary survey of laboratories showed that up to the week of 12/2020, a total of at least 483,295 tests had been carried out and, including that week, 33,491 cases (6.9%) were positive for the SARS-CoV-2 virus. In Israel, researchers at the Teknin and Rambam Hospitals have developed and tested a method for ED testing samples from 64 patients at a time, which is done by pooling multiple samples, and the pooled samples are positive. If there are cases, they also conduct further tests. On February 5, 2020, BGI established a 2,000-square-meter emergency diagnostic laboratory named Huayan (Chinese: 火眼 or English: Eye of Fire) in Wuhan. will process more than 10,000 samples.

sourceString: With the construction overseen by BGI-founder Wang Jian and taking 5-days, modelling has show cases in Hubei would have been 47% higher and the corresponding cost of the tackling the quarantine would have doubled if this testing capacity hadn't come on line.
targetString: د BGI  موسس وانګ جين لخوا د جوړونې څارنه او 5 ورځې وخت نیولو سره ، ماډلینګ ښیې چې په هوبي کې قضیې 47 % لوړې شوي وې او د قرنطین حل کولو اړوند لګښت به دوه چنده شوی وای که چیرې دا آزموینې ظرفیت په عین وخت کې نه وای راپورته شوی.
en-mt: Overseeing the build and taking 5 days by BGI founder Wang Jin, modeling shows that cases in Hubei would have increased by 47% and the cost associated with quarantine solutions would have doubled if the testing capacity had not been increased at the same time. It was raised.

sourceString: The Wuhan Laboratory has been promptly followed by Huo-Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing, and Shanghai, in a total of 12 cities across China.
targetString: د ووهان لابراتوار سمدلاسه د چین په ټولو 12 ښارونو کې په شینژین ، تیآنجن ، بیجینګ او شانګهای کې د هو یان لابراتوارونو څخه سمدلاسه تعقیب شوی.
en-mt: The Wuhan lab was immediately followed by Hu Yan labs in Shenzhen, Tianjin, Beijing and Shanghai in all 12 Chinese cities.

sourceString: By 4 March 2020 the daily throughput totals were 50,000 tests per day.Open source, multiplexed designs released by Origami Assays have been released that can test as many as 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 assays .  These balanced designs can be run in small laboratories without the need for robotic liquid handlers.
targetString: د 2020 د مارچ په 4مه د ټېسټونو ظرفیت 50,000 ټېسټونه په یوه ورځ کې و. خلاصه سرچینه ، د اوریګامي اسیس لخوا  سهم شوي ډیزاینونه خپاره شوي چې کولی شي یوازې د 93 ټېسټونو د کارولو سره د COVID19 لپاره تر 1122 پورې د ناروغ نمونې وازمایي.  دا متوازنې طرحې کېدای شي بغیر د ماشیني مایع نیوونکي له ضرورت څخه په کوچنیو لابراتوارونو کې ترسره شي.
en-mt: On March 4, 2020, the testing capacity was 50,000 tests per day. Open-source, shared designs by Origami Assays have been released that can test up to 1122 patient samples for COVID19 using only 93 tests. These balanced designs can be performed in small laboratories without the need for a mechanical liquid collector.

sourceString: By March, shortages and insufficient amounts of reagent has become a bottleneck for mass testing in the EU and UK and the US.
targetString: د مارچ په واسطه ، د معرف کموالي او ناکافي مقدار په اروپایی اتحادیې ، انګلستان او متحده ایالاتو کې د ډله ایزې ازموینې لپاره ستونزه کرځېدلې.
en-mt: By March, the shortage of identifiers and insufficient quantities for mass testing in the European Union, the United Kingdom and the United States became a problem.

sourceString: This has led some authors to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 minutes to release RNA genomes for further testing.On 31 March it was announced United Arab Emirates was now testing more of its population for Coronavirus per head than any other country, and was on track to scale up the level of testing to reach the bulk of the population.
targetString: ځینې لیکوالان دې ته اړ شوي چې د نمونې چمتو کولو هغه پروټوکولونه وپلټي چې د 5 دقیقو لپاره په 98 °C (208 °F) کې د تودوخې نمونې پکې شاملې وي ترڅو د نورو معاینو لپاره د RNA جینومونه خوشې کړي. د مارچ په 31 اعلان وشو چې متحده عربي امارات اوس د بل هر هیواد په پرتله د کوروناویروس لپاره د سړي په سر خپل ډیر نفوس معاینه کوي، او د خلکو د معاینې کولو هغې کچې ته رسیدلي دي چې خپل ډیر نفوس یې معاینه کړی دی.
en-mt: Some authors have been led to explore sample preparation protocols that involve heating samples at 98 °C (208 °F) for 5 min to release RNA genomes for further analysis. On March 31, it was announced that the United Arab Emirates is now testing more of its population per capita for the coronavirus than any other country, and has reached the point where it has tested more of its population.

sourceString: This was through a combination of drive-through capability, and purchasing a population-scale mass-throughput laboratory from Group 42 and BGI (based on their "Huo-Yan" emergency detection laboratories in China).
targetString: دا د ناروغ له ځای څخه د وړتیا، او د 42 او BGI ګروپ څخه د نفوس په کچه د ډله ایزې معاینې لابراتوار پیرودلو ترکیب له لارې وو (په چین کې دد وی "هو - یان" بېړنۍ موندنې لابراتوارونو پراساس).
en-mt: This was through a combination of capacity from the patient site, and the purchase of a population-based mass screening laboratory from the 42 and BGI Group (based on the Wei "Hu-Yan" Rapid Detection Laboratories in China).

sourceString: Constructed in 14 days, the lab is capable of conducting tens of thousands RT-PCR tests per day and is the first in the world of this scale to be operational outside of China.
targetString: په 14 ورځو کې رامینځته شوی لابراتوار هره ورځ د لسګونو زره RT-PCR معاینو ترسره کولو وړتیا لري او پدغه کچه د معاینو په ترسره کولو کې د نړۍ په کچه لومړنی لابراتوار دی چې له چین څخه بهر فعالیت کوي.
en-mt: The laboratory established in 14 days is capable of performing tens of thousands of RT-PCR tests per day and is the first laboratory in the world to perform such tests outside of China.

sourceString: Different testing recipes targeting different parts of the coronavirus genetic profile were developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan, and the United States.
targetString: د کورونا ویروس جنیټیک پروفایل د بیلابیلو برخو په نښه کول او د معاینې بیلابیلو کړنلارو ترسره کول په چین، فرانسې، جرمني، هانګ کانګ، جاپان او متحده آیالتونو کې رامینځته شول.
en-mt: Targeting different parts of the genetic profile of the coronavirus and performing different testing procedures have been developed in China, France, Germany, Hong Kong, Japan and the United States.

sourceString: The World Health Organization adopted the German recipe for manufacturing kits sent to low-income countries without the resources to develop their own.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان د کیټونو تولیدولو لپاره هغو هیوادونو ته چې کم عاید لري او سرچینې هم نلري د آلمان کړنلاره ولیږله تر څو ځانته کیټونه تولید کړي.
en-mt: The World Health Organization has sent the German procedure to countries that have low incomes and lack the resources to produce their own kits.

sourceString: The German recipe was published on 17 January 2020; the protocol developed by the United States Centers for Disease Control was not available until 28 January, delaying available tests in the U.S.China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and these countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to satisfy demand and recommendations for testing by health experts.
targetString: د جرمني کړنلاره په 17 جنوري 2020 خپاره شوه؛ د ناروغۍ کنټرول لپاره د متحده آیالتونو مرکزونو لخوا رامینځته شوی پروټوکول د جنوري تر 28 پورې جوړ نه شو، چې په متحده آیالتونو کې یې موجودې معاینې وځنډولې. چین او متحده آیالتونو د وبا په پیل کې د معاینې کیټونو له اعتبار سره ستونزې درلودې، او دغه هیوادونه او آسټرالیا پدې ونه توانیدل چې کافي کیټونه چمتو کړي تر څو د روغتیا کارپوهانو لخوا د معاینو د ترسره کولو غوښتنې او وړاندیزونو پوره کړي.
en-mt: The German procedure was published on 17 January 2020; The protocol established by the US Centers for Disease Control was not put in place until January 28, delaying the testing available in the US. China and the United States had problems with the reliability of test kits early in the outbreak, and those countries and Australia were unable to supply enough kits to meet the demands and recommendations from health experts for testing.

sourceString: In contrast, experts say South Korea's broad availability of testing helped reduce the spread of the novel coronavirus.
targetString: برعکس، متخصصین وايي چې په سویلي کوریا کې د معاینې پراخو امکاناتو شتون د نوي کوروناویروس د خپریدو په کموالي کې مرسته کړې ده.
en-mt: On the contrary, experts say that the availability of extensive testing facilities in South Korea has helped to reduce the spread of the new coronavirus.

sourceString: Testing capacity, largely in private sector labs, was built up over several years by the South Korean government.
targetString: د سویلي کوریا حکومت لخوا د خصوصي سکتور په لابراتوارونو کې په لویه کچه د معایناتو ظرفیت د څو کلونو په موده کې جوړ شوی وو.
en-mt: Large-scale testing capacity in private sector laboratories was built by the South Korean government over a period of several years.

sourceString: On 16 March, the World Health Organization called for ramping up the testing programmes as the best way to slow the advance of COVID-19 pandemic.High demand for testing due to wide spread of the virus caused backlogs of hundreds of thousands of tests at private U.S. labs, and supplies of swabs and chemical reagents became strained.
targetString: د مارچ په 16، د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان غوښتنه وکړه چې د معاینې پروګرامونه دې ګړندۍ شي چې د COVID-19 وبا د پراختیا ورو کولو لپاره ترټولو غوره لاره ده. د ویروس د پراختیا له امله د معاینو ترسره کولو لوړې غوښتنې د متحده آیالتونو په خصوصي لابراتوارونو کې د سلګونو زره معاینو د راټولیدو لامل شوي، او د سووبز او کیمیاوي موادو اکمالات سخت شوي دي.
en-mt: On March 16, the World Health Organization urged that screening programs be stepped up as the best way to slow the spread of the COVID-19 pandemic. The high demand for testing due to the spread of the virus has led to a backlog of hundreds of thousands of tests at private laboratories in the United States, and supplies of swabs and chemicals have been strained.

sourceString: In March 2020 China reported problems with accuracy in their test kits.
targetString: په مارچ 2020، چین ددوی د معاینو په کیټونو کې د دقت د ستونزې راپور ورکړ.
en-mt: In March 2020, China reported an accuracy problem with its test kits.

sourceString: In the United States, the test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws;" the government then removed the bureaucratic barriers that had prevented private testing.Spain purchased test kits from Chinese firm  Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co Ltd, but found that results were inaccurate.
targetString: په متحده آیالتونو کې، د سي ډي سي لخوا رامینځته شوو ټیسټ کیټونو "نیمګړتیاوې" درلودې چې له هغې وروسته حکومت بیا هغه بیروکراټیک خنډونه لرې کړل چې د خصوصي لابراتوارونو لخوا یې د معاینو د ترسره کولو مخه نیولې وه. هسپانیې د چینايي شرکت شینژین بایوایزي بایوټیکنالوژۍ شرکت څخه د معاینې کیټونه وپیرودل، مګر وروسته وموندل شوه چې پایلې یې سمې نه دي.
en-mt: In the United States, test kits developed by the CDC had "flaws" after which the government removed bureaucratic barriers that prevented private laboratories from performing the tests. Spain bought test kits from the Chinese company Shenzhen Bioeasy Biotechnology Co., but later found that the results were not accurate.

sourceString: The firm explained that the incorrect results may be a result of a failure to collect samples or use the kits correctly.
targetString: شرکت په ځواب کې وویل چې غلطې پایلې ښايي د نمونو په راټولولو کې د ستونزې یا د کیټونو د ناسمې کارونې له امله وي.
en-mt: The company responded that the false results could be due to problems in collecting the samples or improper use of the kits.

sourceString: The Spanish ministry said it will withdraw the kits that returned incorrect results, and would replace them with a different testing kit provided by Shenzhen Bioeasy.80% of test kits the Czech Republic purchased from China gave wrong results.Slovakia purchased 1.2 million test kits from China which were found to be inaccurate.
targetString: د هسپانیې وزارت وویل چې دوی به هغه کیټونه بیرته ستانه کړي چې ناسمې پایلې یې درلودې، او پر ځای به یې د شینژن بایوایزي شرکت څخه د معاینې متفاوت کیټونه ترلاسه کړي.د چک جمهوریت چې له چین څخه کوم ټیسټ کیټونه پیرودلي، په هغوی کې 80% کیټونو غلطې پایلې ورکوي. سلواکیا له چین څخه 1.2 میلیونه ټیسټ کیټونه وپیرودل چې وروسته یې پایلې غلطې وموندل شوې.
en-mt: The Spanish ministry said it would return the kits that gave false results, and instead get different test kits from Shenzhen Bioeasy. 80% of kits give wrong results. Slovakia bought 1.2 million test kits from China, after which the results were found to be incorrect.

sourceString: Prime Minister Matovič suggested these be dumped into the Danube.Ateş Kara of the Turkish Health Ministry said the test kits Turkey purchased from China had a "high error rate" and did not "put them into use."The UK purchased 3.5 million test kits from China but in early April 2020 announced these were not usable.
targetString: لومړي وزیر ماتیوس وړاندیز وکړ چې دا باید په ډانیوب بدل شي. د ترکیې د روغتیا وزارت څخه آتیش کارا وویل چې د ترکیې لخوا له چین څخه په پیرودل شوو ټیسټ کیټونو کې په "لوړې کچې غلطۍ" شتون لري او "له هغوی څخه یې کار" نه دی اخیستی.انګلستان له چین څخه 3.5 میلیونه ټیسټ کیټونه وپیرودل مګر د اپریل 2020 په پیل کې یې اعلان وکړ چې پيرودل شوي کیټونه د کارولو وړ نه دي.
en-mt: Prime Minister Mathews suggested that it should be changed to the Danube. Atish Kara from the Turkish Ministry of Health said that there were "high levels of errors" in the test kits bought by Turkey from China and that it had not "used them". The UK bought 3.5 million test kits from China. Purchased but announced in early April 2020 that purchased kits are unusable.

sourceString: Testing, followed with quarantine of those who tested positive and tracing of those with whom the SARS-CoV-2 positive people had had contact, resulted in positive outcomes.
targetString: هغه معاینې چې پایلې یې مثبت دي، ناروغان یې قرنطین شول او هغه کسان تعقیب شول چې د SARS-CoV-2 مثبتو پایلو درلودونکو کسانو سره یې تماس درلود، د پایلو نتیجې یې مثبتې دي.
en-mt: Those who tested positive were quarantined and those who had contact with those who tested positive for SARS-CoV-2 were followed up.

sourceString: Researchers working in the Italian town of Vò, the site of the first COVID-19 death in Italy, conducted two rounds of testing on the entire population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.
targetString: هغه څیړونکي چې د ایټالیا په Vò ښار کې کار کوي، چې په ایټالیا کې د COVID-19 د لومړۍ مړینې سیمه ده، د شاوخوا لس ورځو په واټن سره یې د ټول نفوس چې شاوخوا 3,400 خلک دي دوه ځلې معاینې ترسره کړې.
en-mt: Researchers working in the Italian city of Vò, the region with the first COVID-19 deaths in Italy, conducted two tests of the total population of about 3,400 people, about ten days apart.

sourceString: About half the people testing positive had no symptoms, and all discovered cases were quarantined.
targetString: نږدې نیمایي خلکو چې معاینه یې مثبته وه هیڅ نښې نه درلودې، او ټول کشف شوي ناروغان قرنطین شول.
en-mt: About half of the people who tested positive had no symptoms, and all detected patients were quarantined.

sourceString: With travel to the commune restricted, this eliminated new infections completely.
targetString: ټولنې ته د محدود سفر لامله، نوې ناروغۍ په بشپړ ډول له منځه ولاړې.
en-mt: Due to limited travel to the community, new diseases are completely eliminated.

sourceString: With aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, the 2020 coronavirus pandemic in Singapore has proceeded much more slowly than in other developed countries, but without extreme restrictions like forced closure of restaurants and retail establishments.
targetString: د ناڅاپي تماس په تعقیب، د داخلي سفرونو په محدودیت، معاینو، او قرنطین کولو سره، په سنګاپور کې د 2020 کوروناویروس ناروغي د نورو پرمختللو هیوادونو په پرتله خورا ډیر ورو پرمخ ځي، او په رسټورانټونو او پرچون پلورنځیو باندې د جبري بندولو په څیر جدي محدودیتونه هم نشته.
en-mt: Following casual contact, with restrictions on inbound travel, testing, and quarantine, the 2020 coronavirus outbreak in Singapore is progressing much more slowly than in other developed countries, and with forced closures of restaurants and retail outlets. There are no serious restrictions.

sourceString: Many events have been cancelled, and Singapore did start advising residents to stay at home on 28 March, but schools reopened on time after holiday break on 23 March.
targetString: ډیری مراسم لغوه شول، او سینګاپور خلکو ته تر 28 مارچ پورې په کورونو کې د پاتې کیدو مشوره ورکړه، مګر ښوونځي د 23 مارچ له رخصتۍ څخه وروسته پر وخت بیرته پرانیستل شول.
en-mt: Many events were cancelled, and Singapore advised people to stay at home until March 28, but schools reopened on time after the March 23 holiday.

sourceString: Several other countries have also managed the pandemic with aggressive contact tracing, inbound travel restrictions, testing, and quarantining, but with less aggressive lock-downs, such as Iceland and South Korea.
targetString: د آیسلینډ او سویلي کوریا په څیر یو شمیر نورو هیوادونو هم د ناڅاپي تماس تعقیب، د داخلي سفرونو محدودیتونو، معاینو، او قرنطین کولو سره دغه ناروغي مدیریت کړه، مګر د لاک ډاون یا ګرځبندیز کچه پکې کمه وه.
en-mt: A number of other countries, such as Iceland and South Korea, have also managed the outbreak with random contact tracing, internal travel restrictions, testing, and quarantine, but the level of lockdowns or travel bans has been low.

sourceString: A statistical study has found that countries that have tested more, relative to the number of deaths, have much lower case fatality rates, probably because these countries are better able to detect those with only mild or no symptoms.
targetString: یوې احصائیې مطالعې موندلې چې د مړینو شمیر په تړاو، په هغو هیوادونو کې د مړینې کچه خورا ټیټه ده چې ډیرې معاینې یې ترسره کړي دي، ښايي لامل یې دا وي چې دغه هیوادونه ددې ښه وړتیا ولري تر څو هغه کسان وپیژني چې یوازې لږ یا هیڅ نښې نلري.
en-mt: A statistical study found that, relative to the number of deaths, death rates were much lower in countries that conducted more screening, possibly because these countries were better able to identify those who had only a few or There are no symptoms.

sourceString: WHO recommends that countries that do not have testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience on COVID-19 send their first five positives and the first ten negative COVID-19 samples to one of the 16 WHO reference laboratories for confirmatory testing.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان سپارښت کوي چې هغه هیوادونه چې د معاینې ظرفیت نلري او ملي لابراتوارونه یې د COVID-19 په برخه کې محدوده تجربه لري خپلې لومړنۍ پنځه مثبتې او لومړنۍ لس منفي COVID-19 نمونې دې د معاینې تایید لپاره د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان د مراجعې 16 لابراتوارونو ته واستوي.
en-mt: The World Health Organization recommends that countries with no testing capacity and national laboratories with limited experience in the field of COVID-19 send their first five positive and first ten negative COVID-19 samples to the World Health Organization for test confirmation. Send clients to 16 laboratories.

sourceString: Out of the 16 reference laboratories, 7 are in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.
targetString: د مراجعې 16 لابراتوارونو څخه یې 7 په آسیا کې، 5 په اروپا کې، 2 په افریقا، 1 په شمالي امریکا او 1 په آسټرالیا کې میشت دي.
en-mt: Of the 16 client laboratories, 7 are located in Asia, 5 in Europe, 2 in Africa, 1 in North America and 1 in Australia.

sourceString: In the following chart, the column “Positive as % of tests” is influenced by the country's testing policy.
targetString: په لاندې چارټ کې، کالم "د معاینې د%  په توګه مثبت" کالم د هیواد د معاینې پالیسۍ څخه اغیزمن دی.
en-mt: In the chart below, the column "Positive as % of Inspections" is influenced by the country's inspection policy.

sourceString: A country that only tests people admitted to hospitals will have a higher positive as % of tests than a country that tests all citizens, whether or not they are showing symptoms, other things being equal.
targetString: یو هیواد چې یوازې روغتونونو ته د مراجعه کوونکو خلکو معاینه کوي د هغه هیواد په پرتله چې د ټولو وګړو معاینه ترسره کوي د معاینو مثبته % یې لوړه ده، که چیرې یې خلک نښې نښانې لري یا نه، خو نور شیان یې مساوي دي.
en-mt: A country that only tests people visiting hospitals has a higher % of positive tests than a country that tests the entire population, whether people have symptoms or not, other things being equal.

sourceString: Hand washing (or handwashing), also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning one's hands for the purpose of removing soil, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.
targetString: د لاسونو مینځل، چې د لاسونو حفظ الصحې په نوم هم پیژندل کیږي، د خاورو، غوړو، مایکرو ارګانیزمونو یا نورو ناغوښتل شوو موادو پاکولو لپاره د خپلو لاسونو د پاکولو عمل دی.
en-mt: Hand washing, also known as hand hygiene, is the act of cleaning your hands to remove dirt, grease, microorganisms, or other unwanted substances.

sourceString: Hand washing with soap consistently at certain "critical moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example diarrhoea and cholera, which are transmitted through fecal–oral route.
targetString: د ورځې په جریان کې په "مهمو شیبو" کې په دوامداره توګه د صابون سره د لاسونو مینځل د ډیرو ناروغیو د خپریدو مخه نیسي، د بیلګې په توګه، اسهال او هيضه، چې دغه ناروغۍ د غایطو موادو په واسطه له لاسونو څخه خولې ته لیږدول کیږي.
en-mt: Frequent hand washing with soap at "important moments" during the day prevents the spread of many diseases, for example, diarrhea and cholera, which are spread from hand to mouth through faecal matter. is transferred.

sourceString: People can also become infected with respiratory diseases such as influenza or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, or mouth (i.e., mucous membranes).
targetString: خلک کیدلی شي په تنفسي ناروغیو لکه انفلونزا یا عام زکام په څیر ناروغیو باندې هم اخته شي، د بیلګې په توګه، که چیرې دوی د خپلو سترګو، پوزې او خولې سره له لاس لګولو څخه وړاندې خپل لاسونه ونه مینځي (لکه، مخاطي غشا).
en-mt: People can also contract respiratory illnesses such as the flu or the common cold, for example, if they do not wash their hands before touching their eyes, nose, and mouth (ie, mucous membranes). .

sourceString: The five critical moments during the day where washing hands with soap is important include: before and after defecation, after cleaning a child's bottom or changing nappies, before feeding a child, before eating and before and after preparing food or handling raw meat, fish, or poultry.
targetString: په ورځ کې پنځه هغه حساس وختونه چې پر مهال یې د صابون سره د لاسونو مینځل مهم دي په لاندې ډول دي: د حاجت رفع کولو څخه وړاندې او وروسته، د ماشوم لاندې برخې پاکولو یا د پمپر بدلولو څخه وروسته، د ماشوم تغذیې څخه وړاندې، د خوراک څخه مخکې او د خواړو چمتو کولو څخه وړاندې او وروسته یا د خامې غوښې، کب، یا چرګانو لمس کولو څخه وروسته.
en-mt: The five critical times of the day when it is important to wash your hands with soap are as follows: Before and after defecating, after cleaning the baby's bottom or changing the pumper, before feeding the baby. , before eating and before and after food preparation or after touching raw meat, fish, or poultry.

sourceString: If water and soap are not available, hands can be cleaned with ash.The World Health Organization recommends washing hands:
targetString: که چیرې اوبه او صابون شتون ونلري، لاسونه په ایرو سره هم مینځل کیدای شي. د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان په لاندې حالتونو کې د لاسونو مینځلو وړاندیز کوي:
en-mt: If soap and water are not available, hands can also be washed with ash. The World Health Organization recommends hand washing in the following situations:

sourceString: Before, during, and after preparing food.
targetString: د خواړو چمتو کولو څخه وړاندې، پر مهال او له هغې څخه وروسته.
en-mt: Before, during and after food preparation.

sourceString: Before and after caring for a sick person.
targetString: د ناروغ پاملرنې څخه وړاندې او وروسته.
en-mt: Before and after patient care.

sourceString: After changing the diapers or cleaning up a child who has used the toilet.
targetString: د ډایپرونو بدلولو یا د هغو ماشومانو پاکولو څخه وروسته چې حاجت یې رفع کړی وي.
en-mt: After changing diapers or cleaning babies who have defecated.

sourceString: After blowing your nose, coughing or sneezing.
targetString: د پوزې سوڼولو، ټوخي یا پرنجي څخه وروسته.
en-mt: After a runny nose, cough or sneeze.

sourceString: After touching animal, animal feed, or animal waste.
targetString: د څارویو، د څارویو خواړو، یا د څارویو ضایعاتو سره د لاس لګولو څخه وروسته.
en-mt: After contact with animals, animal feed, or animal waste.

sourceString: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene practices related to medical procedures.
targetString: د لاسونو طبي حفظ الصحه په طبي طرزالعملونو پورې اړوند د حفظ الصحې عاداتونو ته اشاره کوي.
en-mt: Medical hand hygiene refers to hygiene habits related to medical procedures.

sourceString: Hand washing before administering medicine or medical care can prevent or minimize the spread of disease.
targetString: د درملو تنظیمولو یا طبي پاملرنې څخه وړاندې د لاس مینځل کولی شي د ناروغۍ خپریدو مخه ونیسي یا یې خپرول کم کړي.
en-mt: Hand washing before administering medication or providing medical care can prevent or reduce the spread of disease.

sourceString: The main medical purpose of washing hands is to cleanse the hands of pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals which can cause harm or diseases.
targetString: د لاسونو مینځلو اصلي روغتیايي موخه د پتوجینونو (باکټریا، ویروس، یا نورو مایکروارګانیزمونو څخه چې د ناروغۍ لامل کیدی شي) او کیمیاوي توکو څخه د لاسونو پاکول دي چې کیدلی شي د زیان یا ناروغیو لامل شي.
en-mt: The primary health purpose of handwashing is to remove pathogens (bacteria, viruses, or other microorganisms that can cause disease) and chemicals that can cause harm or disease.

sourceString: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but also an important practice for the general public.
targetString: دغه کار په ځانګړې توګه د هغو خلکو لپاره اړین دی چې خواړو سره لاس لګوي یا په طبي برخه کې کار کوي، بلکې د ټولو خلکو لپاره یو مهم عمل دی.
en-mt: This is especially important for people who handle food or work in the medical field, but it is an important practice for all people.

sourceString: Hand washing has many health benefits, including minimizing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; preventing infectious causes of diarrhea; decreasing respiratory infections;
targetString: د لاس مینځل ډیرې روغتیايي ګټې لري، لکه د انفلونزا، کوروناویروس، او د نورو ساري ناروغیو د خپریدو کموالی؛ د اسهال د ساري علتونو مخنیوی؛ د تنفسي ناروغیو کموالی؛
en-mt: Hand washing has many health benefits, such as reducing the spread of influenza, coronavirus, and other infectious diseases; Prevention of infectious causes of diarrhea; Reduction of respiratory diseases;

sourceString: and reducing infant mortality rate at home birth deliveries.
targetString: او په کورونو کې د زیږون په وخت کې د ماشومانو د مړینې کچه راټیټول.
en-mt: and reducing infant mortality during home births.

sourceString: A 2013 study showed that improved hand washing practices may lead to small improvements in the length growth in children under five years of age.
targetString: د 2013 کال یوې څیړنې ښودلې چې د لاس مینځلو اصلاح شوي عادتونه ښايي د پنځه کلونو څخه کم عمر لرونکو ماشومانو کې د قد وده کې د کوچنیو پرمختګونو لامل شي.
en-mt: A 2013 study showed that improved hand-washing habits may lead to small improvements in height growth in children under the age of five.

sourceString: In developing countries, childhood mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple behavioral changes, such as hand washing with soap.
targetString: په مخ پر ودې هیوادونو کې، په تنفسي او اسهال ناروغیو پورې اړوند د ماشومانو مړینې کچه د ساده عادتونو د بدلونونو په معرفي کولو سره کمیدلی شي، لکه له صابون سره د لاسونو مینځل.
en-mt: In developing countries, child mortality rates related to respiratory and diarrheal diseases can be reduced by introducing simple habit changes, such as hand washing with soap.

sourceString: This simple action can reduce the rate of mortality from these diseases by almost 50%.
targetString: دغه ساده عمل له دغو ناروغیو څخه د مړینې په کچې کې شاوخوا 50% کموالی رامنځته کولی شي.
en-mt: This simple act can reduce the death rate from these diseases by about 50%.

sourceString: Interventions that promote hand washing can reduce diarrhoea episodes by about a third, and this is comparable to providing clean water in low income areas.
targetString: هغه لارې چارې چې د لاسونو مینځل ترویجوي کولی شي د اسهال قضیې نږدې درې برخې راټیټې کړي، او دا په ټیټ عاید لرونکو سیمو کې د پاکو اوبو چمتو کولو سره تړاو لري.
en-mt: Approaches that promote handwashing can reduce diarrheal cases by nearly three-quarters, and this has been linked to the provision of clean water in low-income areas.

sourceString: 48% of reductions in diarrhoea episodes can be associated with hand washing with soap.Hand washing with soap is the single most effective and inexpensive way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), as automatic behavior performed in homes, schools, and communities worldwide.
targetString: د اسهال په پیښو کې 48% کمښت له صابون سره د لاسونو مینځلو سره تړاو درلودلی شي. له صابون سره د لاسونو مینځل د اسهال او حاد تنفسي انتاناتو (ARI) مخنیوي لپاره یوازینۍ اغیزمنه او ارزانه طریقه ده، که چیرې په ټوله نړۍ کې په کورونو، ښوونځیو او ټولنو کې په اتومات ډول دغه عمل ترسره شي.
en-mt: A 48% reduction in the incidence of diarrhea can be attributed to handwashing with soap. Handwashing with soap is the only effective and cost-effective way to prevent diarrhea and acute respiratory infections (ARI), if it is automated in homes, schools and communities worldwide.

sourceString: Pneumonia, a major ARI, is the number one cause of mortality among children under five years old, taking the lives of an estimated 1.8 million children per year.
targetString: نمونیا چې د ARI لویه برخه ده، د پنځه کلونو څخه د کم عمر لرونکو ماشومانو تر منځ د مړینې لومړنی لامل دی، چې په کال کې د شاوخوا 1.8 میلیونه ماشومانو ژوند اخلي.
en-mt: Pneumonia, a major cause of ARI, is the leading cause of death among children under the age of five, killing approximately 1.8 million children annually.

sourceString: Diarrhea and pneumonia together account for almost 3.5 million child deaths annually.
