targetString: همدارنګه، په پلانونو کې هغه کنټرولیز اقدامات په ګوته کیږي تر څو هغو خطرونو ته رسېدنه وکړي او د حالاتو لپاره احتمالي پلانونه وړاندې کړي چې ښایي د ناروغۍ د خپرېدو په پایله کې رامنځته شي.
en-mt: Also, the plans identify control measures to address the risks and provide contingency plans for situations that may arise as a result of disease outbreaks.

sourceString: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may be subject to national or subnational recommendations.
targetString: د ساري ناروغیو پر وړاندې د چمتووالي او غبرګونه پلانونه ښایي ملي او سیمه‌ییزو سپارښتنو ته اړتیا ولري.
en-mt: Infectious disease preparedness and response plans may require national and regional recommendations.

sourceString: Objectives for response to an outbreak include reducing transmission among staff, protecting people who are at higher risk for adverse health complications, maintaining business operations, and minimizing adverse effects on other entities in their supply chains.
targetString: د یوې ساري ناروغۍ خپرېدنې ته د غبرګون موخې د کارکوونکو تر منځ د ناروغۍ د لېږد کچه راکمول، د هغو خلکو ژغورل چې د ډېر پېچلي روغتیایي وضعیت خطر پکې وي، د کاري فعالیتونو دوام، او د فعالیتونو په اکمال/عرضې ځنځیر کې نورو ادارو باندې د اړخیزو اغېزو راکمول دي.
en-mt: The goals of responding to an outbreak are to reduce the transmission of disease among workers, to protect people at risk of serious health conditions, to maintain business operations, and to facilitate the operation of other entities in the supply chain. Reducing the side effects.

sourceString: The disease severity in the community where the business is located affects the responses taken.
targetString: په هغې ټولنه کې د ناروغۍ شدت چې سوداګریز فعالیتونه پکې ترسره کیږي، ترسره کېدونکي غبرګونونه اغېزمنوي.
en-mt: The severity of the disease in the community in which business activities are conducted affects the responses that are made.

sourceString: The hierarchy of hazard controls is a framework widely used in occupational safety and health to group hazard controls by effectiveness.
targetString: د خطر د کنټرول د اقداماتو د مراتبو لړۍ هغه چارچوب دی، چې په پراخه کچه په کاري خوندیتوب او روغتیا کې د اغېزمنتیا په ترڅ کې د خطرونو کنټرول اقداماتو د طبقه بندۍ لپاره کارول کیږي.
en-mt: The hierarchy of risk control measures is a widely used framework for classifying risk control measures in terms of effectiveness in occupational safety and health.

sourceString: Where COVID-19 hazards cannot be eliminated, the most effective controls are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and lastly personal protective equipment.
targetString: هغو ځایونو کې چې د کووېډ-19 خطرونو د له منځه وړلو امکان نه وي، د کنټرول تر ټولو اغېزمن اقدامات له انجینري کنټرولونو، ورپسې اداري کنټرولونه او په پای کې د شخصي خوندیتابه تجهیزاتو څخه عبات دي.
en-mt: In locations where the risk of COVID-19 cannot be eliminated, the most effective control measures are engineering controls, followed by administrative controls, and finally personal protective equipment.

sourceString: Engineering controls involve isolating employees from work-related hazards without relying on worker behavior, and can be the most cost-effective solution to implement.
targetString: انجینري کنټرولونه، د کارکوونکي پر کړو وړو له تکیې پرته، د کار اړونده خطرونو څخه د کارکوونکو جلاکول دي، او ښایي د دې کار د تطبیق لپاره تر ټولو کم لګښت لرونکې حلاره وي.
en-mt: Engineering controls, with little reliance on workers, isolate workers from work-related hazards, and may be the least expensive way to implement this.

sourceString: Administrative controls are changes in work policy or procedures that require action by the worker or employer.
targetString: اداري کنټرولونه د کار پالیسۍ یا کړنلارو کې هغه بدلونونه دي چې د کارکوونکي او اداره کوونکي له لوري پرې عمل ته اړتیا لیدل کیږي.
en-mt: Administrative controls are changes in work policies or procedures that are required to be implemented by the employee or manager.

sourceString: Personal protective equipment (PPE) is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can help prevent some exposures.

en-mt: Personal protective equipment is considered less effective than engineering and administrative controls, but can sometimes help prevent disease.

sourceString: All types of PPE must be selected based upon the hazard to the worker, properly fitted as applicable (e.g., respirators), consistently and properly worn, regularly inspected, maintained, and replaced, as necessary, and properly removed, cleaned, and stored or disposed of to avoid contamination.
targetString: د شخصي خوندیتابه ټول ډولونه باید کارکوونکي ته د متوجه خطر پر بنسټ وټاکل شي، په سمه توګه نصب شي (لکه، تنفسي الې)، په دوامداره او سمه توګه واغوستل شي، په منظمه توګه وڅېړل شي، وساتل شي، او د اړتیا په صورت کې بدل شي، او د ککړتیا د مخنیوي لپاره باید په سمه توګه لرې، پاک او وساتل شي یا له منځه وېوړل شي.
en-mt: All types of personal protective equipment must be selected based on the risk posed to the worker, properly fitted (eg, respirators), worn consistently and correctly, regularly inspected, maintained, and, as necessary, changed into, and must be properly removed, cleaned and stored or destroyed to prevent contamination.

sourceString: According to the U.S. Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA), lower exposure risk jobs have minimal occupational contact with the public and other coworkers.

en-mt: The US Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) states that low-risk jobs involve less contact with people and co-workers.

sourceString: Basic infection prevention measures recommended for all workplaces include frequent and thorough hand washing, encouraging workers to stay home if they are sick, respiratory etiquette including covering coughs and sneezes, providing tissues and trash receptacles, preparing for telecommuting or staggered shifts if needed, discouraging workers from using others' tools and equipment, and maintaining routine cleaning and disinfecting of the work environment.

en-mt: The basic measures to prevent the spread of the disease, which are recommended for all workplaces, are washing hands several times and thoroughly, telling employees to stay home if they are sick, covering their coughs and sneezes, and breathing. By taking measures to prevent the transmission of disease, providing containers for paper towels and used materials, preparing to take telephone calls or changing shifts if necessary, preventing employees from using other tools and equipment, And it includes keeping the work environment clean and disinfected on a daily basis.

sourceString: Prompt identification and isolation of potentially infectious individuals is a critical step in protecting workers, customers, visitors, and others at a worksite.
targetString: د کارکوونکو، پېرېدونکو، کتونکو، او په کارځای کې د نورو د خوندیتوب په برخه کې تر ټولو مهم ګام پر ناروغۍ د ممکنه اخته کسانو چټکه پېژندنه او جلا کول.
en-mt: The most important step in the safety of employees, customers, observers, and others in the workplace is the rapid identification and isolation of those who may be infected.

sourceString: The U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that employees who have symptoms of acute respiratory illness are to stay home until they are free of fever, signs of a fever, and any other symptoms for at least 24 hours without the use of fever-reducing or other symptom-altering medicines, and that sick leave policies are flexible, permit employees to stay home to care for a sick family member, and that employees are aware of these policies.

en-mt: The US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends that workers with symptoms of acute respiratory illness should stay home until the fever is controlled by antipyretics or antipyretics. With the use of medicine, the fever will disappear, and other symptoms will disappear for at least 24 hours. Leave policies should be flexible, employees should be allowed to care for sick members at home, and that employees are aware of these policies.

sourceString: According to OSHA, medium exposure risk jobs include those that require frequent or close contact within six feet (1.8 m) of people who are not known or suspected COVID-19 patients, but may be infected with SARS-CoV-2 due to ongoing community transmission around the business location, or because the individual has recent international travel to a location with widespread COVID-19 transmission.

Uncut, within 6 feet (1.8 m) of close or intimate contact, but may be exposed to SARS-CoV-2 through community transmission around workplaces, or Because of this, this person has recently traveled internationally to a place where Covid-19 has spread widely.

sourceString: These include workers who have contact with the general public such as in schools, high-population-density work environments, and some high-volume retail settings.Engineering controls for this and higher risk groups include installing high-efficiency air filters, increasing ventilation rates, installing physical barriers such as clear plastic sneeze guards, and installing a drive-through window for customer service.Administrative controls for this and higher risk groups include encouraging sick workers to stay at home, replacing face-to-face meetings with virtual communications, establishing staggered shifts, discontinuing nonessential travel to locations with ongoing COVID-19 outbreaks, developing emergency communications plans including a forum for answering workers’ concerns, providing workers with up-to-date education and training on COVID-19 risk factors and protective behaviors, training workers who need to use protecting clothing and equipment how to use it, providing resources and a work environment that promotes personal hygiene, requiring regular hand washing, limiting customers' and the public's access to the worksite, and posting signage about hand washing and other COVID-19 protective measures.Depending on the work task, workers with at least medium exposure risk may need to wear personal protective equipment including some combination of gloves, a gown, a face shield or face mask, or goggles.

For this and high risk groups, engineering controls, installation of effective air filters, increasing the number of ventilators, installation of physical barriers such as clear plastic screens, provision of quick service by customer service car/motorcycle. Providing training on how to use protective clothing and equipment, providing resources and a work environment that includes personal hygiene, frequent hand washing, limiting access to the workplace by customers and the public, and This includes washing and putting up posters on other safety measures against Covid-19. sourceString: If a person becomes sick on an airplane, proper controls to protect workers and other passengers include separating the sick person from others by a distance of 6 feet, designating one crew member to serve the sick person, and offering a face mask to the sick person or asking the sick person to cover their mouth and nose with tissues when coughing or sneezing.

en-mt: If someone is sick on board, appropriate controls for the safety of staff and other passengers, such as keeping a 6-foot distance from other passengers and staff, recommending that the sick person wear a mask, and Asking a person to cover their mouth and nose with a tissue when they cough or sneeze.

sourceString: Cabin crew should wear disposable medical gloves when tending to a sick traveler or touching body fluids or potentially contaminated surfaces, and possibly additional personal protective equipment if the sick traveler has fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.

en-mt: Passengers in the relevant cabin should use disposable medical gloves when caring for a sick passenger or touching liquid or potentially contaminated surfaces, and if possible use other personal protective equipment in the event that: A sick traveler has a fever, persistent cough, or difficulty breathing.

sourceString: Gloves and other disposable items should be disposed of in a biohazard bag, and contaminated surfaces should be cleaned and disinfected afterwards.For commercial shipping, including cruise ships and other passenger vessels, hazard controls include postponing travel when sick, and self-isolating and informing the onboard medical center immediately if one develops a fever or other symptoms while on board.

Transportation risk controls on commercial ships, including cruise ships and other passenger ships, include suspending travel when someone is ill, and if someone on board has a fever or other symptoms of illness. He should be separated from others and the medical staff on the ship should be notified immediately.

For schools and child care centers, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) recommends a short school break for cleaning and disinfection if a sick person is a social worker. The spread has come to school regardless.

sourceString: When there is minimal to moderate community transmission, social distancing strategies can be implemented such as canceling field trips, assemblies, and other large gatherings such as physical education or choir classes or meals in a cafeteria, increasing the space between desks, staggering arrival and dismissal times, limiting nonessential visitors, and using a separate health office location for children with flu-like symptoms.

en-mt: If there is little chance of reducing social transmission, social distancing strategies should be implemented, such as canceling field trips, meetings, and other large gatherings, such as physical education or church meetings or banquets in the cafeteria. Increasing distance, changing arrival and departure times, limiting/reducing unnecessary visitors, and using separate health office space for children with flu-like symptoms.

sourceString: When there is substantial transmission in the local community, in addition to social distancing strategies, extended school dismissals may be considered.For law enforcement personnel performing daily routine activities, the immediate health risk is considered low by CDC.

According to the US Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), the level of emergency health risk for law enforcement personnel performing daily activities is considered low.

sourceString: Law enforcement officials who must make contact with individuals confirmed or suspected to have COVID-19 are recommended to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical technicians, including proper personal protective equipment.

en-mt: Law enforcement officials, who may come into contact with persons with or suspected of having COVID-19, are advised to follow the same guidelines as emergency medical personnel, including appropriate personal protective equipment.

sourceString: If close contact occurs during apprehension, workers should clean and disinfect their duty belt and gear prior to reuse using a household cleaning spray or wipe, and follow standard operating procedures for the containment and disposal of used PPE and for containing and laundering clothes.
targetString: که چېرته د توقیف پر مهال له نږدې اړیکه ونیول شي، کارکوونکي باید خپل کمربندونه او پوځي جامې له دویم ځل استعمال څخه مخکې په کور جوړو شوو ضدعفوني سپرېګانو باندې پاک او ضدعفوني کړي، او د کارول شوو شخصي خوندیتوب تجهیزاتو د ساتنې او له منځه وړنې او د جامو د ساتنې او وینځلو لپاره معیاري عملیاتي کړنلارې/پروسیجرونه مراعات کړي.
en-mt: If close contact is made during detention, staff should clean and disinfect their belts and military uniforms with home-made disinfectant sprays before second use, and maintain and dispose of used personal protective equipment. and follow standard operating procedures/procedures for garment care and laundering.

sourceString: OSHA considers certain healthcare and mortuary workers to be at high or very high categories of exposure risk.
targetString: د امریکا متحده ایالاتو د کاري خوندیتوب او روغتیا اداره (OSHA) انګېري چې روغتیایي او د تدفین کارکوونکي په لوړه او ډېره لوړه کچه پر ناروغۍ له اخته کېدو سره مخ دي.
en-mt: The United States Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) believes that healthcare and funeral workers are exposed to high and very high levels of disease.

sourceString: High exposure risk jobs include healthcare delivery, support, laboratory, and medical transport workers who are exposed to known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: په لوړه کچه پر ناروغۍ د اخته کېدونکو دندو کې روغتیایي پاملرنو او مرستو وړاندې کوونکي، لابراتوار، او طبي ټرانسپورټیشن کارکوونکي شامل دي چې د کووېډ-19 ناروغۍ له اخته او شکمنو کسانو سره مخ کیږي.
en-mt: High-risk occupations include health care providers, laboratory, and medical transportation workers who come into contact with people with or suspected of having COVID-19.

sourceString: These become very high exposure risk if workers perform aerosol-generating procedures on, or collect or handle specimens from, known or suspected COVID-19 patients.
targetString: که چېرته کارکوونکي د کووېډ-19 ناروغۍ باندې اخته او شکمنو کسانو باندې په هوا کې د شته ذراتو د تولید د مخنیوي پروسیجرونه تطبیقوي او یا له هغوی څخه د آزمایښت لپاره نمونې راټولوي یا کار ترې اخلي، پر ناروغۍ د اخته کې خطر لوړې کچې ته رسوي.
en-mt: If employees apply airborne particulate matter prevention procedures to, or collect or use samples for testing, the risk of contracting the disease is high. delivers

sourceString: Aerosol-generating procedures include intubation, cough induction procedures, bronchoscopies, some dental procedures and exams, or invasive specimen collection.
targetString: په هوا کې د شته ذراتو د تولید د مخنیوي پروسیجرونو کې بدن کې پیپ اچول، د ټوخي د القا طریقه، برونکوسکوپي، ځینې د غاښو اړونده پروسیجرونه او معاینې، په ډېره اندازه د نمونو راټولول شامل دي.
en-mt: Procedures to prevent the production of airborne particles include wearing a mask, coughing, bronchoscopy, certain dental procedures and examinations, and collecting large amounts of samples.

sourceString: High exposure risk mortuary jobs include workers involved in preparing the bodies of people who had known or suspected cases of COVID-19 at the time of their death; these become very high exposure risk if they perform an autopsy.Additional engineering controls for these risk groups include isolation rooms for patients with known or suspected COVID-19, including when aerosol-generating procedures are performed.
targetString: په لوړه کچه پر ناروغۍ د اخته کېدونکې تدفین دندو کې هغه کارکوونکي شامل دي چې د هغو خلکو جسدونو په چمتو کولو کې بوخت وي چې د مرګ په حال کې پر کووېډ-19 ناروغۍ اخته یا شکمن پېژندل شوي وي. که چېرته دغه کارکوونکي د جسد معاینه کول ترسره کړي، پر ناروغۍ باندې د دوی د اخته کېدو کچه ډېره لوړیږي. د دې ډلې خطر لرونکې ډلې لپاره د انجینرۍ اضافي کنټرولونو کې پر کووېډ-19 اخته او شکمنو ناروغانو لپاره د خونو جلا کول او همدارنګه په هوا کې د شته ذراتو د تولید د مخنیوي پروسیجرونه شامل دي.
en-mt: High-risk funeral jobs include workers who are involved in preparing the bodies of people who are known to have or be suspected of having COVID-19 at the time of death. If these workers perform the autopsy, their exposure to the disease is greatly increased. Additional engineering controls for this at-risk group include isolation of rooms for patients with and suspected of having and suspected of having Covid-19, as well as procedures to prevent the generation of airborne particles.

sourceString: Specialized negative pressure ventilation may be appropriate in some healthcare and mortuary settings.
targetString: د منفي فشار ځانګړی هواکش ښایي په ځینو روغتیایي او د تدفین مرکزونو کې مناسب وي.
en-mt: A special negative pressure ventilator may be appropriate in some medical and funeral facilities.

sourceString: Specimens should be handled with Biosafety Level 3 precautions.
targetString: نمونې باید د بایوسیفټي لیول 3 مخکني اقداماتو په پام کې نیولو سره واخیستل شي.
en-mt: Samples should be taken in accordance with the previous Biosafety Level 3 measures.

sourceString: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that incoming patients be separated into distinct waiting areas depending on whether they are a suspected COVID-19 case.In addition to other PPE, OSHA recommends respirators for those who work within 6 feet of patients known to be, or suspected of being, infected with SARS-CoV-2, and those performing aerosol-generating procedures.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان  (WHO) سپارښتنه کوي چې راتلونکي ناروغان دې د کووېډ-19 شکمنې قضیې ته په کتو سره په جلا انتظارخانه کې کښېنول شي. د شخصي خوندیتوب نورو تجهیزاتو سربېره، د امریکا متحده ایالاتو د کاري خوندیتوب او روغتیا اداره (OSHA) د هغو کارکوونکو لپاره د تنفسي وسایلو سپارښتنه کوي چې پر SARS-CoV-2 اخته یا شکمنو ناروغانو سره په 6 فوټه واټن کې کار کوي او هغه کارکوونکي چې په هوا کې د شته ذراتو د تولید د مخنیوي پروسیجرونه ترسره کوي.
en-mt: The World Health Organization (WHO) recommends that future patients with suspected cases of Covid-19 be placed in a separate waiting room. In addition to other personal protective equipment, the US Occupational Safety and Health Administration (OSHA) recommends respirators for workers who work within 6 feet of patients with or suspected of having SARS-CoV-2 and who Employees who perform procedures to prevent the production of airborne particles.

sourceString: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 filtering facepiece respirators or better must be used in the context of a comprehensive, written respiratory protection program that includes fit-testing, training, and medical exams.
targetString: د امریکا متحده ایالاتو کې، د NIOSH له لوري تایید شوي N95 د مخ تنفسي ماسکونه او یا له دې غوره باید په پراخ او لیکل شوي تنفسي خوندیتوب پروګرام کې وکارول شي. په دې پروګرام کې مناسب، روزنیز او طبي معاینات شامل دي.
en-mt: In the United States, NIOSH-approved N95 facepiece respirators or better must be used in a comprehensive and written respiratory protection program. This program includes fitness, training and medical examinations.

sourceString: Other types of respirators can provide greater protection and improve worker comfort.The WHO does not recommend coveralls, as COVID-19 is a respiratory disease rather than being transmitted through bodily fluids.
targetString: د تنفسي وسایلو نور ډولونه د غوره خوندیتوب لپاره کارېدلی او د کارکوونکي لپاره اسانتیا برابرولی شي. د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان د پوښ/څپرې سپارښتنه نه کوي، ځکه چې کووېډ-19 یوه تنفسي ناروغي ده. دا ناروغي د بدن د مایعاتو له لارې نه انتقالیږي.
en-mt: Other types of breathing apparatus can be used for better safety and convenience for the worker. The World Health Organization does not recommend covering/covering, because Covid-19 is a respiratory disease. This disease is not transmitted through body fluids.

sourceString: WHO recommends only a surgical mask for point-of-entry screening personnel.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان په دروازه کې د معاینې کولو پرسونل لپاره یواځې د طبي ماسک سپارښتنه کوي.
en-mt: The World Health Organization recommends only medical masks for screening personnel at the gate.

sourceString: For those who are collecting respiratory specimens from, caring for, or transporting COVID-19 patients without any aerosol-generating procedures, WHO recommends a surgical mask, goggles, or face shield, gown, and gloves.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان د هغو کسانو لپاره چې د کووېډ-19 ناروغانو تنفسي نمونه اخلي، د هغوی پاملرنه کوي یا هغوی له یو ځل نه بل ځای ته په هوا کې د شته ذراتو د تولید د مخنیوي پروسیجرونو ترسره کولو پرته لېږدوي، د جراحي ماسک، عینکو، د مخ ماسک، طبي جامو او لاسماغوانو/دستکشو سپارښتنه کوي.
en-mt: The World Health Organization recommends surgical masks for those who collect respiratory samples from, care for, or transport patients with COVID-19 without performing procedures to prevent airborne particulates. , recommends goggles, face mask, medical gown and gloves/gloves.

sourceString: If an aerosol-generating procedure is performed, the surgical mask is replaced with an N95 or FFP2 respirator.
targetString: که چېرته په هوا کې د شته ذراتو د تولید د مخنیوي پروسیجر ترسره شي، د جراحۍ ماسک پر ځای دې د N95 یا FFP2 تنفسي ماسک واغوستل شي.
en-mt: If a procedure is being performed to prevent the generation of airborne particles, an N95 or FFP2 respirator should be worn instead of a surgical mask.

sourceString: Given that the global supply of PPE is insufficient, WHO recommends minimizing the need for PPE through telemedicine, physical barriers such as clear windows, allowing only those involved in direct care to enter a room with a COVID-19 patient, using only the PPE necessary for the specific task, continuing use of the same respirator without removing it while caring for multiple patients with the same diagnosis, monitoring and coordinating the PPE supply chain, and discouraging the use of masks for asymptomatic individuals.
targetString: دا چې د شخصي خوندیتوب تجهیزاتو نړیوال چمتووالی ناکافی دی، د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان د لرې واټن روغتیاپالۍ او فزیکي خنډونو جوړولو لکه، پاکې کړکۍ، د شخصي خوندیتوب تجهیزاتو لپاره د اړتیا راکمولو، یواځې هغو ته د شخصي خوندیتوب تجهیزاتو کارولو اجازه ورکول چې د کوویډ-19 ناروغانو پاملرنه په مستقیم ډول ترسره کوي، یواځې د ځانګړو اړینو دندو، لکه د یو شان ناروغانو لپاره د پاملرنې پر مهال د یوه تنفسي ماسک له لرې کولو پرته د شخصي خوندیتوب تجهیزاتو کارولو، د شخصي خوندیتوب د تجهیزاتو د اکمال/عرضې ځنځیر څارلو او همغږي کولو، او د علایمو نلرونکو کسانو لپاره د ماسکونو د نه تجویز کولو سپارښتنه کوي.
en-mt: That the global availability of personal protective equipment is insufficient, the World Health Organization has called for distance sanitation and the creation of physical barriers such as, clean windows, reducing the need for personal protective equipment, allowing only those who have the ability to use personal protective equipment. 19. Performs patient care directly, only for specific essential tasks, such as using personal protective equipment without removing a respirator while caring for the same patient, personal protective equipment supply/supply chain Recommends monitoring and coordination, and not prescribing masks for those without symptoms.

sourceString: FROM: Katherine Maher, Wikimedia Foundation CEO
targetString: له: کاترین ماهر، ویکیمیډیا بنسټ اجراییوي مشره
en-mt: From: Kathryn Maher, Executive Director, Wikimedia Foundation

sourceString: TO: All Wikimedia Foundation staff
targetString: د ویکمیډیا بنسټ ټولو کارکوونکو ته
en-mt: To all Wikimedia Foundation staff

sourceString: SUBJECT LINE: [Covid-19] Lightening the load and preparing for the future
targetString: د موضوع خط: [کووېډ-19] د بار سپکول او د راتلونکې لپاره چمتووالی نیول
en-mt: Subject letter: [Covid-19] Lightening the burden and preparing for the future

sourceString: SEND DATE/TIME: 14 March, 2020, 00:24 UTC
targetString: د لېږلو نېټه/وخت: 14 مارچ، 2020، 00:24 UTC
en-mt: Posted Date/Time: March 14, 2020, 00:24 UTC

sourceString: LICENSING: CC0: No rights reserved
targetString: جواز: CC0: هیڅ ډول حق څخه ساتنه نه کیږي
en-mt: License: CC0: No rights reserved

sourceString: We find ourselves in remarkable circumstances this month.
targetString: په دې میاشت کې مونږ خپل ځان د پام وړ حالاتو کې وینو.
en-mt: This month we find ourselves in a remarkable situation.

sourceString: The COVID-19 epidemic is something that makes clear our global human interconnectedness and the responsibilities we have to one another.
targetString: د کووېډ-19 وبا داسې یو شی ده چې زمونږ نړیوالې بشري دنني اړیکې او هغه مسوولیتونه روښانه او په ګوته کوي چې د یو بل پر وړاندې یې لرو.
en-mt: The Covid-19 pandemic is something that highlights our international human relations and the responsibilities we have towards each other.

sourceString: We don’t have precedent for its challenges, but we do know that our best response relies on the sort of global empathy, cooperation, and community building that sits at the heart of this organization.
targetString: مونږ د دغو ننګونو سابقه نلرو، خو مونږ پوهېږو چې زمونږ تر ټولو غوره غبرګون پر یو ډول نړیوالې خواخوږۍ، همکارۍ او ټولنې جوړونې باندې تکیه لري چې دا چارې دې سازمان په زړه کې ځای لري.
en-mt: We do not have a history of these challenges, but we know that our best response relies on the kind of global empathy, cooperation and community building that is at the heart of this organization.

sourceString: The camaraderie and care we have seen among all of our colleagues over email, calls, and chats is a remarkable validation of the incredible humans we are fortunate enough to work with.
targetString: هغه همکاري او پاملرنه چې مونږ د ایمیلونو، زنګونو، او انلاین خبرو له لارې د خپلو همکارانو تر منځ درلودې د هغو په زړه پورې انسانانو د پام وړ اعتبار او باور دی چې نېکمرغه یو له هغوی سره یوځای کارکوو.
en-mt: The cooperation and attention we have had between our colleagues through emails, calls, and online chats is a remarkable testament to the wonderful people we are lucky enough to work with.

sourceString: I couldn’t be more grateful and proud to count you all as colleagues.
targetString: زه نشم کولی ستاسو منندويي وکړم او د خپلو همکارانو په ستاسو د ګڼلو ویاړ ولرم.
en-mt: I cannot thank you enough and am honored to be considered by my colleagues.

sourceString: Last week, someone shared with me their appreciation for our work.
targetString: تېره اونۍ، یو کس له ما سره زمونږ د کارونو منندویي شریکه کړه.
en-mt: Last week, someone shared with me his gratitude for our work.

sourceString: They reminded me how meaningful it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia right now, and what a powerful symbol it is for this critical resource to remain online and available to all.
targetString: هغوی ما ته دا رایاده کړه چې د نړۍ لپاره دا څومره د مانا وړ خبر ده چې وکولی شو ویکیپیډیا ته مخ ورواړوو، او د یوې مهمې سرچینې په توګه دا څومره یو پیاوړی سمبول ده چې د ټولو لپاره انلاین او د لاسرسي وړ دی.
en-mt: They told me what a great news it is for the world to be able to turn to Wikipedia, and what a powerful symbol it is as an important resource that is online and accessible to all.

sourceString: Your work makes this possible, whether you keep the sites stay up or our colleagues paid or our communities safe.
targetString: دا ستاسو د کار له کبله شونی کیږي چې ایا تاسو دې ویبپاڼې پرانستې پرېږدئ یا له همکارانو څخه دې پیسې واخلئ یا غواړئ ټولنې خوندي وساتئ.
en-mt: This is made possible by your work, whether you keep this website open, collect money from colleagues, or want to keep the community safe.

sourceString: The world needs the information that Wikipedia provides, now more than ever.
targetString: نړۍ له هرکله نه ډېر اوس هغو مالوماتو ته اړتیا لري چې ویکیپيډیا یې وړاندې کوي.
en-mt: Now more than ever, the world needs the information that Wikipedia provides.

sourceString: This is a moment in which not only what we do, but how we do it, will make a meaningful impact on the world.
targetString: دا هغه شېبه ده چې نه دا چې څه مونږ کوو یا یې څنګه کوو، ښایي پر نړۍ باندې له مانا ډکه اغېزه وښندي.
en-mt: This is the moment when not what we do or how we do it can have a meaningful impact on the world.

sourceString: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to how we work together, starting this coming week.
targetString: د دغه رسالت د اهمیت او پکې ستاسو د رول له کبله به مونږ په ګډه د کار کولو په څرنګوالي کې چې په راتلونکې اونۍ کې به پیلیږي د پام وړ ځینې سمونونه رامنځته کړو.
en-mt: Because of the importance of this mission and your role in it, we will be making some significant adjustments to the way we work together beginning next week.

sourceString: Adjustments to our work and schedules
targetString: له خپل کار او مهالویشونو سره سمون
en-mt: Adapt to your work and schedules

sourceString: As Robyn mentioned previously, the c-team met last night to discuss our approach and schedule for the coming days and months.
targetString: لکه څنګه چې رابین مخکې یادونه وکړه، د C-Team تېره شپه غونډه درلوده تر څو د راتلونکو ورځو او میاشتو لپاره زمونږ پر تګلارې او مهالویش باندې بحث وکړي.
en-mt: As Robin mentioned earlier, the C-Team had a meeting last night to discuss our strategy and schedule for the coming days and months.

sourceString: In that conversation, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we’re facing and the best way to keep the organization sustainable during this time.
targetString: په دې خبرو اترو کې، مونږ داسې وګڼله چې څه فکر کوو د هغه څه پر وړاندې به یو مناسب غبرګون وي چې مونږ ورسره مخ کیږو او په دې ترڅ کې د سازمان یا ادارې د باثباته او ټینګ ساتلو لپاره به تر ټولو غوره لاره وي.
en-mt: In this discussion, we considered what we thought would be an appropriate response to what we were facing and would be the best way to keep the organization stable and strong in the meantime.

sourceString: Overwhelmingly we wanted to remove stress and support our mission for the long term.
targetString: په ډېر شدت سره مونږ غوښتل تر څو فشار له منځه یوسو او په اوږدمهاله توګه د خپل ماموریت ملاتړ وکړو.
en-mt: We desperately wanted to de-stress and support our mission in the long run.

sourceString: If you need to dial back, that’s okay.
targetString: که چېرته بیاځلې یې ډایل کول غواړئ، کومه ستونزه نده.
en-mt: If you want to dial it again, no problem.

sourceString: For all staff, contractors, and contract workers:
targetString: د ټولو کارکوونکو، قراردادیانو، او قراردادي کارکوونکو لپاره:
en-mt: For all employees, contractors, and subcontractors:

sourceString: our daily working expectations will be about 4 hours a day, or 20 hours a week until further notice.
targetString: زمونږ د ورځني کار توقع تر راتلونکي خبر پورې، په ورځ کې 4 ساعته یا 20 ساعته په اونۍ کې دی.
en-mt: Our daily work schedule is 4 hours per day or 20 hours per week until further notice.

sourceString: We’re not declaring a holiday - if you are able to work more normal hours, the mission can use you.
targetString: مونږ کومه رخصتي نلرو – که چېرته کولی شئ له عادي ساعتونو ډېر کار وکړئ، ماموریت له تاسو څخه کار اخیستی شي.
en-mt: We don't have holidays - if you can work more than normal hours, the mission can use you.

sourceString: However, the world is unpredictable right now, and whether you need to care for loved ones, get groceries, or go to the doctor, your well-being is our priority.
targetString: خو بیا هم، اوسمهال نړۍ ډېره د وړاندوینې وړ نده، او زمونږ لپاره ستاسو هوساینه لومړیتوب دی، هغه که تاسو د خپل خواخوږي پاملرنه کوئ، د کور لپاره سودا اخلئ یا ډاکټر ته ورځئ.
en-mt: However, the world is very unpredictable these days, and your well-being is our top priority, whether you're taking care of your loved one, shopping for a home, or going to the doctor.

sourceString: We are not tracking your time.
targetString: مونږ ستاسو وخت نه څارو.
en-mt: We do not monitor your time.

sourceString: If you are sick, do not work.
targetString: که چېرته ناروغ یاست، کار مه کوئ.
en-mt: If you are sick, do not work.

sourceString: This should go without saying, but we’re saying it.
targetString: دا کار باید پرته له ویلو وشي، بیا هم مونږ درته وایو.
en-mt: This should go without saying, yet we tell you.

sourceString: No sick days or PTO required - just tell your manager and help your team revise calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.
targetString: د ناروغۍ رخصتۍ یا PTO ته اړتیا نشته – یوازې خپل مدیر ته ووایاست او له خپل ټیم سره د جنترۍ او مهالویشونو په بیاکتنه کې مرسته وکړئ تر څو ډاډ ترلاسه شي چې د کار کلیدي برخې تر پوښښ لاندې نیول شوې دي.
en-mt: No need for sick leave or PTO – just tell your manager and help your team review calendars and schedules to make sure key areas of work are covered.

sourceString: (If you are diagnosed positive for COVID-19, please let Bryan within T&C Ops know so T&C can help with support and make sure your situation gets appropriate attention from management).
targetString: (که چېرته تاسو د کووېډ-19 نتیجه مثبته راوخیژي، په مهربانۍ سره برایان T&C Ops know so T&C سره خبر کړئ چې کولی شي له تاسو سره مرسته وکړي او ډاډ ترلاسه کړئ ستاسو وضعیت ته د مدیریت له خوا سمه توجه کیږي).
en-mt: (If you test positive for covid-19, please inform Brian T&C Ops know so T&C can assist you and ensure your situation is properly addressed by management).

sourceString: Hourly folks will be fully paid.
targetString: ساعتواره کارکوونکو ته یې خپلې پیسې په بشپړه توګه ورکول کیږي.
en-mt: Hourly workers are paid in full.

sourceString: We have already said, and are recommitting to honor our commitments to our contractors and hourly staff colleagues.
targetString: مونږ مخکې هم وویل او بیاځلې خپلو قراردادیانو او ساعتواره کارکوونکو ته د ژمن پاتې کېدو درناوی کوو.
en-mt: We have said before and again that we respect our contractors and hourly employees for staying committed.

sourceString: Everyone will be paid on the basis of their usual hours worked during normal circumstances.
targetString: هر یو ته به د نارمل شرایطو پر مهال د هغوی د عادي ساعتونو پر بنسټ پیسې ورکړل شي.
en-mt: Each will be paid based on their normal hours under normal circumstances.

sourceString: This includes if you are sick and unable to work.
targetString: که چېرته ناروغ یاست او د کار کولو توان نلرئ، هم شامل دي.
en-mt: If you are sick and unable to work, this is also included.

sourceString: If you want to work, we support you.
targetString: که غواړئ کار وکړئ، مونږ مو ملاتړ کوو.
en-mt: If you want to work, we support you.

sourceString: Many people use work as a way of channeling their stress with the world around us.
targetString: ډېر شمېر خلک زمونږ تر شاوخوا نړۍ د خپل فشار د څرخولو د یوې لارې په توګه له خپل کار څخه ګټه پورته کوي.
en-mt: Many people use their work as a way to release stress from the world around us.

sourceString: What we do can be incredibly rewarding, especially during times like this.
targetString: څه چې مونږ کوو، په نه باور کېدونکې توګه انعام بخښونکي وي، په ځانګړې توګه په داسې یو وخت کې لکه اوس چې دی.
en-mt: What we do is incredibly rewarding, especially in a time like this.

sourceString: Again, this is about your self-care.
targetString: بیا هم، دا ستاسو د خپلې پاملرنې په مانا ده.
en-mt: However, it means taking care of yourself.

sourceString: Our ask is that you communicate with your manager, so we know what to expect and can adjust accordingly.
targetString: غوښتنه مو دا ده چې تاسو له خپل مدیر سره خبرې وکړئ، همدا ده چې پوهېږو د څه توقع وکړو او په هماغه ډول ځان عیارولی شو.
en-mt: We ask that you talk to your manager so that we know what to expect and adjust accordingly.

sourceString: Some work is considered essential.
targetString: ځینې کارونه مهم ګڼل کیږي.
en-mt: Some tasks are considered important.

sourceString: There are some things that we must keep doing.
targetString: ځینې شیان شته چې باید ترسره یې کړو.
en-mt: There are some things we have to do.

sourceString: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust & Safety, and Fundraising teams (among others) do critical work that may need additional support.
targetString: د SRE، HR Ops، Trust &، د خوندیتوب او د سرمایو د جذب ټیمونه (د نور تر منځ) مهم کار ترسره کوي چې ښایي نورو مرستو ته هم اړتیا ولري.
en-mt: The SRE, HR Ops, Trust &, Safety and Capital Attraction teams (among others) perform important work that may require additional support.

sourceString: We’ll begin a process with all departments to assess current objectives and shift our focus to supporting what’s essential for our mission.
targetString: مونږ به له ټولو ادارو سره یوځای یوه پروسه پیل کړو تر څو اوسنۍ موخې وارزوو او دا چې څه زمونږ د ماموریت لپاره مهم دي پر ملاتړ خپل تمرکز ورواړوو.
en-mt: We will begin a process with all agencies to review current goals and focus on supporting what is most important to our mission.

sourceString: There’s plenty to do for all of us, we just will all focus on the most essential projects.
targetString: ډېر شمېر ادارې شته چې زمونږ لپاره یې کوي، مونږ باید ټول تمرکز پر تر ټولو مهمو پروژو وکړو.
en-mt: There are many organizations that do it for us, we have to focus on the most important projects.

sourceString: Slowing now won’t hurt later.
targetString: د اوس لپاره سوکه تګ وروسته دردونه نه پیدا کوي.
en-mt: Dry walking for now does not cause after pain.

sourceString: We do not plan to go “double-time to catch up” once the pandemic has passed.
targetString: مونږ پلان کې نلرو چې د وبا له پای ته رسېدو سره به "د برابرېدو لپاره دوه چنده وخت ورکړو".
en-mt: We do not plan to "give double the time to prepare" after the pandemic is over.

sourceString: You will not be expected to work extra hours to meet deadlines which are now unrealistic.
targetString: له تاسو دا تمه نه کیږي چې د ضرب العجل د پوره کولو لپاره دې اضافي کار وکړې، ځکه دا کار اوس خیالي او غیرواقعي دی.
en-mt: You are not expected to do extra work to meet the deadline, because this work is now imaginary and unrealistic.

sourceString: We accept that circumstances have changed, and will work to set new targets and timelines where appropriate.
targetString: مونږ منو چې وضعيت بدل شوی، او د نویو موخو او مهالوېشونو ټاکلو لپاره باید کار وکړو.
en-mt: We recognize that the situation has changed, and we must work to set new goals and schedules.

sourceString: What happens with the APP (Annual Planning)?
targetString: له کلني پلان نیولو سره څه کیږي؟
en-mt: What about annual planning?

sourceString: To adjust to our new reality and daily working hour expectations, we intend to adjust the timeline for the delivery of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.
targetString: له خپل نوي حقیقت او د ورځنیو کاري ساعتونو له توقعاتو سره سمون رامنځته کولو لپاره، مونږ په پام کې لرو چې د خپل 2020-2021 کلني پلان د وړاندې کولو لپاره له مهالویش سره سمون رامنځته کړو.
en-mt: In order to adjust to our new reality and expectations of daily working hours, we are planning to adjust the schedule for the presentation of our 2020-2021 Annual Plan.

sourceString: Our intention is to propose an extension of our 2019-2020 plan that allows more time for budgeting to allow employees to prioritize critical work, self-care, and care for loved ones while accommodating those who need or wish to work a reduced schedule over the next few weeks.
targetString: زمونږ قصد د 2019-2020 پلان د غځولو تجویز کول دي، چې بودیجې جوړولو ته ډېر وخت رامنځته کوي او کارکوونکو ته فرصت برابروي تر څو مهم کار، د ځان پاملرنې، د خواخوږي پاملرنې ته لومړیتوب ورکړل شي، په داسې حال کې چې د هغو ځای پر ځای کول چې غواړي په راتلونکو اونیو کې په راکم شوي مهالویش سره د کارکولو غوښتنه لري.
en-mt: Our intention is to propose an extension to the 2019-2020 plan, which will create more time for budgeting and provide employees with the opportunity to prioritize important work, self-care, compassionate care, while their Placements that require a reduced schedule in the coming weeks.

sourceString: This timeline extension greatly reduces current planning workloads and pressure across the whole organization.
targetString: د زمانبندۍ غځېدنه په لوړه کچه په ټول سازمان کې د پلان نیولو اوسني کار حجم او فشار راکموي.
en-mt: Scheduling reduces the volume and pressure of current planning work at a high level throughout the organization.

sourceString: We will introduce our proposal to the Board next week and will update delegates and teams on the next steps as soon as we have confirmation.
targetString: مونږ به راتلونکې اونۍ بورډ ته خپله پروپوزل وروپېژنو او د تاییدي ترلاسه کولو سره سم به د نویو اقداماتو په اړه پلاوي او ټیمونو ته تازه مالومات ورکړو.
en-mt: We will present our proposal to the board next week and once we get approval, we will update the delegation and teams about the new measures.

sourceString: Thank you to the APP team for your leadership in this.
targetString: په دې برخه کې د APP د تیم له مشرتوب څخه مننه.
en-mt: Thanks to the leadership of the APP team in this regard.

sourceString: Office status, exposure, and cleaning
targetString: د دفتر حیثیت، له ناروغۍ سره مخ کېدنه، او پاکوالی
en-mt: Office status, exposure to disease, and cleanliness

sourceString: Last week, we learned that one of our SF-based colleagues may have been exposed to the COVID-19 virus.
targetString: تېره اونۍ، مونږ خبر ترلاسه کړ چې زمونږ د SF اړونده کارکوونکي ښایي د کووېډ-19 وېروس باندې اخته شوي وای.
en-mt: Last week, we received word that one of our SF employees may have been infected with the Covid-19 virus.

sourceString: However, out of an abundance of caution, we employed an antiviral cleaning crew to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.
targetString: خو بیا هم، د یو لړ احتیاطي اقداماتو ترسره کولو سره، مونږ د وېروس ضد پاکوالي ډله وګمارله تر څو د سانفرانسیسکو په دفتر کې ټولې سطحې ضدعفوني کړي.
en-mt: But still, taking a series of precautions, we hired an anti-virus cleaning team to disinfect all surfaces in the San Francisco office.

sourceString: They utilized a hospital-grade anti-viral solution to disinfect every surface, as well as the lobby and elevator banks accessing our floor.
targetString: دوی د روغتون د کچې وېروس ضد محلول څخه ګټه اخلي تر څو هره سطحه او همدارنګه لابي او د لیفټ غاړې چې زمونږ پوړ ته رارسیږي، ضدعفوني کړي.
en-mt: They use a hospital-grade anti-virus solution to disinfect every surface as well as the lobby and elevators leading to our floor.

sourceString: The building is employing its own duty-of-care protocol utilizing products that support the safety of their tenants.
targetString: په ودانۍ کې د پاملرنې دندې له پروتوکول څخه کار اخیستل کیږي او هغه مواد کاروي چې د کرایه اخیستونکو خوندیتوب سره مرسته کوي.
en-mt: Caregiving duties in the building utilize protocol and use materials that contribute to the safety of tenants.

sourceString: We feel comfortable that the office will be well-prepared for when we decide to return.
targetString: مونږ د ارامۍ احساس کوو چې دفتر به د بېرته ورستنېدو پر مهال په سمه توګه چمتو وي.
en-mt: We feel reassured that the office will be properly prepared when we return.

sourceString: Our DC office is located in a WeWork, which has shared its COVID-19 protocol with us and all DC-based staff members.
targetString: زمونږ د DC دفتر په WeWork کې پروت دی چې د کویډ-19 پروتوکول یې له مونږ او د DC اړونده کارکوونکو سره شریک کړی دی.
en-mt: Our DC office is located at WeWork, which has shared a Covid-19 protocol with us and relevant DC staff.

sourceString: As of last week, our DC office moved to a fully remote setup in line with the guidance shared with San Francisco.
targetString: له تېرې اونۍ راپدېخوا، زمونږ د DC دفتر سان فرانسیسکو سره د شریک شوي لارښود سره سم په بشپړه توګه یو لرې ځای ته لېږدول شوی.
en-mt: As of last week, our DC office has been completely relocated to a remote location with San Francisco under shared direction.

sourceString: As some of our NYC-based colleagues know, we have also been in discussion about leasing a location in Brooklyn.
targetString: لکه څنګه چې په نیویارک ښار کې زمونږ اړونده همکاران پوهیږي، مونږ په بروکلین کې د یو ځای ځایګي د اجاره نیولو په اړه په خپلو کې بحث او خبرې کوو.
en-mt: As our colleagues in New York City know, we are in discussions among ourselves about leasing a space in Brooklyn.

sourceString: These discussions are continuing but may be delayed.
targetString: دا خبرې اترې دوام لري، خو ښایي ځنډ هم پکې راشي.
en-mt: These negotiations are ongoing, but there may be delays.

sourceString: Some of our colleagues are working remotely for the first time.
targetString: زمونږ د ځینو همکارانو لومړی ځل دی چې لرې سیمو کې کار کوي.
en-mt: Some of our colleagues are working in remote areas for the first time.

sourceString: Our long-time remote colleagues know that it can be an adjustment, and wanted to offer you some advice:
targetString: زمونږ اوږدمهاله لرې سیمو همکاران پوهیږي چې دا کېدای شي یو ډول نظم او سمون وي، او تاسو ته د ځینو سلامشورو وړاندې کول غواړي:
en-mt: Our long-time remote colleagues know that this can be a bit of an adjustment, and would like to offer you some advice:

sourceString: Limit the length of meetings to at most one or two hour increments.
targetString: د غونډو د وخت اوږدوالی تر یو یا دوه ساعتونو پورې محدود کړئ.
en-mt: Limit the length of meetings to an hour or two.

sourceString: If longer sessions are required, consider how they can be broken up over the course of several days.
targetString: که چېرې اوږدو غونډو ته اړتیا لیدل کیږي، دا په پام کې ونیسئ چې دا غونډه د څو ورځو په بهیر کې څنګه په څو برخو ویشل کېدی شي.
en-mt: If longer meetings are needed, consider how the meeting can be broken up into parts over several days.

sourceString: Clearly define the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials in advance.
targetString: د غونډې موخه په روښانه ډول مالومه کړئ، باید اجنډا ولري، او د لوستلو مواد له غونډې مخکې ولېږئ.
en-mt: Clearly state the purpose of the meeting, have an agenda, and send reading materials before the meeting.

sourceString: Make video the default, with tools like Google Docs and Zoom to facilitate live collaboration and connection.
targetString: د ژوندۍ مرستې او همکارۍ او تماس د رامنځته کولو لپاره د Google Docs  او Zoom اوزارو پر مټ ویډیو رالنډه کړئ.
en-mt: Record video using Google Docs and Zoom tools for live assistance and collaboration.

sourceString: Have a lead to facilitate every meeting, someone to monitor the chat for questions and track the speaker list, and someone to help take notes (or do collaborative note-taking).
targetString: د هرې غونډې د جوړولو لپاره مشر وټاکئ. داسې یو څوک چې د پوښتنو په اړه د خبرو څارنه وکړي او د خبرې کوونکي لیست تعقیب کړي او داسې یو څوک چې نوټ اخیستو کې مرسته وکړي (یا په مشترک ډول نوټ اخیستنه وکړي).
en-mt: Appoint a leader to create each session. Someone to monitor the discussion of the questions and follow the speaker's list and someone to help take notes (or take notes jointly).

sourceString: Send an email to tech support if you need a comfortable headset.
targetString: که چېرته ارام مایکروفون یا غوږیو ته اړتیا لرئ، نو د ټکنالوژۍ د ملاتړ برخې ته یو ایمیل ولېږئ.
en-mt: If you need a microphone or headset, send an email to the tech support department.

sourceString: Use your wellness reimbursement for snacks.
targetString: د ناشتې خواړو لپاره د خپلې هوساینې تادیې څخه کار واخلئ.
en-mt: Use your convenience to pay for breakfast food.

sourceString: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to talk with your colleagues about distributed work
targetString: د ویشل شوي کار په اړه له خپلو همکارانو سره د خبرو کولو لپاره د #remoties channel in Slack سره یوځای شئ.
en-mt: Join the #remoties channel in Slack to chat with your colleagues about distributed work.

sourceString: The HR Operations team is looking into webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support the increase in distributed work across the Foundation.
targetString: د بشری سرچینو د فعالیتونو ټیم په ټول بنسټ کې د ویشل شوي کار د لاډېروالي ملاتړ لپاره د ویبینار پر اساس ولاړ ارګونومیک لارښود ته کتنه کوي.
en-mt: The Human Resources Operations team is reviewing webinar-based ergonomics guidance to support increased distributed work across the organization.

sourceString: This past week we asked all community grant recipients to cancel Wikimedia-funded public events, such as editathons, until the WHO declares the pandemic to be over.
targetString: تېره اونۍ مو د ټولنې اړونده قراردادونو ترلاسه کوونکو څخه غوښتنه وکړه تر څو د ویکیمیډیا له لوري مالي ملاتړ کېدونکي عامه پروګروامونه، لکه ایډیټاتونز تر هغه وخته پورې لغوه کړي، تر څو پورې چې د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان له لوري د وبا له منځه تلل نه وي اعلان شوي.
en-mt: Last week, we asked recipients of community contracts to suspend Wikimedia-funded public programs, such as Editathons, until the outbreak was cleared by the World Health Organization. announced.

sourceString: We let them know that we understood that our request for cancellations and other restrictions could make it impossible to complete their agreed-upon grant activities and that no one would be penalized for having to delay or modify those goals.
targetString: مونږ هغوی خبر کړل چې مونږ پوه شوو چې د لغوې او نورو محدودیتونو لپاره زمونږ غوښته ښایي دا ناشونې کړي تر څو د هغوی د قرارداد پر بنسټ ولاړ فعالیتونه ترسره کړو او دا چې د یادو فعالیتونو د ځنډ او د موخو د بدلون لپاره به هیڅوک نه جریمه کیږي.
en-mt: We informed them that we understand that our request for cancellation or other restrictions may make it impossible for us to perform the activities based on their contract and that no one will be responsible for the delay of said activities or change of purpose. is fined.

sourceString: This coming week we will follow up with additional guidance on Wikimania and other regional and thematic community conferences.
targetString: مونږ به راتلونکې اونۍ د ویکیمانیا او نورو سیمه‌ییزو او د ټولنې موضوعي کنفرانسونو په اړه د نورو لارښودونو څارنه پیل کړو.
en-mt: We'll start monitoring more guides next week on Wikimania and other regional and community themed conferences.

sourceString: The general sentiment from around the global community seems to be both sadness at the disruption but relief at the clarity and ability to focus on their own communities, Wikimedia and otherwise.
targetString: داسې ښکاري چې د نړیوالې ټولنې عمومي احساس له ګډوډۍ څخه خپګان، خو د خپلو ټولنو، ویکيمیډیا او نورو باندې د تمرکز کولو لپاره په روڼتیا او وړتیا کې ارام او راحت دی.
en-mt: It seems that the general feeling of the international community is upset by the chaos, but calm and relieved at the transparency and ability to focus on their communities, Wikimedia and others.

sourceString: Going forward, the CRT is working to set up a page on Meta-Wiki to provide a space for the community to monitor the impact and follow our communications with them.
targetString: په مخکې تګ سره، CRT په میتاویکي کې د یوې پاڼې جوړولو باندې کار کوي تر څو د اغېزې د څارنې او له هغوی سره زمونږ د اړیکو تعقیبولو په موخه د ټولنې لپاره یوه فضا رامنځته کړي.
en-mt: Going forward, CRT is working on creating a page on Metawiki to create a space for the community to monitor impact and track our interactions with them.

sourceString: Staying in touch around COVID-19 related issues
targetString: د کوویډ-19 اړونده موضوعګانو سره سروکار درلودل
en-mt: Dealing with topics related to Covid-19

sourceString: We’ll be sending an invitation to your calendars for next Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT for a special staff meeting.
targetString: مونږ به د پنجشنبې په ورځ، 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT ، ستاسو جنترۍ ته د یو ځانګړي کاري غونډې په اړه یو بلنلیک درولېږو.
en-mt: We will send an invitation to your account on Thursday, 14:00 UTC/07:00 PT, about a special business meeting.

sourceString: We’ll use this time to share additional updates, answer your questions and spend some time connecting with each other.
targetString: مونږ به دا وخت د اضافي نوو مالوماتو شریکولو، ستاسو پوښتنو ځوابولو او له یو بل سره د اړیکې پیدا کولو په موخه د وخت لګولو لپاره وکاروو.
en-mt: We will use this time to share additional information, answer your questions, and spend time connecting with each other.

sourceString: We’re in this together and here to help however we can.
targetString: مونږ په دې کې سره یوځای یو او که په دې ډول له یو بل سره مرسته کولی شو.
en-mt: We are in this together and we can help each other in this way.

sourceString: In the meantime, you can continue to find the information from this email, and all other essential COVID-19 related information, on Office Wiki.
targetString: د دې ترڅنګ، تاسو په دې ایمېل ادرس کې کولی شئ مالوماتو پیدا کولو ته دوام ورکړئ او د کوویډ-19 اړونده نور مهم مالومات په Office Wiki کې پیدا کړئ.
en-mt: In addition, you can continue to find information and other important information related to Covid-19 on the Office Wiki at this email address.

sourceString: The CRT will keep these pages updated and all the information in one place.
targetString: CRT به په دغو پاڼو کې تازه مالومات وراچوي او ټول مالومات به په یو ځای کې ساتي.
en-mt: CRT will update these pages and keep all the information in one place.

sourceString: We are also working to maintain regular communications with staff who reside in countries that are currently significantly affected.
targetString: مونږ له هغو کارکوونکو سره د دوامداره اړیکو ساتلو باندې هم کار کوو چې اوسمهال په ډېرو اغېزمنو هېوادونو کې اوسیږي.
en-mt: We also work to maintain ongoing relationships with employees who currently reside in the most affected countries.

sourceString: If you have any questions about travel, events, a major workstream, or coverage challenge, or anything else you may need help with, please don’t hesitate to notify and work with the CRT.
targetString: که چېرته تاسو د داسې سفر، پروګرامونو، لوی کاري بهیر، د پوښښ اړونده ننګونو، او یا داسې څه په اړه پوښتنې لرئ چې په هکله یې مرستې ته اړتیا لرئ، تاسو کولی شئ پرته له شکه CRT خبر او یا هم کار ورسره وکړئ.
en-mt: If you have questions about a trip, programs, major workflows, coverage challenges, or anything else you need help with, you can contact CRT without a doubt.

sourceString: We’re here to help provide support and liaise as needed.
targetString: مونږ غواړو د اړتیا په صورت کې مرستې وړاندې او اړیکې رامنځته کړو.
en-mt: We want to offer help and make connections if needed.

sourceString: If you have a confidential or sensitive matter, please email Bryan Judan - Director of HR International Global Operations.
targetString: که چېرته تاسو محرم او حساس مالومات لرئ، په مهربانۍ سره یې د بشري سرچینو د نړیوالو عملیاتو مشر، براین جوډن ته په ایمیل کې ولېږئ.
en-mt: If you have confidential or sensitive information, please email it to Brian Juden, Head of Global Human Resources Operations.

sourceString: None of these changes should be seen as an abandonment of our work and obligations.
targetString: هیڅ بدلون ته باید د کار او مسوولیتونو پرېښودو په سترګه و نه کتل شي.
en-mt: Any change should not be seen as giving up work and responsibilities.

sourceString: Rather, they are a recognition that at this moment, our work and obligations will likely need to adapt in a way we have not in the past.
targetString: بلکې دا په یو ډول رسمیت پېژندنه ده چې په داسې یو وخت کې زمونږ کار او مسوولیتونه باید داسې تنظیم شي چې پخوا په هغه ډول نه وو تنظیم شوي.
en-mt: Rather, it is a recognition that at such a time, our work and responsibilities should be organized in a way that was not organized before.

sourceString: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support this one another so that we can continue to work, provide our movement with the support they need, and the world with the service they rely on.
targetString: دا هغه ګامونه دي چې باور لرو د یو بل ملاتړ لپاره اړین دي، په دې توګه مونږ کولی شو خپل کار ته دوام ورکولی شو، خپل فعالیت په داسې مرستو سنبال کړو چې دوی ورته اړتیا لري او نړۍ ورته په داسې خدمت سنباله کړو چې دوی پرې باور کولی شي.
en-mt: These are the steps we believe are necessary to support each other, so we can continue to do our work, improve our operations with the help they need, and provide the world with the service they need. Can believe it.

sourceString: Our planned work will be there waiting for us when the time comes.
targetString: زمونږ پلان شوی کار به د وخت په رارسېدو سره زمونږ په تمه وي.
en-mt: Our planned work will be waiting for us when the time comes.

sourceString: For now, it is time to support one another and create space for the important work that will be coming in the weeks and potentially months ahead.
targetString: د اوس لپاره دا د یو بل د ملاتړ او د هغه مهم کار لپاره د فضا رامنځته کولو وخت دی چې ښایي په راتلونکو اونیو او په ممکن ډول میاشتو کې ورسره مخ شو.
en-mt: For now, this is a time to support each other and create the atmosphere for the important work that may be faced in the coming weeks and possibly months.

sourceString: We need all of you to make that happen, and so we need you all to take care of yourself and your families so that you can be at your best when the need arises.
targetString: مونږ د دې موخې ترلاسه کولو لپاره تاسو ته اړتیا لرو، او له تاسو غوښتنه لرو چې د خپل ځان او خپلو کورنیو خیال وساتئ، په دې توګه به تاسو د اړتیا رامنځته کېدو پر مهال په چمتو او سنبال اوسئ.
en-mt: We need you to achieve this goal, and we ask you to take care of yourself and your families, so that you will be ready when the need arises.

sourceString: Now, please -- wash your hands and don’t touch your face!
targetString: اوس په مهربانۍ سره – خپل لاسونه پرېمینځئ او مخ مو مه لمس کوئ!
en-mt: Now please - wash your hands and don't touch your face!

sourceString: Katherine, the CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Bryan J, Doreen D, Gregory V, Jaime V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and the rest of the Leadership Team (Grant I, Heather W, Jaime V, Janeen U, Lisa S, Robyn A, Ryan M, and Toby N).
targetString: کاترین، CRT (اماندا کې، امي وي، براین جې، دوریین ډي، ګریګوري وي، جیم وي، جویل ایل، لینیت ایل، راین ایم، او ټوني ایس)، او د مشرتابه ټیم نور غړي (ګرانټ آی، هیتر ډبلیو، جیم وي، جانین یو، لیسا ایس، روبین اې، ریان ایم، او ټوبي این).
en-mt: Catherine, CRT (Amanda K, Amy V, Brian J, Dorian D, Gregory V, Jim V, Joel L, Lynette L, Ryan M, and Tony S), and other members of the leadership team (Grant I, Heather W, Jim Wei, Johnin Y, Lisa S, Rubin A, Ryan M, and Tobey N).

sourceString: b'Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membranes) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidney, and intestines.
targetString: د اینجیوټینسین بدلولو انزایم 2 (ACE2) داسې انزایم دي چې په سږو، شریانونو، زړه، پښتورګو او کولمو کې د حجرو له بیروني سطحې (د حجرې غشا) سره وصل دي.
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 (ACE2) is an enzyme attached to the outer surface (cell membrane) of cells in the lungs, arteries, heart, kidneys, and intestines.

sourceString: ACE2 counters the activity of the related angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin-II and increasing Ang(1-7) making it a promising drug target for treating cardiovascular diseases.ACE2 also serves as the entry point into cells for some coronaviruses.
targetString: ACE2 د انجیوټینسین II اندازه کمولو او د Ang(1-7) زیاتوالو سره د انجیوټینسین-بدلولو انزایم (ACE) د فعالیت مخه نیسي، او پدې سره د زړه ناروغیو درملنې لپاره ژمن درمل ګرځي. ACE2 د ځینې کوروناویروسونو لپاره حجرو ته د ننوتلو نقطې په توګه هم کار کوي.
en-mt: ACE2 inhibits the activity of angiotensin-converting enzyme (ACE) by reducing the amount of angiotensin II and increasing Ang(1-7), making it a promising drug for the treatment of cardiovascular diseases. ACE2 also serves as a cell entry point for some coronaviruses.

sourceString: The human version of the enzyme is often referred to as hACE2.
targetString: د انزایم انساني نسخه ډیری وختونه hACE2 ته ویل کیږي.
en-mt: The human version of the enzyme is often called hACE2.

sourceString: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.
targetString: د انجیټینسین بدلولو انزایم 2 یو ډول زنک دی، چې میټالو انزایم لري او د اندوتیلیل او نورو حجرو په سطحه کې میشت دي.
en-mt: Angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is a zinc-containing metalloenzyme located on the surface of endothelial and other cells.

sourceString: ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptidase M2 domain and a C-terminal collectrin renal amino acid transporter domain.
targetString: د ACE2 پروټین دN -ټرمینل پیپټایډز M2 ډومین او د C ټرمینل کلینرین رینل امینو اسید لیږدونکی ډومین لري.
en-mt: The ACE2 protein contains an N-terminal peptide M2 domain and a C-terminal clinrin renal amino acid transporter domain.

sourceString: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, with its enzymatically active domain exposed on the surface of cells in lungs and other tissues.
targetString: ACE2 یو واحد تیریدونکی I ډول د غشا پروټین دي، چې د انزایمیک فعال ډومین لري، او په سږو او نورو نسجونو کې د حجرو په سطحه کې راڅرګندیږي.
en-mt: ACE2 is a single-pass type I membrane protein, containing an enzymatically active domain, and is expressed on the surface of cells in the lung and other tissues.

sourceString: The extracellular domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as sheddase, and the resulting soluble protein is released into the blood stream and ultimately excreted into urine.
targetString: د ACE2 بیرونی ډومین د ټرانس میمبررین ډومین څخه د بل انزایم په واسطه جلا شوی چې د شیډاس په نوم پیژندل کیږي، او وروستي محلول کېدونکي پروټین د وینې جریان کې خپریږي او په پای کې د ادرار یا متیازو له لارې خارجیږي.
en-mt: The outer domain of ACE2 is cleaved from the transmembrane domain by another enzyme known as Shedase, and the final soluble protein circulates in the bloodstream and is eventually excreted in the urine or faeces.

sourceString: ACE2 is present in most organs: ACE2 is attached to the cell membrane of mainly lung type II alveolar cells, enterocytes of the small intestine, arterial and venous endothelial cells and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.
targetString: ACE2 په ډیرو ارګانونو کې شتون لري: ACE2 په اکثرو ارګانونو کې د اصلي سږو II ډول الوولر حجرو، د کوچنیو کولمو انتروسیټس، شریان او رګونو اندوتیلیل حجرو او د شریان هوارو عضلاتو حجرو سره وصل دی.
en-mt: ACE2 is present in many organs: ACE2 is associated with primary lung type II alveolar cells, small intestinal enterocytes, arterial and venous endothelial cells, and arterial smooth muscle cells in most organs.

sourceString: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.
targetString: د ACE2 mRNA بڼه په دماغي کورټکس، سټریټم، های پوتالاموس، او د مغزو ساقې کې هم موندل کیږي.
en-mt: ACE2 mRNA expression is also found in the cerebral cortex, striatum, hypothalamus, and brainstem.

sourceString: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counter balance to ACE.
targetString: د ACE2 لومړنۍ دنده د ACE لپاره د متوازن په توګه عمل کول دي.
en-mt: The primary function of ACE2 is to act as a counterbalance to ACE.

sourceString: ACE cleaves angiotensin I hormone into the vasoconstricting  angiotensin II.
targetString: ACE وایژونسټریکټر انجیوټینسین II په انجیوټینسین II هورمون کې جلا کوي.
en-mt: ACE cleaves the vasoconstrictor angiotensin II into the hormone angiotensin II.

sourceString: ACE2 in turn cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and hydrolyses it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).
targetString: ACE2، په خپل وار، د کاربوکسیل ټرمینل امینو اسید فینیلالینین د انجیوټینسین II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) څخه جلا کوي او په واسوډیلیټر انجیوټینسین (1-7)، (H-Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH) ته یې اړوي.
en-mt: ACE2, in turn, cleaves the carboxyl-terminal amino acid phenylalanine from angiotensin II (Asp-Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-Phe) and converts it into the vasodilator angiotensin (1-7), (H-Asp- Arg-Val-Tyr-Ile-His-Pro-OH).

sourceString: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides including [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.
targetString: ACE2 کولی شي یو شمیر نور پیپټایډونه هم جلا کړي لکه [des-Arg9] - بریډیکینین، اپیلین، نیوروټینسین، ډینورفین A، او ګریلین.
en-mt: ACE2 can also cleave a number of other peptides such as [des-Arg9]-bradykinin, apelin, neurotensin, dynorphin A, and ghrelin.

sourceString: ACE2 also regulates the membrane trafficking of the neutral amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and has been implicated in Hartnup's disease.
targetString: ACE2 هغه غشا هم تنظیموي چې د خنثی امینو اسید لیږدونکي SLC6A19 وي او د هارټینپ په ناروغۍ اخته شوی وي.
en-mt: ACE2 also regulates the membrane bound amino acid transporter SLC6A19 and is implicated in Hartnap disease.

sourceString: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main entry point into cells for some coronaviruses, including HCoV-NL63; SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).
targetString: د ټرانس میبرین پروټین په توګه، ACE2 د ځینې کوروناویروسونو لپاره حجرو ته د دننه کیدو اصلي ځای په توګه کار کوي، لکه د HCoV-NL63؛SARS-CoV  (هغه ویروس چې د SARS لامل کیږي)؛ اوSARS-CoV-2  (هغه ویروس چې د COVID-19 لامل کیږي).
en-mt: As a transmembrane protein, ACE2 serves as the main cell entry site for some coronaviruses, such as HCoV-NL63;SARS-CoV (the virus that causes SARS); and SARS-CoV-2 (the virus that causes COVID-19).

sourceString: More specifically, the binding of the spike S1 protein of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 to the enzymatic domain of ACE2 on the surface of cells results in endocytosis and translocation of both the virus and the enzyme into endosomes located within cells.
targetString: په ځانګړې توګه، د حجرو په سطحه کې د ACE2 انزایمیک ډومین سره د SARS-CoV او SARS-CoV2 د سپیک S1 پروټین تړل د ویروسونو او انزایمونو دواړو لپاره چې په حجرو کې میشت دي د انډوکوټیسس او لیږد لامل ګرځي.
en-mt: Specifically, binding of SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV2 Spike S1 protein to the ACE2 enzymatic domain on the cell surface leads to endocytosis and translocation of both viruses and enzymes that reside in cells.

sourceString: This entry process also requires priming of the S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is under current investigation as a potential therapeutic.This has led some to hypothesize that decreasing the levels of ACE2, in cells, might help in fighting the infection.
targetString: د ننوتلو دغه پروسه د کوربه سیرن پروټیز TMPRSS2 لخوا د S پروټین چمتو کولو ته هم اړتیا لري، چې د احتمالي معالجې په توګه ددې مخنیوی اوس مهال تر تحقیق لاندې دی. چې دا له ځینو سره ددې انګیرنې لامل ګرځیدلې چې په حجرو کې د ACE2 کچې کمول ښايي د ناروغۍ سره په مبارزه کې مرسته وکړي.
en-mt: This entry process also requires the production of S protein by the host serine protease TMPRSS2, the inhibition of which is currently under investigation as a potential therapy. This has led some to believe that reducing the level of ACE2 in cells may help fight the disease.

sourceString: However, multiple professional societies and regulatory bodies have recommended continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.
targetString: په هرصورت، ګڼو مسلکي ټولنو او تنظیموونکو ادارو د معیاري ACE مهار کونکي او د ARB درملنې ته د دوام ورکولو وړاندیز کړی.
en-mt: However, many professional societies and regulatory agencies recommend continuing standard ACE inhibitor and ARB therapy.

sourceString: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012, found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in risk of pneumonia compared with controls."
targetString: په جولايي 11، 2012 کې خپرې شوې سیستماتیکې بیاکتنې او میټا تحلیل وموندله چې "د ACE مهار کونکو کارول د کنټرولونو په پرتله د نمونیا په خطر کې د پام وړ 34% کمښت سره تړاو درلود."
en-mt: A systematic review and meta-analysis published on July 11, 2012 found that "use of ACE inhibitors was associated with a significant 34% reduction in the risk of pneumonia compared with controls."

sourceString: Moreover, "the risk of pneumonia was also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who were at higher risk of pneumonia, in particular those with stroke and heart failure.
targetString: سربیره پردې، "د نمونیا خطر په هغه ناروغانو کې هم کم شوی چې د ACE مهار کونکو سره یې درملنه شوې څوک چې د نمونیا له لوړ خطر سره مخ وو، په ځانګړي توګه هغه کسان چې د مغزي سکتې او زړه ناروغۍ یې درلودې.
en-mt: In addition, "the risk of pneumonia is also reduced in patients treated with ACE inhibitors who are at high risk of pneumonia, especially those who have had a stroke or heart disease.

sourceString: Use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia related mortality, although the results were less robust than for overall risk of pneumonia."
targetString: د ACE مهار کونکو کارولو د نمونیا اړوند مړینې کمولو سره هم تړاو درلود، که څه هم پایلې یې د نمونیا د عمومي خطر په پرتله لږې پیاوړې وې."
en-mt: "The use of ACE inhibitors was also associated with a reduction in pneumonia-related mortality, although the results were less robust than the overall risk of pneumonia."

sourceString: Recombinant human ACE2 (rhACE2) is surmised to be a novel therapy for acute lung injury, and appeared to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in piglets with a lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: د ACE2  انساني ترکیب (rhACE2) د سږو حاد ټپونو لپاره د نوې درملنې په توګه ګڼل کیږي او داسې ښکاري چې په خوګانو کې د لپپولیسسچارډ د راپارول شوي شدید تنفسي رنځ سنډروم سره د نبض هیموډینامیکس او آکسیجن اشباع ښه کوي.
en-mt: Human synthesis of ACE2 (rhACE2) is being considered as a new treatment for acute lung injury and appears to improve pulmonary hemodynamics and oxygen saturation in pigs with lipopolysaccharide-induced acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: The half-life of rhACE2 in human beings is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes in addition to the course of effect (duration) of 24 hours.
targetString: په انسانانو کې د rhACE2 نیم عمر شاوخوا 10 ساعته دی او د 24 ساعتونو لپاره د اغیزې (مودې) سربیره د عمل پیل یې 30 دقیقې دی.
en-mt: The half-life of rhACE2 in humans is about 10 hours and the onset of action is 30 minutes with an effect (duration) of 24 hours.

sourceString: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those with intolerance to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in diseases where circulating angiotensin II is elevated.Infused rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.
targetString: ډیری موندنې وړاندیز کوي چې rhACE2 ممکن د هغو کسانو لپاره هیله بخښونکي درمل وي چې د کلاسیک رینین - انجیوټینسین سیسټم مهار کونکو (RAS مهار کونکو) زغم ونلري یا په هغو ناروغیو کې چیرته چې انجیوټینسین II لوړ شوي وي. د حاد تنفسي رنځ سنډروم درملنې لپاره د rhACE2 تزریق کول په کلینیکي آزموینو کې ارزول شوي دي.
en-mt: Several findings suggest that rhACE2 may be a promising drug for those who are intolerant to classic renin-angiotensin system inhibitors (RAS inhibitors) or in patients with elevated angiotensin II. Injectable rhACE2 has been evaluated in clinical trials for the treatment of acute respiratory distress syndrome.

sourceString: b'COVID-19 apps are mobile software applications designed to aid contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e. the process of identifying persons ("contacts") who may have been in contact with an infected individual.
targetString: b'COVID-19 اپلیکیشنونه د مبایل سافټویر اپلیکیشنونه دي چې د 2019-20 کورونا ویرس ناروغۍ په غبرګون کې د اړیکې په تعقیب کې د مرستې لپاره طرحه شوي دي، د بیلګې په توګه، د هغو اشخاصو ("اړیکې") پیژندلو پروسه چې ښايي د اخته شوي کس سره په اړیکه کې وو.
en-mt: b'COVID-19 applications are mobile software applications designed to assist in contact tracing in response to the 2019-20 coronavirus pandemic, i.e., the process of identifying individuals ("contacts") who May have been in contact with an infected person.

sourceString: Numerous applications were developed or proposed, with official government support in some territories and jurisdictions.
targetString: په ځینو سیمو او قدرتونو کې بیلابیل اپلیکیشنونه د حکومتونو په رسمي ملاتړ سره رامینځته یا وړاندیز شول.
en-mt: In some regions and jurisdictions, various applications were developed or offered with the official support of governments.

sourceString: Several frameworks for building contact tracing apps have been developed.
targetString: د اړیکو تعقیب اپلیکیشن جوړولو لپاره ډیری چوکاټونه رامینځته شوي دي.
en-mt: Many frameworks have been developed to build contact tracking applications.

sourceString: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially about systems that are based on tracking the geographical location of app users.
targetString: د محرمیت اندیښنې راپورته شوي، په ځانګړي توګه د هغو سیسټمونو په اړه چې د اپلیکیشن کارونکو جغرافیایی موقعیت تعقیب پراساس جوړ شوي دي.
en-mt: Privacy concerns have been raised, especially regarding systems built on tracking the geographic location of app users.

sourceString: Less intrusive alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: په لږ شمیر مزاحم بدیلونو کې د بلوټوت سگنلونو کارول شامل دي تر څو کارونکی په نږدې کیدو سره د نورو ګرځنده ټلیفونونو ته دننه شي.
en-mt: A few funny alternatives include the use of Bluetooth signals to allow the user to enter other cell phones by proximity.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they would integrate functionality to support such Bluetooth-based apps directly into their Android and iOS operating systems.
targetString: په 10 اپریل 2020 کې، ګوګل او ایپل په ګډه اعلان وکړ چې دوی به په ګډه د بلوټوت پر بنسټ دغه اپلیکیشنونو څخه ملاتړ وکړي تر څو په مستقیم ډول ددوی په Android او iOS عملیاتي سیسټمونو کې کار وکړي.
en-mt: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple jointly announced that they will jointly support these Bluetooth-based applications to work directly on their Android and iOS operating systems.

sourceString: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has deployed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people that have COVID-19.
targetString: په چین کې، د چین حکومت، د Alipay سره په ګډه، یو داسې اپلیکیشن جوړ کړی چې ښاریانو ته اجازه ورکوي تر څو وګوري چې ایا دوی خو د هغو خلکو سره په اړیکه کې نه وو چې د کوویډ-19 ناروغي لري.
en-mt: In China, the Chinese government, in conjunction with Alipay, has developed an app that allows citizens to check if they have been in contact with people who have been diagnosed with Covid-19.

sourceString: It is in use across more than 200 Chinese cities.In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is being used.
targetString: دغه اپلیکیشن د چین له 200 څخه په ډیرو ښارونو کې کارول کیږي. په سینګاپور کې، د TraceTogether په نوم یو اپلیکیشن کارول کیږي.
en-mt: This application is used in more than 200 cities in China. In Singapore, an app called TraceTogether is used.

sourceString: The app was developed by local IT community, released as open source and will be handed over to the government.North Macedonia launched "StopKorona!", a Bluetooth-based app to trace exposure with potentially infected persons and  provide a fast response to healthcare authorities.
targetString: نوموړی اپلیکیشن د آی ټي سیمه ییزې ټولنې لخوا رامینځته شوی، چې د آزادې سرچینې په توګه خپور شوی او حکومت ته به وسپارل شي. شمالي مقدونیا د "StopKorona!" په نامه د بلوتوټ پربنسټ اپلیکیشن په لاره اچولی چې له احتمالي ناروغانو سره تماس معلوموي او د روغتیايي خدمتونو چارواکو ته ګړندی ځواب چمتو کوي.
en-mt: This application has been developed by the local IT community, which has been released as open source and will be submitted to the government. North Macedonia chants "StopKorona!" It has launched a Bluetooth-based application that detects contact with potential patients and provides quick response to health service officials.

sourceString: The app was developed by the Ministry of Communication and Technology and Ministry of Health.
targetString: دغه اپلیکیشن د مخابراتو او ټیکنالوژۍ وزارت او روغتیا وزارت لخوا رامینځته شوی دی.
en-mt: This application has been developed by the Ministry of Communications and Technology and the Ministry of Health.

sourceString: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and Apple App Store.
targetString: تر 14 اپریل 2020 پورې، اپلیکیشن د ګوګل پلی پلورنځي او اپل اپلیکیشن سټور لخوا منظورۍ ته په تمه وو.
en-mt: As of 14 April 2020, the app was awaiting approval by the Google Play Store and the Apple App Store.

sourceString: On 12 April, the government stated that the contact tracing app was in an advanced stage of development, and would be available for deployment within weeks.A similar app is planned in Ireland, and in France ("StopCovid").
targetString: په 12 اپریل، حکومت وویل چې د تماس تعقیب اپلیکیشن د پراختیا په وروستۍ مرحله کې دی، او په یو څو اوونیو کې به د ترلاسه کیدو وړ وي. ورته اپلیکیشن په آیرلینډ او فرانسه کې هم پلان شوی ("StopCovid").
en-mt: On April 12, the government said the contact tracing app was in the final stages of development, and would be available in a few weeks. A similar app is also planned in Ireland and France ("StopCovid").

sourceString: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering apps based on Singapore's TraceTogether app and BlueTrace protocol.Russia intends to introduce a geofencing app for patients diagnosed with COVID-19 living in Moscow, designed to ensure they do not leave home.
