targetString: آسټرالیا او نیوزیلینډ دواړه د سینګاپور د TraceTogether اپلیکیشن او BlueTrace پروټوکول پر بنسټ پر اپلیکیشنونو غور کوي. روسیه په پام کې لري چې په ماسکو کې د هغو ناروغانو لپاره چې په کوویډ-19 ناروغۍ اخته دي د geofencing اپلیکیشن معرفي کړي، او پداسې بڼه جوړ شوی تر څو ډاډ ترلاسه شي چې دوی له کور څخه بهر نه ځي.
en-mt: Both Australia and New Zealand are considering applications based on Singapore's TraceTogether application and the BlueTrace protocol. Russia is planning to introduce a geofencing app for patients suffering from Covid-19 in Moscow, designed to ensure they don't leave their homes.

sourceString: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at Cambridge University, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and the potential lack of effectiveness if takeup of the app is limited to only a small fraction of the population.
targetString: راس انډرسن، د کیمبرج پوهنتون د امنیت انجینرۍ پروفیسر، د اپلیکیشن پر بنسټ سیسټمونو کې یو شمیر احتمالي عملي ستونزې لیست کړي، د هغو غلطو مثبتو پایلو او د اغیزمنتیا احتمالي نشتون په شمول که چیرې د اپلیکیشن کارول یوازې د خلکو لږې برخې پورې محدود وي.
en-mt: Ross Anderson, professor of security engineering at the University of Cambridge, listed a number of potential practical problems with app-based systems, including false positives and a potential lack of effectiveness if app use is limited to a small portion of the population. .

sourceString: Addressing concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple set limits on which types of organizations could add coronavirus-related apps to its App Store, limiting them to only "official" or otherwise reputable organizations.
targetString: د ګمراه کونکي یا زیان رسونکي "کوروناویروس" اپلیکیشنونو خپرولو په اړه اندیښنو ته په پام سره، اپل محدودیتونه ټاکلي چې کوم ډول سازمانونه کولی شي په اپل سټور کې د کوروناویروس اړوند اپلیکیشنونه اضافه کړي. دا یې یوازې په "رسمي" یا په بل عبارت، په مشهورو سازمانونو پورې محدود کړي دي.
en-mt: Given concerns about the spread of misleading or harmful "coronavirus" apps, Apple has set restrictions on what types of organizations can add coronavirus-related apps to the App Store. It has been limited to only "official" or in other words, popular organizations.

sourceString: Google and Amazon have implemented similar restrictions.
targetString: ګوګل او ایمیزون هم ورته محدودیتونه وضع کړي دي.
en-mt: Google and Amazon have also imposed similar restrictions.

sourceString: Privacy campaigners voiced their concern regarding the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, in particular about whether surveillance infrastructure created to deal with the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled once the threat has passed.
targetString: د محرمیت کمپاینرانو د کوروناویروس اپلیکیشنونو په کارولو سره د ډله ایزې څارنې اغیزو په اړه خپله اندیښنه څرګنده کړه، په ځانګړي توګه پدې اړه چې آیا د کروناویروس وبا سره د مبارزې کولو لپاره د څارنې رامینځته شوې زیربنا به له مینځه وړله شي کله چې دغه ګواښ پای ته ورسید.
en-mt: Privacy campaigners have expressed concern about the implications of mass surveillance using coronavirus apps, particularly over whether the surveillance infrastructure built to combat the coronavirus pandemic will be dismantled when the threat looms. finished

sourceString: Amnesty International and over 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for limits on this kind of surveillance.
targetString: د بخښنې نړیوال سازمان او له سلو څخه زیاتو نورو سازمانونو یوه اعلامیه خپره کړې چې ددې ډول څارنې لپاره یې د محدودیتونو غوښتنه وکړه.
en-mt: Amnesty International and more than 100 other organizations issued a statement calling for restrictions on such surveillance.

sourceString: The organisations declared eight conditions on governmental projects:
targetString: پورته یادو سازمانونو د دولتي پروژو په اړه اته شرطونه اعلان کړل:
en-mt: The above-mentioned organizations announced eight conditions regarding government projects:

sourceString: surveillance would have to be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";
targetString: څارنه باید "قانوني ، لازمي او متناسبه" وي؛
en-mt: Monitoring must be "lawful, necessary and proportionate";

sourceString: extensions of monitoring and surveillance would have to have sunset clauses;
targetString: د نظارت او څارنې غځول باید د پای ته رسولو فقرې ولري؛
en-mt: Monitoring and monitoring extensions should contain termination clauses;

sourceString: the use of data would have to be limited to COVID-19 purposes;
targetString: د معلوماتو کارول به د کوویډ-19 موخو پورې محدود وي؛
en-mt: Use of information will be limited to Covid-19 purposes;

sourceString: data security and anonymity would have to be protected and shown to be protected based on evidence;
targetString: د معلوماتو امنیت او ناڅرګندوالی باید خوندي وساتل شي او د شواهدو پراساس خوندي شي؛
en-mt: Data security and confidentiality must be protected and protected based on evidence;

sourceString: digital surveillance would have to avoid exacerbating discrimination and marginalisation;
targetString: ډیجیټل څارنه باید د تبعیض او څنډې ته کیدو مخه ونیسي؛
en-mt: Digital surveillance should prevent discrimination and marginalization;

sourceString: any sharing of data with third parties would have to be defined in law;
targetString: د دریمې ډلې سره د معلوماتو شریکول باید قانون کې تعریف شي؛
en-mt: Sharing information with third parties should be defined in law;

sourceString: there would have to be safeguards against abuse and the rights of citizens to respond to abuses;
targetString: ناوړې ګټې اخیستنې ته د ځواب ویلو لپاره باید د ناوړې ګټې اخیستنې پر وړاندې او د اتباعو حقونو په اړه محافظتونه موجود وي؛
en-mt: Protections against abuse and citizens' rights must be in place to respond to abuse;

sourceString: meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" would be required, including that of public health experts and marginalised groups.The German Chaos Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Reporter ohne Grenzen) (RSF) also issued checklists.
targetString: د ټولو "اړونده ذیدخلو" لخوا معنی لرونکې ګډون ته اړتیا لیدل کیږي، د عامې روغتیا کارپوهانو او څنډې ته شوو ډلو په شمول. د آلمان د بې نظمۍ کمپیوټر کلب (CCC) او د بې پولې خبریالانو (اوه ګرینزین راپور ورکونکی) (RSF) هم چیک لیستونه خپاره کړل.
en-mt: Meaningful participation by all "relevant stakeholders" is needed, including public health experts and marginalized groups. The German Unorganized Computer Club (CCC) and Reporters Without Borders (Ou Grenzen Reporter) (RSF) also published checklists.

sourceString: The proposed Google/Apple plan intends to address the problem of persistent surveillance by removing the tracing mechanism from their device operating systems once it is no longer needed.
targetString: ګوګل/اپل وړاندیز شوی پلان په پام کې لري ترڅو د خپلې آلې عملیاتي سیسټمونو څخه د تعقیب میکانیزم لرې کولو سره د دوامدارې څارنې ستونزه حل کړي کله چې نوره اړتیا نه وي.
en-mt: Google/Apple is considering a proposed plan to solve the persistent tracking problem by removing the tracking mechanism from its device operating systems when it is no longer needed.

sourceString: Some countries used network-based location tracking instead of apps, eliminating both the need to download an app and the ability to avoid tracking.
targetString: ځینې هیوادونو د اپلیکیشن پرځای د شبکې پر بنسټ د موقعیت تعقیب کارولی، چې د اپلیکیشن ډاونلوډ کولو اړتیا یې له منځه وړې او د تعقیب مخنیوي وړتیا لري.
en-mt: Some countries have used network-based location tracking instead of an app, which eliminates the need to download an app and has the ability to block tracking.

sourceString: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.
targetString: په اسرایلو کې، د شبکې پربنسټ تعقیب منظور شو.
en-mt: In Israel, network-based tracking was approved.

sourceString: Network-based solutions that have access to raw location data have significant potential privacy problems.
targetString: د شبکې پربنسټ حل لارې چې د خام موقعیت ډیټا ته لاسرسی لري د احتمالي محرمیت پام وړ ستونزې لري.
en-mt: Network-based solutions that access raw location data have significant potential privacy issues.

sourceString: However, not all systems with central servers need to have access to personal location data; a number of privacy-preserving systems have been created that use central servers only for intercommunication (see section below).
targetString: که څه هم، ټول مرکزي سیسټمونه د مرکزي سرورونو په درلودلو سره اړتیا نلري چې د شخصي موقعیت ډیټا ته لاسرسی ولري؛ د محرمیت خوندي کولو یو شمیر سیسټمونه جوړ شوي چې مرکزي سرورونه یوازې د داخلي اړیکې لپاره کاروي (لاندې برخه وګورئ).
en-mt: However, not all centralized systems have central servers that have access to personal location data; A number of privacy-preserving systems have been developed that use centralized servers for internal communication only (see section below).

sourceString: In South Korea, a non-app-based system was used to perform contact tracing.
targetString: په سویلي کوریا کې، د تماس تعقیب ترسره کولو لپاره د اپلیکیشن پرته سیسټم وکارول شو.
en-mt: In South Korea, an appless system was used to conduct contact tracing.

sourceString: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system gathered tracking information from a variety of sources including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined these to generate notices via text messages to potentially-infected individuals.
targetString: د ځانګړي شوي اپلیکیشن کارولو پرځای، سیسټم له بیلابیلو سرچینو څخه د ګرځنده وسیلو د تعقیب ډیټا او د کارت راکړې ورکړې ډیټا په شمول د تعقیب معلومات راټول کړل، او سره یوځای یې کړل ترڅو احتمالي ناروغۍ لرونکو اشخاصو ته د لنډو پیغامونو له لارې خبر ورکړي.
en-mt: Instead of using a dedicated app, the system collected tracking data from various sources, including mobile device tracking data and card transaction data, and combined them to notify potentially infected individuals via text messages. .

sourceString: In addition to using this information to alert potential contacts, the government has also made the location information publicly available, something permitted because of far-reaching changes to information privacy laws after the MERS outbreak in that country.
targetString: د تماس موندونکو احتمالي کسانو ته د خبر ورکولو لپاره ددې معلوماتو کارولو سربیره، حکومت د موقعیت معلوماتو ته عامه لاسرسی آزاد کړئ، چې په هیواد کې د MERS خپریدو وروسته د معلوماتو محرمیت قوانینو کې د خورا پراخه بدلونونو له امله دغه څه ته اجازه ورکړل شوې ده.
en-mt: In addition to using this information to notify potential contacts, the government has released public access to location data, which has been allowed by sweeping changes to data privacy laws since the MERS outbreak in the country. is

sourceString: This information is available to the public via a number of apps and websites.Countries including Germany considered using both centralized and privacy-preserving systems.
targetString: خلک دغو معلوماتو ته د یو شمیر اپلیکیشنونو او ویب پاڼو له لارې لاسرسی لري. د آلمان په شمول نور هیوادونه مرکزي او د محرمیت ساتلو سیستمونه کاروي.
en-mt: People access this information through a number of apps and websites. Other countries, including Germany, use centralized and privacy-preserving systems.

sourceString: As of 6 April 2020, the details had not yet been released.
targetString: تر 6 اپریل 2020 پورې، لاهم پدې اړه جزیات ندي خپاره شوي.
en-mt: As of 6 April 2020, no details have been released yet.

sourceString: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is a well-established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013.As of 7 April 2020, over a dozen expert groups were working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as using Bluetooth Low Energy (BLE) to log a user's proximity to other cellphones.
targetString: د محرمیت ساتنې د تماس تعقیب یوه رامنځته شوې ښه مفکوره ده، چې د ادب څیړنې کافي برخه یې حداقل 2013 کال سره نږدیوالی لري.تر 7 اپریل 2020 پورې، د کارپوهانو لسګونو ډلو د محرمیت دوستانه حل لارو باندې کار کاوه، لکه د بلوټوت کمه انرژي (BLE) کارول تر څو کارونکی په نږدې کیدو سره د نورو ګرځنده ټلیفونونو ته دننه شي.
en-mt: Privacy-preserving contact tracing is an established concept, with a substantial body of research literature dating back to at least 2013. As of April 7, 2020, dozens of expert groups are working on privacy-friendly solutions, such as Bluetooth dimming. Energy (BLE) is used to allow the user to enter other mobile phones by proximity.

sourceString: However, PEPP-PT is a co-ordination effort which contains both centralised and decentralised approaches, and is not a single protocol.Decentralised protocols include Decentralized Privacy-Preserving Proximity Tracing (DP-PPT/DP-3T), Temporary Contact Numbers (TCN, fka Contact Event Numbers, CEN), Privacy Sensitive Protocols and Mechanisms for Mobile Contact Tracing (PACT) and others.
targetString: په هرصورت، PEPP-PT د همغږۍ هڅه ده چې مرکزي او غیرمرکزي شوي دواړه طریقې لري او یو واحد پروتوکول نلري. په غیرمتمرکز پروتوکولونو کې د نږدې کیدو محرمیت ساتنې غیرمرکزي تعقیب (DP-PPT/DP-3T)، د لنډمهاله تماس شمیرې (TCN، د fka د تماس پیښو شمیرې، CEN)، د محرمیت حساسیت پروتوکولونه او د ګرځنده اړیکو تعقیب میکانیزمونه (PACT) او نور شامل دي.
en-mt: However, PEPP-PT is a coordinated effort that has both centralized and decentralized approaches and does not have a single protocol. Decentralized Proximity Privacy Preserving Tracking (DP-PPT/DP-3T) in decentralized protocols, temporary contact numbers (TCN, fka contact event numbers, CEN), privacy sensitive protocols and mobile communication tracking mechanisms (PACT ) and others included.

sourceString: In these protocols, identifiable personal data never leaves the device, and all matching happens on-device.
targetString: پدې پروتوکولونو کې، د تشخیص وړ شخصي معلومات هیڅکله آله نه پریږدي، او ټول پرتله کول په آله کې ترسره کیږي.
en-mt: In these protocols, personally identifiable information never leaves the device, and all comparisons are made on the device.

sourceString: The Privacy Group at MIT Media Lab has been developing SafePaths, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.
targetString: د محرمیت ګروپ کله چې د COVID-19 خپریدو تعقیب کولو لپاره د موقعیت یا لارې د تقاطع ډیټا راټولوي او کاروي په MIT میډیا لیب کې SafePaths رامینځته کوي، چې دا د محرمیت ساتنې تخنیکونو کارولو لپاره یو پلیټ فارم دی.
en-mt: The privacy group is developing SafePaths at the MIT Media Lab, a platform for using privacy-preserving techniques when collecting and using location or path intersection data to track the spread of COVID-19.

sourceString: It is based on research from the whitepaper "Apps Gone Rogue: Maintaining Personal Privacy in an Epidemic" released in March 2020.Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, a company developing privacy technologies that was also originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.
targetString: دا په مارچ 2020 کې د وایټ پیپر "ایپس ګون روګ: په وبا کې د شخصي محرمیت ساتل" په سرلیک د خپرې شوې څیړنې پراساس جوړ شوی پلیټ فارم دی.بله ورته هڅه د انیګما MPC لخوا د SafeTrace پلیټ فارم جوړول دي، چې نوموړی د محرمیت ټیکنالوژیو جوړولو یو شرکت دی او په اصل کې په MIT میډیا لیب کې هم رامینځته شوی وو.
en-mt: It is a platform built on research published in the March 2020 white paper titled "Apps Gone Rogue: Protecting Personal Privacy in an Epidemic." Another similar effort is the SafeTrace platform by Enigma MPC, which is is a company developing privacy technologies and was originally founded at the MIT Media Lab.

sourceString: SafeTrace utilizes secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health data with other users and officials, without compromising the privacy of that data.
targetString: SafeTrace د هارډویر خوندي ټیکنالوژیو څخه کار اخلي ترڅو کاروونکو ته اجازه ورکړي چې حساس موقعیت او د روغتیا معلومات له نورو کاروونکو او چارواکو سره شریک کړ ، پرته لدې چې ددې معلوماتو محرمیت پر سر هوکړه وشي.
en-mt: SafeTrace uses secure hardware technologies to allow users to share sensitive location and health information with other users and authorities, without having to agree on the confidentiality of that information.

sourceString: On 5 April 2020, the global TCN Coalition was founded by groups that had coalesced around what was essentially the same approach and largely overlapping protocols, with the goal to reduce fragmentation, and enable global interoperability of tracing and alerting apps, a key aspect of achieving widespread adoption.
targetString: په 5 اپریل 2020 کې، د TCN نړیوال ایتلاف د یو شمیر ډلو لخوا رامینځته شو چې شاوخوا ورته کړنلارې او په لویه کچه پراخ پروتوکولونه یې سره یو ځای کړل چې موخه یې د تجزیې راکمول، او د تعقیب او د خبرتیا اپلیکیشنونو په برخه کې نړیوالې همکارۍ ته زمینه برابرول چې په پراخه کچه د کارونې موخې ترلاسه کولو یو کلیدي اړخ دی.
en-mt: On 5 April 2020, the TCN International Consortium was formed by a number of groups that brought together similar approaches and largely comprehensive protocols aimed at reducing analytics, and internationalization in tracking and alerting applications. Facilitating collaboration is a key aspect of achieving the goal of widespread use.

sourceString: On 9 April 2020, the Singaporean government announced that it had open-sourced the BlueTrace protocol used by its official government app.
targetString: په 9 اپریل 2020، د سنګاپور حکومت اعلان وکړ چې د BlueTrace پروتوکول یې د آزادې سرچینې په توګه آزاد کړی دی چې ددوی د رسمي حکومتي اپلیکیشن لخوا کارول کیږي.
en-mt: On 9 April 2020, the Singapore government announced that it has released the BlueTrace protocol as open source to be used by its official government applications.

sourceString: On 10 April 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative for contact tracing, which they claimed would preserve privacy, based on a combination of Bluetooth Low Energy technology and privacy-preserving cryptography.
targetString: په 10 اپریل 2020 کې، ګوګل او اپل، هغه شرکتونه چې د انډرویډ او iOS مبایل پلیټ فارمونه کنټرولوي، د اړیکې تعقیب لپاره یو نوښت اعلان کړ، چې ددوی د ادعا له مخې د محرمیت ساتنه به کوي او د بلوتوټ کمې انرژۍ ټیکنالوژۍ او د محرمیت ساتلو کریپټوګرافۍ ترکیب پراساس به جوړ شي.
en-mt: On April 10, 2020, Google and Apple, the companies that control the Android and iOS mobile platforms, announced an initiative to track communications, which they claim will protect privacy and use Bluetooth Low Energy technology and Privacy-preserving cryptography will be built based on the combination.

sourceString: They also published specifications of the core technologies used in the system.
targetString: دوی په دغه سیستم کې د اصلي ټیکنالوژیو کارول شوي مشخصات هم خپاره کړل.
en-mt: They also published the specifications of the main technologies used in this system.

sourceString: According to Apple and Google, the system is intended to be rolled out in three stages:
targetString: د اپل او ګوګل په وینا، په پام کې ده چې دغه سیسټم په دریو مرحلو کې پلی شي:
en-mt: According to Apple and Google, this system is planned to be implemented in three phases:

sourceString: rollout of tools to enable governments to create official privacy-preserving coronavirus tracing apps
targetString: دداسې وسیلو په لاره اچول ترڅو دولتونه وکولی شي د محرمیت ساتنې کوروناویروس د تعقیب رسمي اپلیکیشنونه جوړ کړي
en-mt: Launching tools to enable governments to create official privacy-protecting coronavirus tracking apps

sourceString: integration of this functionality directly into iOS and AndroidGoogle and Apple plan to address the take-up and persistent surveillance problems by first distributing the system through operating system updates, and later removing it in the same way once the threat has passed.
targetString: په مستقیم ډول د iOS او انډرویډ گوگل او اپل پلان کې د دې فعالیت ادغام کول ترڅو لومړی د فعالیتي سیسټم تازه کولو له لارې د سیسټم توزیع کولو په واسطه او وروسته په ورته طریقې سره کله چې ګواښ پای ته ورسید د معلوماتو په لرې کولو سره د څارنې د پیل او دوامدارې ستونزې حل کړي.
en-mt: Integrating this functionality directly into iOS and Android Google and Apple plan to first deploy the system through a functional system update and then remove the data in the same way when the threat is over. Troubleshoot startup and ongoing monitoring problems.

sourceString: b'Drug repositioning (also known as drug repurposing, re-profiling, re-tasking or therapeutic switching) is the repurposing of an approved drug for the treatment of a different disease or medical condition than that for which it was originally developed.
targetString: د هغې ناروغۍ د درملنې پر ځای د کوم لپاره چې دا په اصل کې جوړ شوی و، د درملو موقف بدلونه (د بل هدف لپاره د درملو کارولو، بیا پروفایل کولو، بیا ګمارلو یا د درملنې بدلولو په نوم هم پیژندل کیږي) د بلې ناروغۍ یا طبي حالت درملنې لپاره د منل شوي درمل بیا ځلې کارولو ته وايي.
en-mt: Repurposing a drug (also known as repurposing, reprofiling, repurposing, or repurposing a drug) to treat another disease instead of treating the disease for which it was originally designed. Refers to the repeated use of an approved drug to treat a disease or medical condition.

sourceString: This is one line of scientific research which is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective COVID-19 treatments.
targetString: دا د ساینسي څیړنو یوه کرښه ده چې اوس مهال د کوویډ-19 خوندي او اغیزمنې درملنې رامینځته کولو لپاره تعقبیږي.
en-mt: This is a line of scientific research that is currently being pursued to develop safe and effective treatments for Covid-19.

sourceString: Other research directions include the development of a COVID-19 vaccine and convalescent plasma transfusion.SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.
targetString: د څیړنې په نورو لارښوونو کې د کوویډ-19 واکسین جوړول او کانالې ته د پلازما لیږد شامل دي. SARS-CoV-2 شاوخوا 66 د درملو سره د ښه کیدو وړ پروټینونه لري چې هر یو یې د لیګانیډ د تړلو ګڼ شمیر نقطې لري.
en-mt: Other research directions include the development of a Covid-19 vaccine and the transfer of plasma into the canal. SARS-CoV-2 has about 66 druggable proteins, each of which has multiple ligand binding sites.

sourceString: Analyzing those binding sites provide the reasonable project of developing effective antiviral drug against COVID-19 proteins.
targetString: د تړلو دغو نقطو تحلیل د کوویډ-19 پروټینونو پروړاندې د ویروس ضد اغیزمنو درملو رامینځته کولو مناسبې پروژه وړاندې کوي.
en-mt: The analysis of these binding points provides a suitable project to develop effective antiviral drugs against the Covid-19 proteins.

sourceString: Of the most important SARS-CoV-2 target proteins are papain-like protease, RNA dependent RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.
targetString: د SARS-CoV-2 خورا مهم د هدف پروټینونه عبارت دي له پاپین ډوله پروټیز، د RNA اړوند RNA پولیمریز، هیلیکیس، S پروټین، او ADP ریبو فاسفاټیس څخه.
en-mt: The most important target proteins of SARS-CoV-2 include papain-type protease, RNA-associated RNA polymerase, helicase, S protein, and ADP ribophosphatase.

sourceString: Hussein A A, et al studied several candidate compounds which then optimized and analyzed for their skeleton similarity with the highest similar approved drugs in order to accelerate a potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drug development in his preclinical study to be recommended in a clinical study design.
targetString: حسین A A او ملګرو یې یو شمیر انتخابیدونکي مرکبونه مطالعه کړل، چې بیا یې دوی ترټولو ورته منل شوو درملو سره د اسکلیت ورته والي موندلو لپاره ددوی مطلوبیت او تحلیل ترسره کړ، ترڅو په پریکلینیکل مطالعه کې د SARS-CoV-2 ضد قوي درملو انکشاف ګړندی کړي او د کلینیکي څیړنې طرحې ته یې وړاندیز کړي.
en-mt: Hussain AA and colleagues studied a number of selective compounds, which they then optimized and analyzed to find their skeletal similarity to the most approved drugs, in order to develop potent anti-SARS-CoV-2 drugs in preclinical studies. Accelerate and recommend clinical research design.

sourceString: Chloroquine is an anti-malarial medication that is also used against some auto-immune diseases.
targetString: کلوروکین د ملاریا ضد یو ډول درمل دي چې د ځینو اتومات معافیت ناروغیو پروړاندې هم کارول کیږي.
en-mt: Chloroquine is a type of antimalarial drug that is also used against some autoimmune diseases.

sourceString: On 18 March, the WHO announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among the four drugs studied as part of the Solidarity clinical trial.
targetString: په 18 مارچ، د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان اعلان وکړ چې کلوروکین او اړوند هایډروکسي کلوروکین به د هغه څلور درملو څخه وي چې د پيوستون کلینیکي آزمایښت برخې په توګه به مطالعه شي.
en-mt: On March 18, the World Health Organization announced that chloroquine and the related hydroxychloroquine would be among four drugs to be studied as part of a joint clinical trial.

sourceString: New York governor Andrew Cuomo announced that New York State trials of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine would begin on 24 March.On 28 March, the FDA authorized the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an Emergency Use Authorization (EUA).
targetString: د نیویارک والي انډریو کوومو اعلان وکړ چې د نیویارک ایالت د کلوروکین او هایډروکسي کلوروکین آزمایښت به په 24 مارچ پیل شي. په 28 مارچ، FDA د اضطراري استعمال اجازې (EUA) له مخې د هایډروکسي کلوروکین سلفیټ او کلوروکین فاسفیت کارولو اجازه ورکړه.
en-mt: New York Governor Andrew Cuomo has announced that New York State testing of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine will begin on March 24. On March 28, the FDA approved the use of hydroxychloroquine sulfate and chloroquine phosphate under an emergency use authorization (EUA).

sourceString: The treatment has not been approved by the FDA's clinical trials process and is authorized under the EUA only as an experimental treatment for emergency use in patients who are hospitalized but are not able to receive treatment in a clinical trial.
targetString: ددغو درملو درملنه د FDA د کلینیکي آزمایښت پروسې لخوا نه ده تایید شوې او د EUA له مخې یوازې په هغو ناروغانو باندې د اضطراري کارونې تجربوي درملنې په توګه تایید شوې چې په روغتون کې بستر شوي خو په کلینیکي آزمایښت کې د درملنې وړ ندي.
en-mt: These drug treatments have not been approved by the FDA's clinical trial process and are only approved under the EUA as an experimental treatment for emergency use in hospitalized patients who are not eligible for treatment in a clinical trial.

sourceString: The CDC has said that "the use, dosing, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for prophylaxis or treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" are not yet established.
targetString: CDC ویلي چې "د SARS-CoV-2 انتان د درملنې لپاره د هایډروکسي کلوروکین کارول، ډوز، یا موده" لاهم معلومه شوې نه ده.
en-mt: The CDC stated that "the use, dose, or duration of hydroxychloroquine for the treatment of SARS-CoV-2 infection" has not yet been determined.

sourceString: Doctors have said they are using the drug when "there's no other option".
targetString: ډاکټرانو ویلي چې دوی به تر هغې دغه درمل کاروي تر څو "بل انتخاب ونلري".
en-mt: Doctors said they would use the drug until "there is no other option".

sourceString: A Turkish research team in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin A, vitamin C and vitamin D.
targetString: په استانبول کې د ترکیې یوه څیړونکې ډله د زینک، ویټامین اۍ، ویټامین سي، او ویټامین ډي په ترکیب کې د کلوروکین کارولو په اړه یوه کوچنۍ څیړنه ترسره کوي.
en-mt: A Turkish research group in Istanbul is conducting a small study on the use of chloroquine in combination with zinc, vitamin E, vitamin C, and vitamin D.

sourceString: Large studies are underway at Duke University and the University of Oxford.
targetString: په ډیوک او اکسفورډ پوهنتونونو کې لویې څیړنې روانې دي.
en-mt: Major research is underway at Duke and Oxford universities.

sourceString: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and efficacy of preventative use of hydroxychloroquine.
targetString: د NYU لانګون طبي ښوونځی د هایدروکسي کلوروکین مخنیوي کارونې خوندیتوب او اغیزمنتوب په اړه ازموینه ترسره کوي.
en-mt: NYU Langone Medical School is conducting a trial on the safety and effectiveness of hydroxychloroquine as a preventative.

sourceString: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen claimed to show favipiravir was "clearly effective".
targetString: په ووهان او شینزوین کې چینایي کلینیکي آزمایښتونو ادعا کړې او ښودلې یې ده چې فاویپیراویر "په څرګنده توګه اغیزناک" درمل دي.
en-mt: Chinese clinical trials in Wuhan and Shenzhen have claimed and shown that favipiravir is a "clearly effective" drug.

sourceString: 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative in a median of 4 days, while the length of illness was 11 days in the 45 patients who did not receive it.
targetString: ددغو درملو په ترلاسه کولو سره په شینزوین کې په 35 ناروغانو کې د 4 ورځو په اوسط سره معاینه منفي شوه، پداسط حال کې چې په هغو 45 ناروغانو کې د ناروغۍ اوږدوالی 11 ورځې وو چا چې دغه درمل نه وو ترلاسه کړي.
en-mt: After receiving these drugs, 35 patients in Shenzhen tested negative for an average of 4 days, while the length of illness in 45 patients who did not receive these drugs was 11 days.

sourceString: In a study conducted in Wuhan on 240 patients with pneumonia, half were given favipiravir and half received umifenovir.
targetString: په یوه څیړنه کې چې په ووهان کې په نمونیا 240 اخته ناروغانو باندې ترسره شوې، نیمایي ناروغانو ته فاویپراپیر او نیمایي نورو ته اومیفینویر ورکړل شول.
en-mt: In a study of 240 patients with pneumonia in Wuhan, half of the patients were given favipravir and the other half were given omefenavir.

sourceString: The Italian Pharmaceutical Agency reminded the public that the existing evidence in support of the drug is scant and preliminary.
targetString: د ایټالیا د درمل جوړولو ادارې خلکو ته یادونه کړې چې د درملو اړوند موجود شواهد کم او لومړني دي.
en-mt: The Italian Medicines Agency has reminded the public that the available evidence on the drug is limited and preliminary.

sourceString: On 2 April, Germany announced that it would purchase the drug from Japan for its stockpile, and use the military to deliver the drug to university hospitals, where the drug will be used to treat COVID-19 patients.
targetString: په 2 اپریل، آلمان اعلان وکړ چې دوی به له جاپان څخه د ذخیره کولو لپاره درمل واخلي، او د پوهنتونونو روغتونونو ته د درملو رسولو لپاره به له اردو څخه کار واخلي، چیرته چې به دغه درمل به د کوویډ-19 ناروغانو درملنې لپاره وکارول شي.
en-mt: On April 2, Germany announced that it would buy medicine from Japan for stockpiling, and use the military to deliver the medicine to university hospitals, where the medicine would be used to treat Covid-19 patients. become

sourceString: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made overtures to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug.The drug may be less effective in severe cases of illness where the virus has already multiplied.
targetString: د سویلي چین مارنینګ پوسټ په وینا، شینزو ابې د درملو پیرودلو په اړه د ټرمپ ادارې ته وړاندیزونه کړي دي. درمل ښايي په هغو ځایونو کې د ناروغۍ په سختو قضیو کې لږ اغیزناک تمام شي چیرته چې ویروس دمخه څو ځله زیات خپور شوی دی.
en-mt: According to the South China Morning Post, Shinzo Abe has made suggestions to the Trump administration about purchasing the drug. Medicines may be less effective in severe cases of the disease in places where the virus has already spread many times.

sourceString: It may not be safe for use by pregnant women or those trying to conceive.
targetString: د درملو کارول ممکن د امیندواره میرمنو یا د هغه کسانو لپاره چې د امیندوارۍ پلان لري خوندي نه وي.
en-mt: The use of the drug may not be safe for pregnant women or those who are planning to become pregnant.

sourceString: One study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kaletra), a combination of the antivirals lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that "no benefit was observed".
targetString: د لوپیناویر/ریتوناویر (کالیټرا) یوه مطالعه، چې د ویروس ضد لوپیناویر او ریتوناویر ترکیب دی، دغې پایلې ته رسیدلې چې "هیڅ ګټه نلري".
en-mt: A study of lopinavir/ritonavir (Kalitra), a combination of the antiviral lopinavir and ritonavir, concluded that there was "no benefit."

sourceString: The drugs were designed to inhibit HIV from replicating by binding to the protease.
targetString: دغه درمل د HIV مخنیوي لپاره ډیزاین شوي وو چې له پروټیس سره په نښلولو د تکرار مخه ونیسي.
en-mt: These drugs were designed to prevent HIV from replicating by attaching to the protease.

sourceString: A team of researchers at the University of Colorado are trying to modify the drugs to find a compound that will bind with the protease of SARS-CoV-2.There are criticisms within the scientific community about directing resources to repurposing drugs specifically developed for HIV/AIDS.
targetString: د کولوراډو په پوهنتون کې د څیړونکو یوه ډله هڅه کوي چې دغه درمل اصلاح کړي ترڅو داسې مرکب ومومي چې د SARS-CoV-2 پروټیز سره وابسته شي.په ساینسي ټولنه کې د هغه چا پر وړاندې نیوکې موجودې دي چې سرچینو ته لارښوونه کوي چې د نورو ناروغیو منل شوي درمل ددغې ناروغۍ د درملنې لپاره برابر کړي په ځانګړي توګه د HIV/AIDS لپاره جوړ شوي درمل.
en-mt: A group of researchers at the University of Colorado is trying to refine the drug to find a compound that binds to the SARS-CoV-2 protease. Other approved drugs are available to treat this disease, especially drugs developed for HIV/AIDS.

sourceString: The WHO included lopinavir/ritonavir in the international Solidarity trial.
targetString: د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان د نړیوال پیوستون په آزمایښت کې د لوپیناویر/ریتونوویر درمل هم شامل کړل.
en-mt: The World Health Organization also included the drug lopinavir/ritonavir in a global consolidation trial.

sourceString: Remdesivir was created and developed by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections . Gilead Sciences subsequently discovered that Remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against multiple filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and corona- viruses .
targetString: ریمډیسویر د ایبولا ویروس ناروغۍ او ماربرګ ویروس انتاناتو درملنې په توګه د ګیلاد علومو لخوا رامینځته شوي او جوړ شوي وو. د ګیلاد علومو وروسته وموندله چې ریمډیسویر د ګڼو فیلو، نیومو-، پارامیکسو-، او کورونا ویروسونو په وړاندې په ویټرو کې د ویروس ضد فعالیت درلود.
en-mt: Remdesivir was developed and manufactured by Gilead Sciences as a treatment for Ebola virus disease and Marburg virus infections. Gilead Sciences later found that remdesivir had antiviral activity in vitro against several filo-, pneumo-, paramyxo-, and coronaviruses.

sourceString: One issue with antiviral treatment is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.
targetString: د ویروس ضد درملنې یوه مسله د بدلونونو له لارې د مقاومت وده ده چې کولی شي د ډیرې شدیدې ناروغۍ او لیږد لامل شي.
en-mt: One issue with antiviral therapy is the development of resistance through mutations that can lead to more severe disease and transmission.

sourceString: Some early pretrial studies suggest remdesivir may have a high genetic barrier to resistance.There are several clinical trials underway, including two conducted by Cleveland University Hospitals; one for people with moderate illness and another for those with more severe illness.
targetString: د آزمایښت څخه وړاندې ځینې څیړنې وړاندیز کوي چې ریمډیسویر ښايي د مقاومت لپاره لوړ جنیټیکي خنډ وګرځي. ګڼې کلینیکي آزموینې روانې دي، چې دوه یې د کلویلینډ پوهنتون روغتونونو لخوا ترسره شوي دي؛ یوه یې د منځنیو ناروغیو درلودونکو کسانو باندې او بله یې په هغو خلکو باندې ترسره کړې چې ډیره شدیده ناروغي لري.
en-mt: Some pre-trial research suggests that remdesivir may have a higher genetic barrier to resistance. Several clinical trials are underway, two of which have been conducted by the University of Cleveland Hospitals; One was done on people with moderate disease and the other on people with more severe disease.

sourceString: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C for people who are hospitalized and severely ill with COVID-19; two placebo controlled (China, Canada) and one with no control (Italy).
targetString: په هغو خلکو باندې د رګونو د ویټامین سي درې کلینیکي آزموینې روانې دي چې په روغتون کې بستر شوي او د کوویډ-19 سخت ناروغي لري؛ دوه یې په پلیسبو کنټرول شوي (چین، کاناډا) ، او یوه یې کنټرول نلري (ایټالیا).
en-mt: There are three ongoing clinical trials of intravenous vitamin C in people who are hospitalized with severe Covid-19; Two were placebo-controlled (China, Canada), and one was uncontrolled (Italy).

sourceString: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on 24 March 2020.
targetString: د نیویارک آیالت په 24 مارچ 2020 کې د انټي بیوټیک ایزیتروفیسین لپاره آزمایښتونه پیل کړل.
en-mt: New York State began trials for the antibiotic azithromycin on March 24, 2020.

sourceString: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is planning a clinical trial for Teijin's Alvesco (ciclesonide), an inhaled corticosteroid for asthma, for the treatment of pre-symptomatic patients infected with the novel coronavirus.
targetString: د نړیوالې روغتیا او طب لپاره د جاپان ملي مرکز (NCGM) د تایجین الویسکو (سیکلیسونایډ) لپاره کلینیکي آزموینې په پام کې لري، د نفس تنګۍ لپاره د پوزې له لارې د کشولو یو ډول کورټیکوسټرایډ دي، چې په نوي کوروناویروس باندې د اخته ناروغانو د وړاندې څخه درلودونکو علایمو درملنې لپاره وکارول شي.
en-mt: Japan's National Center for Global Health and Medicine (NCGM) is considering a clinical trial for thiazide alvisco (ciclesonide), a nasal corticosteroid for asthma, in patients with the novel coronavirus. Used to treat pre-existing symptoms.

sourceString: A form of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2, a Phase II trial is underway with 200 patients to be recruited from severe, hospitalized cases in Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.
targetString: د انجیوټینسین بدلولو انزایم 2 یو ډول په اړه په 200 ناروغانو باندې د II پړاو آزموینه روانه ده چې له ډنمارک، جرمني، او اتریش څخه پکې د شدیدې ناروغۍ درلودونکي بستر شوي ناروغان ګمارل کیږي ترڅو د درملنې اغیزمنتوب معلوم کړي.
en-mt: A 200-patient phase II trial of angiotensin-converting enzyme 2 is underway, recruiting hospitalized patients with severe disease from Denmark, Germany, and Austria to determine the effectiveness of the treatment.

sourceString: Researchers from the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently studying the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and pulmonary complications in patients suffering from mild symptoms of COVID-19.
targetString: په کاناډا کې د مونټریال زړه انسټیټیوټ څیړونکي اوس مهال د کوویډ-19 خفیفو نښو نښانو درلودونکو ناروغانو کې د التهاب او سږو عوارضو کمولو لپاره د کولشيسین رول په اړه څیړنه کوي.
en-mt: Researchers at the Montreal Heart Institute in Canada are currently investigating the role of colchicine in reducing inflammation and lung complications in patients with mild symptoms of Covid-19.

sourceString: The study, named COLCORONA, is recruiting 6000 adults aged 40 and over who were diagnosed with COVID-19 and experience mild symptoms not requiring hospitalization.
targetString: دغه څیړنه چې د COLCORONA په نوم یادیږي، د 40  څخه زیات عمر لرونکي 6000 لویان ستخدام کوي چې د کوویډ-19 ناروغۍ درلودل یي تشخیص شوي او داسې خفیفې نښې نښانې لري چې په روغتون کې یې بستر کیدو ته اړتیا نشته.
en-mt: The study, called COLCORONA, is recruiting 6,000 adults over the age of 40 who have been diagnosed with Covid-19 and have mild symptoms that do not require hospitalization.

sourceString: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective contraceptive method are not eligible.
targetString: هغه میرمنې چې امیندواره وي یا ماشوم ته تی ورکوي یا هغه کسان چې د امیندوارۍ د مخنیوي اغیزمن میتود نلري ددغې څیړنې لپاره په شرایطو برابر نه دي.
en-mt: Women who are pregnant or breastfeeding or who do not have an effective method of contraception are not eligible for this study.

sourceString: Several anticoagulants are being tested in Italy.
targetString: په ایټالیا کې د انعقاد ضد ګڼ مواد آزمویل شوي دي.
en-mt: Many anti-coagulants have been tested in Italy.

sourceString: Low-molecular-weight heparin is being widely used to treat patients, prompting the Italian Medicines Agency to publish guidelines on its use.
targetString: د ناروغانو درملنې لپاره د ټیټ مالیکولر وزن لرونکی هیپرین په پراخه کچه کارول کیږي، او د ایټالیا د درملو ادارې هڅول کیږي چې د کارولو په اړه یې لارښودنې خپرې کړي.
en-mt: Low molecular weight heparin is widely used to treat patients, and the Italian Medicines Agency is encouraged to issue guidelines on its use.

sourceString: A multicenter study on 300 patients researching the use of enoxaparin sodium at prophylaxis and therapeutic dosages was announced in Italy on April 14.
targetString: د اپریل په 14مه په ایټالیا کې د 300 ناروغانو په اړه د ګڼو مرکزونو څیړنې چې د آنوکساپارین سوډیم د درملنې او درملو کارولو په اړه څیړنې کوي اعلان وشو.
en-mt: A multicenter study of 300 patients in Italy investigating the therapeutic and medicinal use of onoxaparin sodium was announced on April 14th.

sourceString: Since SARS-CoV-2 is a virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on repurposing approved anti-viral drugs that were developed for prior outbreaks such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus.
targetString: له کله راهیسې چې SARS-CoV-2 ویروس رامنځته شوی، د ویروس ضد منل شوو درملو د بیا ځلې کارولو په اړه په پام وړ ساینسي پاملرنې باندې تمرکز شوی چې دMRES ، SARS، او لویدیز نیل ویروس په څیر پخوانیو ناروغیو لپاره جوړ شوي وو.
en-mt: Since the emergence of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, considerable scientific attention has been focused on the repurposing of approved antiviral drugs that were developed for earlier diseases such as MERS, SARS, and West Nile virus. .

sourceString: Ribavirin: ribavirin was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: ریباویرین: د چین 7مې نسخې لارښودونو سره سم ریباویرین د کوویډ-19 درملنې لپاره وړاندیز شوی و
en-mt: Ribavirin: Ribavirin was recommended for the treatment of Covid-19 according to the 7th edition of the Chinese guidelines.

sourceString: Umifenovir: umifenovir was recommended for COVID-19 treatment according to Chinese 7th edition guidelines
targetString: امیفینوویر: د چین 7مې نسخې لارښودونو سره سم امیفینوویر د کوویډ-19 درملنې لپاره وړاندیز شوی و
en-mt: Amifenovir: Amifenovir was recommended for the treatment of Covid-19 according to the 7th edition of the Chinese guidelines.

sourceString: Some antibiotics that have been identified as potentially repurposable as COVID-19 treatments:
targetString: ځینې هغه انټي بیوټیک چې د امکان له مخې د کوویډ-19 درملنې لپاره د بیا کاریدونکې درملو په توګه پیژندل شوي په لاندې ډول دي:
en-mt: Some of the antibiotics that have been identified as potential replacement drugs for the treatment of Covid-19 are:

sourceString: Tocilizumab (Anti-IL-6 receptor): Approved by China.
targetString: توسیليزوماب (د IL-6 ضد اخیستونکي درمل): د چین لخوا منل شوي دي.
en-mt: Tocilizumab (an anti-IL-6 drug): Approved by China.

sourceString: Also trials in Italy and China. and see Tocilizumab#COVID-19.
targetString: په ایټالیا او چین کې هم آزمایل شوي. او Tocilizumab#COVID-19 وګورئ.
en-mt: Also tested in Italy and China. And see Tocilizumab #COVID-19.

sourceString: b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19).
targetString: د b'A COVID-19 واکسین د کوروناوېروس ناروغۍ 2019 پر وړاندې یو فرضي واکسین دی.
en-mt: The b'A COVID-19 vaccine is a hypothetical vaccine against the coronavirus disease 2019.

sourceString: Although no vaccine has completed clinical trials, there are multiple attempts in progress to develop such a vaccine.
targetString: که څه هم پر هیڅ ډول واکسین کلینیکي ازموینې ندي بشپړې شوي، د داسې یو واکسین د جوړولو لپاره ډېرې هڅې روانې دي.
en-mt: Although clinical trials have not been completed on any vaccine, many efforts are underway to develop such a vaccine.

sourceString: In late February 2020, the World Health Organization (WHO) said it did not expect a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, the causative virus, to become available in less than 18 months.
targetString: په فبروري 2020 کې، د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان وویل چې دا سازمان له 18 میاشتو څخه په کم وخت کې د SARS-CoV-2، اړونده یا عامل وېروس، پر وړاندې د واکسین جوړېدو تمه نه لري.
en-mt: In February 2020, the World Health Organization said that the organization does not expect to develop a vaccine against SARS-CoV-2, a related or causative virus, in less than 18 months.

sourceString: Five vaccine candidates were in Phase I safety studies in April.
targetString: په اپرېل کې د فاز I د خوندیتوب څېړنو کې د واکسین پنځه نوماندان وو.
en-mt: As of April, there were five vaccine candidates in Phase I safety studies.

sourceString: COVID-19 was identified in December 2019.
targetString: کووېډ-19 په دسمبر 2019 کې وپېژندل شو.
en-mt: Covid-19 was identified in December 2019.

sourceString: A major outbreak spread around the world in 2020, leading to considerable investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.
targetString: په ټوله نړۍ کې ناروغي په 2020 کې په لوړه کچه خپور شو، چې په پایله کې یې د یو واکسین جوړولو په برخه کې د پام وړ پانګونه او څېړنیز فعالیت باندې کار پیل شو.
en-mt: Worldwide, the disease reached a peak in 2020, prompting significant investment and research activity to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: Many organizations are using published genomes to develop possible vaccines against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: ډېر شمېر سازمانونه د SARS-CoV-2 پر وړاندې د ممکنه واکسین جوړولو لپاره له خپاره شوو جینوم څخه کار اخلي.
en-mt: Many organizations are using the published genome to develop a possible vaccine against SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Stated in April, imperatives of the CEPI initiative for vaccine development are speed, manufacturing capacity, deployment at scale, and global access.
targetString: لکه څنګه چې په اپرېل کې څرګنده شوه، د واکسین جوړولو لپاره د CEPI  د ابتکار اړینې چارې له چټکتیا، د جوړولو ظرفیت، د مالوماتو ټاکلې اندازه چمتو کولو، او نړیوال لاسرسي څخه عبارت دي.
en-mt: As revealed in April, CEPI's key requirements for vaccine development include speed, manufacturing capacity, data availability, and global access.

sourceString: In April, CEPI scientists reported that 10 different technology platforms were under research and development during early 2020 to create an effective vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: په اپرېل کې ساینسپوهانو راپور ورکړ چې د 2020 په لومړیو کې 10 بېلابېل د ټکنالوژۍ پلټفارمونه تر څېړنې او پراختیا لاندې وو تر څو د کوويډ-19 پر وړاندې یو اغېزمن واکسین جوړ کړي.
en-mt: In April, scientists reported that in early 2020, 10 different technology platforms were under research and development to create an effective vaccine against Covid-19.

sourceString: Major platform targets advanced into Phase I safety studies include:
targetString: د پلټفارم هغه لوی هدفونه چې په فاز I خوندیتوب څېړنو کې پرمختګ پکې وشو په لاندې ډول دي:
en-mt: The major targets of the platform that were advanced in Phase I safety studies are as follows:

sourceString: nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, mRNA-1273)
targetString: نوکلیک اسید (ډي این اې او آر این اې) (د لومړي فاز پرمختګ ورکوونکی او د واکسین نوماند: موډرنا، ایم آر این اې -1273)
en-mt: Nucleic acid (DNA and RNA) (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Moderna, miRNA-1273)

sourceString: viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: CanSino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)
targetString: ویرال ویکتور (د لومړي فاز پرمختګ ورکوونکی او د واکسین نوماند: کانسینو بیالوژیکس، ادینووېروس نوع 5 ویکتور)
en-mt: Viral vector (Phase I developer and vaccine candidate: Cancino Biologics, adenovirus type 5 vector)

sourceString: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, 115 total vaccine candidates are in early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute), and 37 others announced, but with little public information available (presumed to be in planning or being designed).
targetString: لکه څنګه چې په اپرېل کې د سي اي پي آی د ساینسپوهانو له لوري راپور ورکړل شو، ټولټال 115 واکسین نوماندان د پراختیا په لومړیو مرحلو کې دي، چې 78 د فعاله پروژو په توګه تایید شوي (79، د میلکن انسټیټوټ له مخې)، او 39 نور یې اعلان شوي دي خو د کمو په لاس کې شته عامه مالوماتو په لرلو سره (داسې ګڼل کیږي چې تر پلان لاندې دی یا د طرحه کېدو په حال کې).
en-mt: As reported by CEPI scientists in April, a total of 115 vaccine candidates are in the early stages of development, with 78 confirmed as active projects (79, according to the Milken Institute). And 39 others have been announced but with little public information available (considered to be under planning or under development).

sourceString: A Phase I-II trial conducts preliminary safety and immunogenicity testing, is typically randomized, placebo-controlled, and at multiple sites, while determining more precise, effective doses.
targetString: د فاز I-II ازموینه چې د خوندیتوب او ایمیونوجینیسیټي لومړنۍ ازموینه په کې ترسره کیږي، په عمومي شکل تصادفي، د پلاسیبو کنټرولوونکې، او په بېلابېلو سایټونو/ځایونو کې ترسره کېدونکې معاینه ده، په داسې حال کې چې د ډېرو دقیقو او اغېزمنو ډوزونو/درملو ټاکوونکې هم ده.
en-mt: A phase I-II trial, which conducts preliminary testing of safety and immunogenicity, is generally a randomized, placebo-controlled, and multisite study, while the most accurate and effective doses are determined. / Medicine is also deterministic.

sourceString: Phase III trials typically involve more participants, including a control group, and test effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent the disease, while monitoring for adverse effects at the optimal dose.
targetString: په فاز III ازموینو کې عموماً ډېر ګډونوال وي. په دې ګډونوالو کې د کنټرول یو ګروپ، د ناروغۍ د مخنیویي لپاره د واکسین د ازموینې اغېزمنتیا شامل دي، په داسې حال کې چې د جانبي عوارضو څارنه په کې په هیله بخښونکي ډوز/درمل کې وي.
en-mt: Phase III trials typically have many participants. These participants include a control group, testing the effectiveness of the vaccine to prevent disease while monitoring for side effects at the promising dose/drug.

sourceString: Of 79 vaccine candidates in active development (confirmed as of early April 2020), 74 were not yet in human evaluation (still in "preclinical" research).
targetString: د فعالې پراختیا مرحله کې له 79 واکسین نوماندانو څخه چې له اپرېل 2020 لومړیو راپدېخوا تایید شوی، 74 هغه یې په انساني ارزونه کې ندي ازمویل شوي (لاتراوسه له کلینیکي څېړنې مخکې مرحلو کې دي).
en-mt: Of the 79 vaccine candidates in active development approved as of early April 2020, 74 have not been tested in human trials (they are still in pre-clinical research).

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that it is investigating the potential of a molecular clamp vaccine that would genetically modify viral proteins in order to stimulate an immune reaction.
targetString: په استرالیا کې د 24 اپریل 2020 په شاوخوا کې، د کوینسلند پوهنتون اعلان کړه چې یاد پوهنتون د مالیکول نیوونکی ممکنه واکسین تر څېړنې لاندې نیسي چې ارثي ډول د معافیتي غبرګون رامنځته کولو لپاره ویروسي پروټینونو کې بدلون رامنځته کوي.
en-mt: Around April 24, 2020 in Australia, the University of Queensland announced that the university is investigating a possible vaccine containing a molecule that naturally modifies viral proteins to trigger an immune response.

sourceString: Around 24 January 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Centre (VIDO-InterVac) at the University of Saskatchewan announced the commencement of work on a vaccine, aiming to start human testing in 2021.
targetString: په کاناډا کې د 24 جنوري 2020 په شاوخوا کې، د ساسکاچیوان پوهنتون کې د واکسین نړیوال مرکز یا ویډو-انټرواک په یو واکسین باندې د کار پیل کولو اعلان وکړ، چې موخه یې په 2021 کې انساني ازموینې پیلول دي.
en-mt: Around January 24, 2020 in Canada, the International Vaccine Center at the University of Saskatchewan, or Vido-Intervac, announced the start of work on a vaccine, with the goal of starting human trials in 2021.

sourceString: Vaccine development projects were announced at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention on 26 January 2020, and the University of Hong Kong on 28 January.
targetString: د واکسین د پراختیا پروژې په 26 جنوری 2020 کې د چین ناروغیو د کنټرول او مخنیوي مرکز کې، او په 28 جنوری کې د هانګ کانګ پوهنتون کې اعلان شوې.
en-mt: Vaccine development projects were announced on January 26, 2020 at the Chinese Center for Disease Control and Prevention, and at the University of Hong Kong on January 28.

sourceString: Around 29 January 2020, Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, led by Hanneke Schuitemaker, announced that it had begun work on developing a vaccine.
targetString: په 29 جنوري 2020 شاوخوا کې، د جانسین فارمسي کمپنیو، چې د هانیک سکوټمیکر له لوري یې مشري کیږي، اعلان کړه چې دغو کمپنیو د یو واکسین په جوړولو باندې کار پیل کړی دی.
en-mt: Around January 29, 2020, the Janssen Pharmaceutical Companies, headed by Hannick Schottmacher, announced that the company had begun work on a vaccine.

sourceString: Janssen is co-developing an oral vaccine with its biotechnology partner, Vaxart.
targetString: جانسین، د خپل بایوټکنالوژي شریک، واکسارټ په مرسته د خولې له لارې ورکوونکی واکسین جوړوي.
en-mt: Johnson, with its biotechnology partner, is developing an oral vaccine with Vaxart.

sourceString: On 18 March 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop the vaccine.
targetString: په 18 مارچ 2020 کې، ایمرجینټ بایوسولوشن د واکسین جوړولو لپاره له واکسارت سره تولیدي شراکت اعلان کړ.
en-mt: On March 18, 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced a manufacturing partnership with Vaxart to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: On 8 February 2020, the laboratory OncoGen in Romania published a paper on the design of a vaccine with similar technology to the one used for cancer neoantigen vaccination therapy.
targetString: په 8 فبروری 2020 کې، په رومانیا کې د انکوجین لابراتوار د سرطان د نیوانتیجین واکسینشن درملنې لپاره یوشانته کارېدونکې ټکنالوژۍ سره د یو واکسین د طرحې/ډیزاین په اړه څېړنیزه مقاله خبره کړه.
en-mt: On February 8, 2020, the Oncogene Laboratory in Romania reported a research paper on the design of a vaccine with the same technology for neoantigen vaccination therapy of cancer.

sourceString: On 25 March the head of the research institute announced that they had finalized the synthesis of the vaccine and were beginning the tests.
targetString: په 25 د مارچ، د څېړنې انسټیټوټ اعلان کړه چې دوی د واکسین ترکیب پای ته رسولی او ازموینې یې پیل کړي.
en-mt: On March 25, the research institute announced that they had finished preparing the vaccine and started testing it.

sourceString: On 27 February 2020, a Generex subsidiary company, NuGenerex Immuno-Oncology, announced they were beginning a vaccine project to create an Ii-Key peptide vaccine against COVID-19.
targetString: په 27 فبروری 2020 کې، جینیریک سبسایډری شرکت، نوجینیریکس ایمیونو-انکالوژي، اعلان کړه چې دوی د کووېډ-19 پر وړاندې د لي-کي پیپټایډ واکسین جوړولو لپاره د واکسین پروژه پیل کړه.
en-mt: On 27 February 2020, Generics' subsidiary company, Nugenerix Immuno-Oncology, announced that it had launched a vaccine project to develop an L-K peptide vaccine against Covid-19.

sourceString: They wanted to produce a vaccine candidate that could be tested in humans "within 90 days."
targetString: دوی غواړي داسې یو انتخابیدونکی واکسین تولید کړي چې کېدای شي د 90 ورځو په ترڅ کې پر انسانانو وازمویل شي.
en-mt: They want to produce a selective vaccine that can be tested on humans within 90 days.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced its projects to develop a vaccine.
targetString: په 5 مارچ 2020 کې، په سینټ.لویس کې د واشنګټن پوهنتون د یو واکسین جوړولو پروژه اعلان کړه.
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, Washington University in St. Louis announced a project to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: On 5 March 2020, the United States Army Medical Research and Materiel Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Institute of Research in Silver Spring, both in western Maryland, announced they were working on a vaccine.
targetString: په 5 مارچ 2020 کې، په فورټ ډېټریک کې د امریکا متحده ایالاتو د اردو د طبي څېړنو او تخنیک قوماندانۍ او په سیلور سپرینګ کې د والټر ریډ د اردو د څېړنې انسټیټوټ دواړو په لویدیځ مریلنډ کې اعلان کړه چې دوی پر یو واکسین باندې کار کوي.
en-mt: On March 5, 2020, the U.S. Army Medical Research and Technology Command at Fort Detrick and the Walter Reed Army Research Institute in Silver Spring, Western Maryland, both announced that they were working on a vaccine. .

sourceString: Around 10 March 2020, Emergent Biosolutions announced that it had teamed with Novavax Inc.
targetString: په 10 مارچ 2020 شاوخوا، ایمرجنټ بایوسولوشن اعلان کړه چې دوی له نوواواکس شرکت سره
en-mt: On March 10, 2020, Emergent BioSolutions announced that they have partnered with Novavax Inc.

sourceString: in the development and manufacture of a vaccine.
targetString: د واکسين په پراختیا او تولید کې یوځای شوي دي.
en-mt: are involved in the development and production of vaccines.

sourceString: The partners further announced plans for preclinical testing and a Phase I clinical trial by July 2020.
targetString: دواړو شریکانو له کلینیک وړاندې ازموینو لپاره پلان او په جولای 2020 کې د کلینیکي ازموینې فاز I اعلان کړ.
en-mt: Both partners announced plans for pre-clinical trials and a Phase I clinical trial in July 2020.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, India's Health Ministry announced they are working with 11 isolates, and that even on a fast track it would take at least around one-and-a-half to two years to develop a vaccine.
targetString: په 12 مارچ 2020 کې، د هند د روغتیا وزارت اعلان کړه چې دوی په 11 مکروبي نښو باندې په جلا ډول کار کوي، او دا چې ډېر ژر هم شي، د یو واکسین جوړول به له یونیم څخه تر دوه کالو شاوخوا وخت ونیسي.
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, the Indian Ministry of Health announced that they were working on 11 different strains of the virus, and that it would take anywhere from one to two years to develop a vaccine.

sourceString: On 12 March 2020, Medicago, a biotechnology company in Quebec City, Quebec, reported development of a coronavirus-like particle under partial funding from the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.
targetString: په 12 مارچ 2020 کې، په کویبیک ښار کې د بایوټکنالوژي شرکت د کوروناوېروس ذراتو د جوړولو او پراختیا راپور ورکړ چې د روغتیایي څېړنې لپاره کاناډایي انسټیټوټونو له خوا یې د یوې برخې مالي ملاتړ کړي.
en-mt: On March 12, 2020, a biotechnology company in Quebec City reported the creation and development of coronavirus particles that was partially funded by the Canadian Institutes for Health Research.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate is in laboratory research, with human testing planned for July or August 2020.
targetString: انتخابیدونکی واکسین د انساني ازموینې تر څنګ چې په جولای یا اګست 2020 کې پلان شوې، یو لابراتواري څېړنه ده.
en-mt: The selective vaccine is a laboratory study, with human trials planned for July or August 2020.

sourceString: Earlier that week, The Guardian reported that the US President Donald Trump had offered CureVac "'large sums of money' for exclusive access to a Covid-19 vaccine", against which the German government protested.
targetString: د همدې اونۍ په لومړیو کې، ګارډین ورځپاڼې راپور ورکړ چې د امریکا متحده ایالاتو ولسمشر ډونالډ ټرمپ، کیورواک ته د کووېډ-19 واکسین ته د پراخ لاسرسي لپاره ډېرې پیسې ورکړې، چې پر وړاندې یې د جرمني دولت اعتراض وکړ.
en-mt: Earlier this week, the Guardian newspaper reported that US President Donald Trump had paid Kerouac a large sum of money to expand access to the Covid-19 vaccine, which the German government had protested against.

sourceString: On 17 March 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German company BioNTech to jointly develop a mRNA-based vaccine.
targetString: په 17  مارچ 2020 کې، امریکایي درمل جوړولو شرکت پيفیزر له جرمني بایواینټیک کمپنۍ سره د ایم آر این اې پر بنسټ واکسین جوړولو کې د ملګرتیا اعلان وکړ.
en-mt: On March 17, 2020, American pharmaceutical company Pfizer announced a partnership with German biotech company to develop an mRNA-based vaccine.

sourceString: mRNA-based vaccine candidate BNT162, currently in pre-clinical testing with clinical trials expected to begin in April 2020.
targetString: د ایم آر این اې پر بنسټ انتخابیدونکی واکسین BNT162، چې اوسمهال یې له کلینیک وړاندې ازموینې ترسره کیږي لاندې دی، په اپرېل 2020  کې یې د کلینیکي ازموینو چارې پیلېږي.
en-mt: The selective mRNA-based vaccine BNT162, which is currently undergoing pre-clinical trials, will begin clinical trials in April 2020.

sourceString: In Italy on 17 March 2020, Takis Biotech, an Italian biotech company announced they will have pre-clinical testing results in April 2020 and their final vaccine candidate could begin human testing by fall.
targetString: په ایټالیا کې په 17 مارچ 2020 کې، تاکیس بایوټیک چې یوه ایټالیوي کمپنۍ ده اعلان کړه چې دوی به له کلینیک وړاندې د ازموینې پایل په اپرېل 2020 کې ترلاسه کړي او ورستی انتخابیدونکی واکسین به یې انساني ازموینې په مني/خزان کې پیل کړي.
en-mt: In Italy on March 17, 2020, Tacis Biotech, an Italian company, announced that they will receive a pre-clinical test file in April 2020 and will begin human trials of the final vaccine candidate in the fall/autumn.

sourceString: In France on 19 March 2020, the Coalition for Epidemic Preparedness Innovations (CEPI) announced a US$4.9 million investment in a COVID-19 vaccine research consortium involving the Institut Pasteur, Themis Bioscience (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Pittsburgh, bringing CEPI's total investment in COVID-19 vaccine development to US$29 million.
targetString: په 19 مارچ 2020 کې په فرانسه کې د وبا چمتووالي د پنځوونو ائتلاف د کووېډ-19 واکسین د څېړنې اتحادیې لپاره د پانګونې 4.9 میلیون ډالر اعلان کړل. په دې اتحادیه کې انستیتوت پاستیور، تیمیس بایوساینس (ویانا، اتریش)، او د پټرسبرګ پوهنتون شامل دي چې د واکسین جوړولو لپاره د سي اي پي آی ټولیزه پانګونه 29 میلیون ډالرو ته رسوي.
en-mt: On March 19, 2020, the Pandemic Preparedness Coalition in France announced a $4.9 million investment for the Covid-19 vaccine research consortium. The consortium includes Institut Pasteur, Thymes Biosciences (Vienna, Austria), and the University of Petersburg, bringing the total CAPI investment to vaccine development to $29 million.

sourceString: CEPI's other investment partners for COVID-19 vaccine development are Moderna, Curevac, Inovio, Novavax, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford, and the University of Queensland.
targetString: د کووېډ-19 واکسین جوړولو لپاره د CEPI د پانګونې نور شریکان له موډرنا، کیورواک، اینوویو، نوواواکس، د هانګ کانګ پوهنتون، د اکسفورډ پوهنتون او د کوینسلنډ پوهنتون دی.
en-mt: CEPI's other investment partners for the development of a Covid-19 vaccine are Moderna, CureVac, Enovio, NovaVacs, the University of Hong Kong, the University of Oxford and the University of Queensland.

sourceString: On 20 March 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists have begun animal testing of six different vaccine candidates.
targetString: په 20 مارچ 2020 کې، د روسیې د روغتیا چارواکو اعلان کړه چې ساینسپوهانو د شپږو بېلابېلو انتخابیدونکو واکسینونو حیواني ازموینه پیل کړېده.
en-mt: On March 20, 2020, Russian health officials announced that scientists had begun animal testing of six different selective vaccines.

sourceString: Imperial College London researchers announced on 20 March 2020 that they are developing a self-amplifying RNA vaccine for COVID-19.
targetString: د ایمپیریال کالج لندن څېړونکو په 20 مارچ 2020 کې اعلان کړه چې دوی د کووېډ-19 لپاره د آر این اې واکسین جوړوي.
en-mt: Researchers at Imperial College London announced on March 20, 2020 that they are developing an RNA vaccine for Covid-19.

sourceString: The vaccine candidate was developed within 14 days of receiving the sequence from China.
targetString: انتخابیدونکی واکسین له چین څخه په 14 ورځو کې د سلسلې لاسته راتلو سره جوړ شو.
en-mt: The selective vaccine was made by receiving the series in 14 days from China.

sourceString: In late March, the Canadian government announced C$275 million in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against COVID-19, including numerous vaccine candidates at Canadian companies and universities, such as the Medicago and University of Saskatchewan initiatives.
targetString: د مارچ په وروستیو کې د کاناډا حکومت د میډیکاګو او د ساسکاچیوان ابتکارونو پوهنتون په شان کاناډایي کمپنیو او پوهنتونونو کې د یو شمیر انتخابیدونکو واکسینونو په ګډون د کووېډ-19 پر وړاندې طبي ضد اقداماتو په اړه 96 څېړنیزو پروژو 275 میلیونه کاناډایي ډالرو مالي مرسته اعلان کړه.
en-mt: In late March, the Canadian government announced 275 million Canadian dollars in funding for 96 research projects on medical countermeasures against Covid-19, including a number of selective vaccines, at Canadian companies and universities such as Medicago and the University of Saskatchewan Initiatives. do

sourceString: Around the same time, the Canadian government announced C$192 million specifically for developing a COVID-19 vaccine, with plans to establish a national "vaccine bank" of several new vaccines that could be used if another coronavirus outbreak occurs.
targetString: په همدې مهال، د کاناډا حکومت د کووېډ-19 واکسین جوړولو لپاره په ځانګړې توګه 192 میلیون کاناډایي ډالرو مرسته اعلان کړه. په دې کې هغه پلانونه هم شامل دي چې له مخې به یې د بېلابېلو نویو واکسینونو "د واکسین بانک" جوړ شي چې د کورونا وېروس بلې بڼې په خپرېدو/رامنځته کېدو سره به وکارول شي.
en-mt: At the same time, the Canadian government announced a special contribution of 192 million Canadian dollars for the development of a Covid-19 vaccine. It also includes plans to create a "vaccine bank" of various new vaccines to be used in the event of another outbreak of the coronavirus.

sourceString: On 2 April 2020, researchers at the University of Pittsburgh School of Medicine reported on testing of PittCoVacc, a possible COVID-19 vaccine in mice, stating that "MNA delivered SARS-CoV-2 S1 subunit vaccines elicited potent antigen-specific antibody responses [in the mice] that were evident beginning 2 weeks after immunization."
targetString: په 2 اپریل 2020 کې، د پټرسبرګ پوهنتون د طبي ښوونځي کې څېړونکو د پیټکوواک ازمویلو په اړه راپور ورکړ. دا په موږکانو کې د کووېډ-19 ممکنه واکسین دی. په راپور کې ویل شوي چې، "ایم این اې د سارس-کوو-2 ایس1 دویمې کچې واکسینونه وړاندې کړل چې د انټيجن ته ځانګړي انټيباډي پیاوړي غبرګونونه یې هڅول [په موږکانو کې] چې له معافیت څخه وروسته په 2 اونیو کې راښکاره شول."
en-mt: On April 2, 2020, researchers at the University of Petersburg Medical School reported on Petkovac's experiments. This is a possible vaccine for Covid-19 in mice. The report states that, “MNA delivered a second dose of SARS-CoV-2 S1 vaccines that induced strong antigen-specific antibody responses [in mice] that were elicited 2 weeks after immunization. "

sourceString: In Canada on 16 April 2020, the University of Waterloo School of Pharmacy announced design of a DNA-based vaccine candidate as a possible nasal spray.
targetString: په کاناډا کې په 16 اپرېل 2020 کې، د واټرلو پوهنتون د فارمسي ښوونځي د یو ممکنه پوزې له لارې سپرې په توګه د ډي این اې انتخابیدونکي واکسین طرحه اعلان کړه.
en-mt: On 16 April 2020 in Canada, the University of Waterloo's School of Pharmacy announced a possible DNA-selective vaccine design as a nasal spray.

sourceString: Using bacteriophages, the DNA will be designed to replicate inside human bacteria to produce harmless virus-like particles, which may stimulate the immune system to produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus.
targetString: د باکتریوفیجیس په کارولو سره به ډي این اې د انسان په بدن کې دننه د باکتریاوو ځای نیولو لپاره طرحه شي تر څو د وېروس په شان بې ضرره ذرات/پارټیکلونه تولید کړي چې کولی شي د سارس-کوو-2 وېروس پر وړاندې د انټي باډي تولیدولو لپاره معافیتي سیستم وهڅوي.
en-mt: Using bacteriophages, DNA will be engineered to infect bacteria inside the human body to produce harmless virus-like particles that can produce antibodies against the SARS-CoV-2 virus. Stimulates the immune system to produce.

sourceString: In March 2020, the US government, industry, and three universities pooled resources to access supercomputers from IBM, combined with cloud computing resources from Hewlett Packard Enterprise, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google.
targetString: په مارچ 2020 کې د امریکا متحده ایالاتو حکومت، صنعت، او درېیو پوهنتونونو له هیولیټ پکارډ انټرپرایز، امازون، مایکروسافټ او ګوګل څخه د کلود کمپیوټینګ ریسورسیز په ګډون، له ای بي ایم څخه د سوپرکمپیوټرونو ترلاسه کولو لپاره خپلې سرچینې سره ګډې او شریکې کړې.
en-mt: In March 2020, the United States government, industry, and a trio of universities pooled their resources to acquire supercomputers from IBM, including cloud computing resources from Hewlett-Packard Enterprises, Amazon, Microsoft, and Google. .

sourceString: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.
targetString: ځینې واکسینونه هیټرولوګوز اغېزې لري، چې د ناځانګړو اغېزو/ناورته اغېزو په نوم هم یادیږي.
en-mt: Some vaccines have heterologous effects, also called non-specific effects.

sourceString: That means they can have benefits beyond the disease they prevent.
targetString: دا په دې مانا چې دوی کولی شي د ناروغۍ د مخنیوي تر څنګ نورې ګټې هم ولري.
en-mt: This means they can have other benefits besides disease prevention.

sourceString: A further randomized trial in Australia is seeking to enrol 4,170 healthcare workers.
targetString: په اسټرالیا کې د لانورو تصادفي معایناتو/ازموینو لپاره غواړي چې 4170 روغتیایي کارکوونکي وګماري.
en-mt: Australia wants to hire 4170 health workers for more random screenings/tests.

sourceString: It is possible vaccines in development will not be safe or effective.
targetString: امکان لري چې د پرمختګ په حال کې واکسین خوندي او اغېزمن نه وي.
en-mt: It is possible that the vaccine in development may not be safe or effective.

sourceString: Early research to assess vaccine efficacy using COVID-19-specific animal models, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and non-human primates, indicate a need for biosafety-level 3 containment measures for handling live viruses, and international coordination to ensure standardized safety procedures.
targetString: د کووېډ-19 ته اړونده حیواني ماډلونو، لکه د اې سي اي 2-ټرانزجینیک موږک، د نورو لابراتوارونو حیوانات، او غیرانساني تي لرونکي حیواناتو په کارولو سره د واکسین د اغېزمنتیا ارزولو لومړنۍ څېړنې د ژوندیو وېروسونو د قابو کولو لپاره 3مې کچې بیولوژیکي خوندیتوب اقداماتو او د خوندیتوب معیاري پروسیجرونو څخه د ډاډ ورکولو لپاره نړیوالې همغږۍ ته اړتیا لري.
en-mt: Preliminary studies evaluating vaccine efficacy using animal models relevant to COVID-19, such as ACE2-transgenic mice, other laboratory animals, and nonhuman primates Level 3 biological safety for control of live viruses There is a need for international coordination to ensure measures and standard safety procedures.

sourceString: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in non-human animal models.
targetString: د SARS  او MERS  پر وړاندې واکسین په غیرانساني یا حیواني ماډلونو کې ازمویل شوی دی.
en-mt: Vaccines against SARS and MERS have been tested in nonhuman or animal models.

sourceString: As of 2020, there is no cure or protective vaccine for SARS that has been shown to be both safe and effective in humans.
targetString: تر 2020 پورې، تراوسه پورې د SARS د معالجې یا خوندیتوب هیڅ داسې واکسین نه دی جوړ شوی تر څو ثابته کړي چې د انسانانو لپاره هم خوندي او هم اغیزمن دی.
en-mt: As of 2020, no SARS treatment or vaccine has yet been developed that has been proven to be both safe and effective for humans.

sourceString: According to research papers published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of novel vaccines and medicines to treat SARS was a priority for governments and public health agencies around the world.There is also no proven vaccine against MERS.
targetString: په 2005 او 2006 کلونو کې د خپرو شوو څېړنو له مخې، د ایس اې ار ایس د درملنې لپاره د نوي واکسینونو او درملو پېژندنه او پراختیا د نړۍ ټولو حکومتونو او عامې روغتیا ادارو لپاره لومړیتوب وو. د ایم اي ار ایس په وړاندې ثابت شوی واکسین هم نشته.
en-mt: According to research published in 2005 and 2006, the identification and development of new vaccines and drugs for the treatment of SARS was a priority for all governments and public health agencies around the world. There is no proven vaccine against MERS.

sourceString: When MERS became prevalent, it was believed that existing SARS research may provide a useful template for developing vaccines and therapeutics against a MERS-CoV infection.
targetString: کله چې ایم اي ار ایس خپره شوه، داسې باور کېده چې د ایس اې ار ایس شته څېړنه ښایي د ایم اي ار ایس-کوو ناروغۍ پر وړاندې د واکسینونو او درملو جوړولو لپاره ګتوره نمونه برابره کړي.
en-mt: When MERS was published, it was believed that existing MERS research could provide a rich model for developing vaccines and drugs against MERS-CoV disease.

sourceString: As of March 2020, there was one (DNA based) MERS vaccine which completed phase I clinical trials in humans, and three others in progress, all of which are viral-vectored vaccines, two adenoviral-vectored (ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac), and one MVA-vectored (MVA-MERS-S).
targetString: تر مارچ 2020 پورې، د ډي این اې پر بنسټ د ایم اي ار ایس یوازې یو واکسین شتون درلود چې په انسانانو کې یې د کلینیکي ازموینو فاز I بشپړ کړی او درې نور یې د پرمختګ په حال کې دي. ټول واکسینونه د وېروس انتقالوونکي واکسینونه دي، دوه نور یې اډینووایرل-ویکټورډ یا ChAdOx1-MERS,  BVRS-GamVac دي، او یو یې ایم وي اې-ایم اي ار ایس-ایس واکسین دی.
en-mt: As of March 2020, there is only one DNA-based MERS vaccine that has completed Phase I clinical trials in humans and three others are in development. All vaccines are vector-borne vaccines, the other two are adenoviral-vectored or ChAdOx1-MERS, BVRS-GamVac, and one is the MVA-MERS-S vaccine.

sourceString: Social media posts have promoted a conspiracy theory claiming the virus behind COVID-19 was known and that a vaccine was already available.
targetString: په ټولنیزو رسنیو پوسټونو کې د توطیې تیورۍ ته پراختیا ورکړې چې ادعا پکې کيږي چې د کووېډ-19 وېروس له مخکې نه پېژندل کېده او دا چې واکسین ورته له مخکې نه شتون درلود.
en-mt: Social media posts have promoted conspiracy theories that claim that the Covid-19 virus was not previously known and that a vaccine did not already exist.

sourceString: The patents cited by various social media posts reference existing patents for genetic sequences and vaccines for other strains of coronavirus such as the SARS coronavirus.
targetString: هغه ثبت شوې اختراعګانې چې د ډېر شمېر ټولنیزو رسنیو پوسټونو له خوا یې استناد کېدو، د کوروناوېروس نورو ډولونو ، لکه د ایس اې ار ایس کوروناوېرو، د ارثي لړیو او واکسینونو لپاره یې د شته اختراعګانو ماخذ ورکاوه.
en-mt: The registered inventions, cited by many social media posts, provided the source for existing inventions for other types of coronaviruses, such as SARS-coronavirus, gene sequences and vaccines.

sourceString: b'Coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) is an infectious disease caused by severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2).
targetString: بي کوروناوېروس ناروغي 2019 یا کووېډ-19 یوه انتاني ناروغي ده چې د شدید حاد تنفسي ناروغۍ د علایمو لرونکی کوروناوېروس 2 لامل ګرځي.
en-mt: B-coronavirus disease 2019 or covid-19 is an infectious disease that causes severe acute respiratory syndrome with symptoms of coronavirus 2.

sourceString: Common symptoms include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
targetString: عادي نښې نښانې یې له تبې، ټوخي، او سالنډي څخه عبارت دي.
en-mt: Typical symptoms include fever, cough, and runny nose.

sourceString: Other symptoms may include fatigue, muscle pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of smell, and abdominal pain.
targetString: نور علایم یې ستړیا، د غړو درد، نس ناستی، ستوني درد، د بوی حس له لاسه ورکول، د نس دردونه دي.
en-mt: Other symptoms include fatigue, joint pain, diarrhea, sore throat, loss of sense of smell, and abdominal pain.

sourceString: The time from exposure to onset of symptoms is typically around five days but may range from two to fourteen days.
targetString: پر ناروغۍ د اخته کېدو او علایمو د پیلېدو وخت شاوخوا پینځه ورځې خو ښایي د دوه تر څوارلس ورځو پورې وخت ونیسي.
en-mt: The time of contracting the disease and the onset of symptoms is about five days, but it may take up to two to fourteen days.

sourceString: While the majority of cases result in mild symptoms, some progress to viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.
targetString: په داسې حال کې چې ډېر شمېر پېښو کې عادي علایم وي، خو په ځینو کې بیا د ویروسي سینه بغل او د ډېرو بدني غړ غیرفعاله کېدل شامل دي.
en-mt: While most cases have normal symptoms, some involve viral pneumonia and multi-organ failure.

sourceString: As of 17 April 2020, more than 2.24 million cases have been reported across 210 countries and territories, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.
targetString: تر 17 اپریل 2020 پورې، د نړۍ له 210 هېوادونو او سیمو څخه له 2.24 میلیون پېښو څخه راپور ورکړل شوی وو چې له کبله یې 153،000 څخه ډېر کسان مړه شوي وو.
en-mt: As of April 17, 2020, more than 2.24 million cases had been reported from 210 countries and territories worldwide, resulting in more than 153,000 deaths.

sourceString: More than 568,000 people have recovered.The virus is primarily spread between people during close contact, often via small droplets produced by coughing, sneezing, or talking.
targetString: له 568،000 څخه ډېر خلک بېرته رغول شوي دي. وېروس په لومړیو کې د خلکو تر منځ د نږدې تماسونو پر مهال، ډېرځله د ټوخي، پرنجي او خبرو پر وخت د کوچنیو څاڅکو له لارې خپریږي.
en-mt: More than 568,000 people have been rehabilitated. The virus initially spreads through close contact between people, often through small droplets during coughing, sneezing and talking.

sourceString: While these droplets are produced when breathing out, they usually fall to the ground or onto surfaces rather than being infectious over long distances.
targetString: په داسې حال کې چې دا څاڅکي د سا وېستلو په وخت کې تولیدیږي، معمولا دا څاڅکي پر زمکه یا نورو سطحو باندې لوېږي، خو د ډېر واټن له لارې انتاني کېدونکی وېروس ندی.
en-mt: While these droplets are produced during urination, these droplets usually land on the ground or other surfaces, but the virus is not contagious over long distances.

sourceString: People may also become infected by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose, or mouth.
targetString: خلک د ککړې سطحې په لمس کولو سره هم وېروس اخیستی شي او وروسته خپلې سترګې، پوزه او خوله لمس کوي.
en-mt: People can also get the virus by touching a contaminated surface and then touching their eyes, nose and mouth.

sourceString: The virus can survive on surfaces up to 72 hours.
targetString: وېروس پر بېلابېلو سطحو باندې د 72 ساعتونو لپاره ژوندی پاتې کېدی شي.
en-mt: The virus can survive on various surfaces for up to 72 hours.

sourceString: It is most contagious during the first three days after the onset of symptoms, although spread may be possible before symptoms appear and in later stages of the disease.The standard method of diagnosis is by real-time reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (rRT-PCR) from a nasopharyngeal swab.
targetString: د علایمو له پیلېدو وروسته د درېیو ورځو پر مهال ډېر خپرېدونکی او ساري وي، که څه هم وېروس مخکې له دې چې د ناروغۍ علایم ښکاره شي او یا د ناروغۍ په وروستیو مرحلو کې هم خپریږي. د ناروغۍ د تشخیص معیاري طریقه د نیزوفارینجیل سواب/ډکي له لارې د سرچپه ټرانسکریپشن پولیمیریز چین ریاکشن په وسیله ترسره کیږي.
en-mt: It is most contagious within three days after the onset of symptoms, although the virus can spread before symptoms appear or in the later stages of the disease. The standard method for diagnosing the disease is nasopharyngeal swabs/swabs using reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction.

sourceString: The use of masks is recommended for those who suspect they have the virus and their caregivers.
targetString: د هغو کسانو لپاره د ماسک کارول بیا تجویز کیږي چې پر وېروس درلودو شکمن وي.
en-mt: The use of masks is again recommended for those who are suspected of having the virus.
