en-mt: The name was chosen to avoid referring to a specific geography (such as China), a species, or a group of people. This name was chosen in accordance with international recommendations aimed at avoiding defamation. The virus that causes Covid-19 is called SARS-CoV-2 or SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: The WHO additionally uses "the COVID-19 virus" and "the virus responsible for COVID-19" in public communications.
targetString: د دې سربېره، د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان د "کوويډ-19 ويروس" او "د کوویډ-19 رامنځته کوونکی وېروس" په خپلو عمومي بیانیو کې کارولی دی.
en-mt: In addition, the World Health Organization uses the terms "Covid-19 virus" and "the virus that causes Covid-19" in its general terms.

sourceString: Both the disease and virus are commonly referred to as "coronavirus".
targetString: ناروغي او وېروس دواړه په عمومي بڼه د "کوروناوېروس" په نوم یادیږي.
en-mt: Both the disease and the virus are collectively referred to as "coronavirus".

sourceString: During the initial outbreak in Wuhan, China, the virus and disease were commonly referred to as "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".
targetString: د چین په ووهان ښار کې د ناروغۍ د پیل پر مهال، وېروس او ناروغي دواړه د "کوروناويروس" او "ووهان کوروناويروس" په نوم یادېدل.
en-mt: At the time of the outbreak in Wuhan, China, both the virus and the disease were called "coronavirus" and "Wuhan coronavirus".

sourceString: In January 2020, WHO recommended 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease as interim names for the virus and disease in accordance with 2015 guidance against using locations in disease and virus names.
targetString: په جنوري 2020 کې، د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان پر ناروغیو او وېروسونو باندې د ځایونو نومولو 2015 کال لارښود له مخې، د وېروس او ناروغۍ لپاره د 2019-nCov او 2019-nCoV حاد تنفسي ناروغۍ موقتي نوم ورکړ.
en-mt: In January 2020, according to the World Health Organization's 2015 nomenclature guidelines on diseases and viruses, the virus and disease were provisionally named 2019-nCov and 2019-nCoV acute respiratory disease.

sourceString: The official names COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were issued on 11 February 2020.
targetString: رسمي نومونه، COVID-19 او SARS-CoV-2 په 11 فبروری 2020 کې صادر شول.
en-mt: The official names, COVID-19 and SARS-CoV-2 were issued on 11 February 2020.

sourceString: Due to capacity limitations in the standard supply chains, some digital manufacturers are printing healthcare material such as nasal swabs and ventilator parts.
targetString: د معیاري اکمالاتي ځنځیر کې د ظرفیت د محدودیت له کبله، ځینې ډیجیټلي تولیدوونکي د پزې د پاکولو پنبه لرونکی ډکي او د تنفسي الې پرزې په شان روغتیایي شیان او توکي جوړوي.
en-mt: Due to capacity constraints in the standard supply chain, some digital manufacturers are filling nasal swabs and making health items such as respirator parts.

sourceString: In one example, when an Italian hospital urgently required a ventilator valve, and the supplier was unable to deliver in the timescale required, a local startup reverse-engineered and printed the required 100 valves overnight.
targetString: بېلګه یې دا ده چې کله په ایټالیا کې یو روغتون د تنفسي الې سرپوښ ته اړتیا ولیدل شوه، او اکمالاتي کمپنۍ ورته په وخت او زمان سره سم چمتو نکړل شو، یوې نوې فعالیت کوونکې کمپنۍ په یوه شپه کې 100 سرپوښونه جوړ کړل.
en-mt: For example, when a hospital in Italy needed respirator masks, and the supply company could not provide them in time, a new operating company made 100 masks in one night.

sourceString: After the initial outbreak of COVID-19, conspiracy theories, misinformation and disinformation emerged regarding the origin, scale, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease and rapidly spread online.
targetString: د کووېډ-19 ناروغۍ په لومړي خپرېدو وروسته، د ناروغۍ د سرچینې، کچې، مخنیوي، درملنې او نورو اړخونو په اړه د دسیسو تیوري ګانې، ناسم مالومات او غلط مالومات رابرسېره شول او په انټرنټ کې په چټکه خپاره شول.
en-mt: After the first outbreak of the Covid-19 disease, conspiracy theories, misinformation and misinformation about the source, extent, prevention, treatment and other aspects of the disease emerged and spread rapidly on the Internet.

sourceString: Humans appear to be capable of spreading the virus to some other animals.
targetString: انسانان کولی شي وېروسونه ځینو حیواناتو ته انتقال او خپاره کړي.
en-mt: Humans can transmit and spread viruses to some animals.

sourceString: The study failed to find evidence of viral replication in pigs, ducks, and chickens.
targetString: په خنځیر، هیلۍ او چرګو کې د ویروسي نښو نښانو د شواهدو موندلو کې څېړنې پاتې راغلې.
en-mt: Studies have failed to find evidence of viral symptoms in pigs, chickens and chickens.

sourceString: No medications or vaccine is approved to treat the disease.
targetString: د ناروغۍ د درملنې لپاره کوم درمل یا واکسین ندی تایید شوی.
en-mt: No medication or vaccine has been approved to treat the disease.

sourceString: International research on vaccines and medicines in COVID-19 are underway by government organisations, academic groups and industry researchers.
targetString: د کووېډ-19 د واکسینونو او درملو په اړه نړیوالې څېړنې د دولتي سازمانونو، اکاډمیکو ډلو او صنعتي څېړونکو له خوا دوام لري.
en-mt: International research on vaccines and drugs for Covid-19 continues by government organizations, academic groups and industrial researchers.

sourceString: In March, the World Health Organization initiated the "SOLIDARITY Trial" to assess treatment effects of four existing antiviral compounds with the most promise of efficacy.
targetString: په مارچ میاشت کې، د روغتیا نړیوال سازمان د "ګوښیتوب ازموینه" پیل کړه تر څو د اغېزمنتیا په هیله د څلورو شته وېروس ضد ترکیباتو درملیزو اغېزو ارزونه ترسره کړه.
en-mt: In March, the World Health Organization launched a "probability trial" to evaluate the therapeutic effects of four available antiviral compounds in hopes of effectiveness.

sourceString: There is no available vaccine, but various agencies are actively developing vaccine candidates.
targetString: د لاسرسي وړ کوم واکسین نشته، خو ډېر شمېر ادارې په فعاله توګه پر واکسین جوړولو بوختې دي.
en-mt: There is no vaccine available, but many agencies are actively working on a vaccine.

sourceString: Previous work on SARS-CoV is being utilised because SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 both use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.
targetString: پر SARS-CoV مخکني کارونو څخه ګټه پورته کیږي ځکه چې د SARS-CoV او SARS-CoV -2 دواړه د ACE2 ريسپتر څخه کار اخلي تر څو د انسان حجرو ته ننوځي.
en-mt: Previous work on SARS-CoV is useful because both SARS-CoV and SARS-CoV-2 use the ACE2 receptor to enter human cells.

sourceString: There are three vaccination strategies being investigated.
targetString: د واکسین جوړولو درې ستراتیژۍ تر څېړنې لاندې دي.
en-mt: Three vaccine development strategies are under investigation.

sourceString: First, researchers aim to build a whole virus vaccine.
targetString: لومړۍ ستراتیژۍ کې د څېړونکو موخه د ټول وېروس لپاره د واکسین جوړول دي.
en-mt: In the first strategy, researchers aim to develop a vaccine for the entire virus.

sourceString: The use of such a virus, be it inactive or dead, aims to elicit a prompt immune response of the human body to a new infection with COVID-19.
targetString: د داسې یو وېروس کارولو موخه، هغه که غیرفعال یا مړ وي، د کووېډ-19 نوي وېروس پر وړاندې د انسا د بدن د معافیت چټک ځواب هڅول دي.
en-mt: The purpose of using such a virus, either inactivated or dead, is to stimulate a rapid immune response of the human body against the new Covid-19 virus.

sourceString: A second strategy, subunit vaccines, aims to create a vaccine that sensitises the immune system to certain subunits of the virus.
targetString: دویمه ستراتیژۍ کې د فرعي واکسینونو جوړول دي چې موخه یې د داسې یو واکسین جوړول دي چې د وېروس د فرعي برخو پر وړاندې معافیتي سیستم حساس کوي.
en-mt: The second strategy is the creation of sub-vaccines, the aim of which is to create a vaccine that sensitizes the immune system against sub-parts of the virus.

sourceString: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research focuses on the S-spike protein that helps the virus intrude the ACE2 enzyme receptor.
targetString: د SARS-CoV-2 په پېښه کې، دا ډول څېړنې د S-spike پروټینو باندې تمرکز کیږی چې له وېروس سره د ACE2 انزایم ریسیپټور کې په ننوتو کې مرسته کوي.
en-mt: In the case of SARS-CoV-2, such research is focused on the S-spike protein that helps the virus enter the ACE2 enzyme receptor.

sourceString: A third strategy is that of the nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a novel technique for creating a vaccination).
targetString: درېیمه ستراتیژي د نوکلیک اسید واکسینونه دي (د DNA یا RNA واکسینونه، د واکسین جوړولو لپاره نوی تخنیک).
en-mt: A third strategy is nucleic acid vaccines (DNA or RNA vaccines, a new technique for making vaccines).

sourceString: Experimental vaccines from any of these strategies would have to be tested for safety and efficacy.On 16 March 2020, the first clinical trial of a vaccine started with four volunteers in Seattle.
targetString: له دغو هر یوې ستراتیژۍ څخه تجربوي واکسینونه باید د خوندیتوب او اغېزمنتیا لپاره ګټه پورته شي. په 16 مارچ 2020 کې، په سیاټل کې د یو واکسین لومړۍ کلینیکي ازموینه پر څلورو رضاکارانو باندې پیل شوه.
en-mt: Experimental vaccines from each of these strategies must be used for safety and efficacy. On March 16, 2020, the first clinical trial of a vaccine on four volunteers began in Seattle.

sourceString: The vaccine contains a harmless genetic code copied from the virus that causes the disease.Antibody dependent enhancement has been suggested as a potential challenge for vaccine development for SARS-COV-2, but this is controversial.
targetString: واکسین کې له وېروس څخه یو ارثي بې ضرره کوډ وي چې د ناروغۍ باعث کیږي. پر انټي باډي باندې تکیه کوونکې پیاوړتیا د SARS-CoV-2 د واکسین جوړولو لپاره د ممکنه ننګونې په توګه تجویز شوې، خو دې کار ډېر بحثونه رامنځته کړي.
en-mt: A vaccine contains a harmless code from the virus that causes the disease. Antibody-dependent potentiation has been proposed as a possible challenge for SARS-CoV-2 vaccine development, but this has generated much debate.

sourceString: There are more than 300 active clinical trials underway as of April 2020.
targetString: له اپریل 2020 راپدېخوا، له 300 نه ډېر فعال کلینیکي ازموینې ترسره شوي.
en-mt: As of April 2020, more than 300 active clinical trials have been conducted.

sourceString: Seven trials were evaluating already approved treatments for malaria, including four studies on hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.
targetString: په اوه ازموینو کې له وړاندې د ملاریا لپاره د تایید شوو درملنو ارزونه ترسره شوه، چې څلور څېړنې پر هایدروکسیکلوروکوین یا کلوروکوین ترسره شوې.
en-mt: Seven trials evaluated previously approved treatments for malaria, four of which looked at hydroxychloroquine or chloroquine.

sourceString: Repurposed antiviral drugs make up most of the Chinese research, with nine phase III trials on remdesivir across several countries due to report by the end of April.
targetString: په ډېرو چینایي څېړنو کې د نورو ناروغیو درملو څېړل شامل وو، چې په ډېرو هېوادونو کې د اپریل تر اخره د راپورونو له مخې پر ریمډیسیور باندې نهه/9 د فاز III ازموینې ترسره شوې.
en-mt: Many of the Chinese studies involved drug trials for other diseases, with 9/9 Phase III trials on Remdesivir reportedly being conducted in most countries by the end of April.

sourceString: A dynamic review of clinical development for COVID-19 vaccine and drug candidates was in place, as of April 2020.Several existing antiviral medications are being evaluated for treatment of COVID-19, including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/ritonavir and lopinavir/ritonavir combined with interferon beta.
targetString: تر اپرېل 2020 پورې، د کووېډ-19 واکسین او درملو لپاره د کلینیکي پراختیا یوه ډینامیک څېړنه ترسره شوه.د وېروس ضد ډېر شمېر شته درمل د کووېډ-19  درملنې لپاره تر ارزونې او څېړنې لاندې دي. په شمول د ریمډیسیور، کلوروکوین او هایډروکسي کلوروکوین، لوپیناویر/اریتنویر او لوپیناویر/ریتوناویر او همدارنګه انټر فیرا بیتا.
en-mt: As of April 2020, a dynamic review of the clinical development of vaccines and drugs for Covid-19 has been conducted. Many existing antiviral drugs are under evaluation and investigation for the treatment of Covid-19. including remdesivir, chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine, lopinavir/aritanavir and lopinavir/ritonavir as well as enterifera beta.

sourceString: There is tentative evidence for efficacy by remdesivir, as of March 2020.
targetString: د مارچ 2020 څخه راپدېخوا د ریمډیسیویر د اغېزمنتیا ازمایښتي شواهد شته.
en-mt: As of March 2020, there is clinical evidence of the effectiveness of remdesivir.

sourceString: Clinical improvement was observed in patients treated with compassionate-use remdesivir.
targetString: د ریمډیسیویر کم استعمال سره د رغول شوو ناروغانو په درملنه کې کلینیکي پرمختګ کتل شوی دی.
en-mt: Clinical improvement has been observed in patients treated with reduced remdesivir.

sourceString: Phase III clinical trials are being conducted in the US, China and Italy.Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was studied in China in February 2020, with preliminary results.
targetString: د فاز III کلینیکي ازموینې په امریکا متحده ایالاتو، چین او ایټالیا کې د ترسره کېدو په حال کې دی. کلوروکوین، چې مخکې د ملاریا د درملنې لپاره کارول کېده، په فبروري 2020  کې په چین کې د لومړنیو پایلو په لرلو سره تر څېړنې لاندې ونیول شو.
en-mt: Phase III clinical trials are underway in the United States, China and Italy. Chloroquine, previously used to treat malaria, was investigated in China in February 2020 with preliminary results.

sourceString: However, there are calls for peer review of the research.
targetString: خو بیا هم، د څېړنې د ګډې بیاکتنې غوښتنه کیږي.
en-mt: However, a peer review of the study is called for.

sourceString: Korean and Chinese Health Authorities recommend the use of chloroquine.
targetString: کوریایي او چینایي روغتیایي چارواکي د کلوروکوین د استعمال سپارښتنه کوي.
en-mt: Korean and Chinese health authorities recommend the use of chloroquine.

sourceString: However, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a daily dose of one gram, notes that twice that dose is highly dangerous and could be lethal.
targetString: د دې سربېره، د ووهان د ویرولوژي انسټیټوټ، په داسې حال کې چې په ورځ کې د یو ګرام ډوز خوړلو تجویز کوي، یادونه کوي چې د دې درمل ډوز دوه ځله خوړل په ورځ کې د ډېر زیات خطرناک او کېدای شي مرګونی وي.
en-mt: In addition, the Wuhan Institute of Virology, while recommending a dose of one gram a day, notes that taking twice a day is dangerous and can be fatal.

sourceString: On 28 March 2020, the FDA issued an emergency use authorisation for hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine at the discretion of physicians treating people with COVID-19.The Chinese 7th edition guidelines also include interferon, ribavirin or umifenovir for use against COVID-19.
targetString: په 28 مارچ 2020 کې، FDA د ډاکټرانو له غوښتنې سره سم د هایدروکسی کلوروکوین او کلوروکوین د بېړني استعمال غوښتنه صادر کړه تر څو پر کووېډ-19 اخته ناروغانو درملنه وشي.د چین په اووم چاپ لارښودونو کې د کووېډ-19 پر وړاندې د انټرفیرون، رباویرین، یا یومیفینوویر استعمال هم ذکر شوی.
en-mt: On March 28, 2020, the FDA issued an Emergency Use Request for hydroxychloroquine and chloroquine to treat patients with COVID-19 at the request of physicians. , ribavirin, or omefenavir use has also been mentioned.

sourceString: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro.
targetString: لومړنۍ ډېټا ښیي چې د ریباویرین ډېر زیات استعمال په ازمایښتځایونو کې د SARS-CoV-2 غلیظ کولو لپاره اړین دي.
en-mt: Preliminary data indicate that high doses of ribavirin are necessary to suppress SARS-CoV-2 in experimental settings.

sourceString: Nitazoxanide has been recommended for further in vivo study after demonstrating low concentration inhibition of SARS-CoV-2.Studies have demonstrated that initial spike protein priming by transmembrane protease serine 2 (TMPRSS2) is essential for entry of SARS-CoV-2 via interaction with the ACE2 receptor.
targetString: د SARS-CoV-2 وېروس د کمې کچې غلظت د مخنیوي ښودلو وروسته په ازمېښتځایونو کې د نیتاظوکسانید د لاډېرې څېړنې سپارښتنه وشوه.څېړنو وښوده چې د لوړې کچې پروټین پمپ کول د transmembrane protease serine 2 له لارې له ACE2 receptor سره د اړیکې له لارې د SARS-CoV-2 داخلولو لپاره مهم دی.
en-mt: After showing inhibition of low concentrations of SARS-CoV-2 virus, further investigation of nitazoxanide in the test sites was recommended. Studies have shown that high levels of protein are pumped through the transmembrane protease serine 2 through binding to the ACE2 receptor. Important for entry of SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: The studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with or without azithromycin have major limitations that have prevented the medical community from embracing these therapies without further study.Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in vitro and has no known role in COVID-19 treatment.
targetString: له ازیترومایسین سره او پرته له ازیترومایسین څخه د کلوروکوین او هایدروکسی کلوروکوین څېړنې ډېر زیات محدودیتونه لري چې پرته له نورو څېړنو څخه یې په درملنو کې د کارولو لپاره د روغتیایي ټولنې مخنیوی کړی دی. اوسیلتامیویر په ازمیښتځایونو کې د SARS-CoV-2 مخنیوی نه کوي او د کووېډ-19 په درملنه کې کوم ښکاره رول نلري.
en-mt: Studies of chloroquine and hydroxychloroquine with and without azithromycin have many limitations that have prevented the medical community from using them in treatments without further research. Oseltamivir does not inhibit SARS-CoV-2 in experimental settings and has no apparent role in the treatment of Covid-19.

sourceString: Cytokine storm can be a complication in the later stages of severe COVID-19.
targetString: سایتوکین توفان د کووېډ-19 په سختو او وروستیو مراحلو کې روغتیایي وضعیت پېچلی کولی شي.
en-mt: Cytokine storm can complicate the health situation in the severe and late stages of Covid-19.

sourceString: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties.Tocilizumab has been included in treatment guidelines by China's National Health Commission after a small study was completed.
targetString: داسې شواهد شته چې هایدروکسی کلوروکوین ښایي د سایتوکین توفان ضد ځانګړتیاوې ولري. د یوې کوچنۍ څېړنې له بشپړېدو وروسته د چین د روغتیا ملي کمیسیون د درملنې په لارښودونو کې د توسیلیزوماب درمل هم شامل کړل.
en-mt: There is evidence that hydroxychloroquine may have anti-cytokine storm properties. After a small study was completed, the National Health Commission of China included tocilizumab in its treatment guidelines.

sourceString: It is undergoing a phase 2 non randomised test at the national level in Italy after showing positive results in people with severe disease.
targetString: په شدیدو ناروغانو کې د مثبتو پایلو ښودلو وروسته، په ایټالیا کې په ملي کچه د تصادفي ازموینې فاز 2 ترسره کېږي.
en-mt: After showing positive results in critically ill patients, a phase 2 randomized trial is underway in Italy.

sourceString: Combined with a serum ferritin blood test to identify cytokine storms, it is meant to counter such developments, which are thought to be the cause of death in some affected people.
targetString: د سایتوکین توفانونو مالومولو لپاره د سیروم فیریټین وینې معاینې ته اړونده له دې معاینې څخه موخه د داسې پرمختګونو مخنیوی دی چې فکر کیږي په ځینو اغېزمنو ناروغانو کې د مرګ لامل ګڼل کیږي.
en-mt: Related to serum ferritin blood tests to detect cytokine storms, this test aims to prevent progression that is thought to be fatal in some affected patients.

sourceString: The interleukin-6 receptor antagonist was approved by the FDA based on retrospective case studies for treatment of steroid refractory cytokine release syndrome induced by a different cause, CAR T cell therapy, in 2017.
targetString: د انټرلوکین-6 ریسیپټور انتاګونیست د FDA له لوري د پخوانیو پېښو څېړنو پر اساس د سټیرویډ ریفرکټورین سایتوکین علایمو د درملنې لپاره تایید شو چې د کوم جلا سبب له لوري رامنځته کیږي، CAR T cell، 2017.
en-mt: Interleukin-6 receptor antagonist approved by FDA for treatment of steroid-refractory cytokine symptoms of any etiology based on retrospective case studies, CAR T cell, 2017.

sourceString: To date, there is no randomised, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is an efficacious treatment for CRS.
targetString: تر دې دمه، داسې تصادفي او کنټرول شوي شواهد نشته چې ټوسیلیزوماب دې د CRS لپاره یوه اغېزمنه درملنه وګڼل شي.
en-mt: To date, there is no randomized, controlled evidence that tocilizumab is considered an effective treatment for CRS.

sourceString: Transferring purified and concentrated antibodies produced by the immune systems of those who have recovered from COVID-19 to people who need them is being investigated as a non-vaccine method of passive immunisation.
targetString: له کووېډ-19 ناروغۍ څخه د رغول شوو کسانو له معافیت سیستم څخه تولید کېدونکو سوچه او غلیظو انټي باډیانو انتقال هغو کسانو ته چې ورته اړتیا لري، د غیرفعال ایمیونایزیشن د غیرواکسیني میتود په توګه تر څېړنې لاندې ده.
en-mt: The transfer of antibodies produced by the immune system of people who have recovered from Covid-19 to those who need them is being investigated as a non-vaccine method of passive immunization.

sourceString: This strategy was tried for SARS with inconclusive results.
targetString: دا سټراتیژي پرته له پایلو د SARS لپاره وازمایل شوه.
en-mt: This strategy was tested for SARS without results.

sourceString: Viral neutralisation is the anticipated mechanism of action by which passive antibody therapy can mediate defence against SARS-CoV-2.
targetString: د ویروس خنثا کول د عمل د تمې وړ میکانیزم ده چې پر مټ یې د انټي باډي غیرفعاله درملنه د SARS-CoV-2 پر وړاندې دفاعي سیستم پیاوړی کوي.
en-mt: Viral neutralization is the expected mechanism of action by which neutralizing antibody therapy strengthens the immune system against SARS-CoV-2.

sourceString: Other mechanisms however, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, may be possible.
targetString: خو نور میکانیزمونه، لکه د انټي باډي-ډیپینډنټ سیلولر سایتوتاکسیسیتي او/یا فوګاسیتوسیس هم امکان لري.
en-mt: But other mechanisms, such as antibody-dependent cellular cytotoxicity and/or phagocytosis, are also possible.

sourceString: Other forms of passive antibody therapy, for example, using manufactured monoclonal antibodies, are in development.
targetString: د انټي باډي د غیرفعال درملنې نورې بڼې د مونوکلونل جوړو شوو انټي باډيانو کارول هم د پراختیا په حال کې دی.
en-mt: Other forms of passive antibody therapy using monoclonal antibodies are also under development.

sourceString: Production of convalescent serum, which consists of the liquid portion of the blood from recovered patients and contains antibodies specific to this virus, could be increased for quicker deployment.
targetString: د رغول شوو ناروغانو سیروم تولیدول، چې له روغ شوو ناروغانو څخه د وینې د مایع برخې راخیستل په کې شامل دي او وېروس ته د ځانګړو انټي باډیانو څخه کار اخیستل پکې شامل دي، کولی په بدن کې د چټک خپراوي لپاره یې شمېر ډېر شي.
en-mt: The production of serum from recovered patients, which involves taking a portion of the blood from recovered patients and using specific antibodies to the virus, can increase the number of them for rapid spread in the body.

sourceString: Coronavirus diseases, a group of closely related syndromes
targetString: د کوروناوېروس ناروغۍ، له یو بل سره اړونده علایمو لرونکې ډله
en-mt: Coronavirus disease, a group of related symptoms

sourceString: Li Wenliang, a doctor at Central Hospital of Wuhan, who later contracted and died of COVID-19 after raising awareness of the spread of the virus.
targetString: لی وینلیانګ، د ووهان د مرکزي روغتون ډاکټر چې د وېروس د خپرېدو په اړه د پوهاوي ډېرولو وروسته، پر کووېډ-19 وېروس باندې اخته او ورڅخه مړ شو.
en-mt: Li Wenliang, a doctor at the Wuhan Central Hospital who, after raising awareness of the virus outbreak, contracted and died of the Covid-19 virus.
